  2540                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2541                                  
  2542                                  ;************************************************************************
  2543                                  ;*									*
  2544                                  ;*	Ensure A20 is enabled before jumping into code in HMA.		*
  2545                                  ;*	This code assumes that if Segment of Device request packet is	*
  2546                                  ;*	DOS DATA segment then the Device request came from DOS & that	*
  2547                                  ;*	A20 is already on.						*
  2548                                  ;*									*
  2549                                  ;************************************************************************
  2550                                  
  2551                                  cdev_entry:	; proc near		
  2552 0000071E 2E803E[0D00]00          		cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2553 00000724 740D                    		jz	short ce_enter_codeseg
  2554                                  				; optimized for DOS in HMA
  2555 00000726 50                      		push	ax
  2556 00000727 2EA1[0300]              		mov	ax, [cs:DosDataSg]
  2557 0000072B 2E3906[1400]            		cmp	[cs:ptrsav+2], ax
  2558 00000730 58                      		pop	ax
  2559 00000731 7505                    		jnz	short not_from_dos
  2560                                  				; jump is coded this way to fall thru
  2561                                  				; in 99.99% of the cases
  2562                                  ce_enter_codeseg:
  2563 00000733 2EFF2E[BD06]            		jmp	far [cs:cdev]			
  2564                                  		;jmp	dword ptr cs:cdev
  2565                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2566                                  
  2567                                  not_from_dos:				
  2568 00000738 E85500                  		call	EnsureA20On
  2569 0000073B EBF6                    		jmp	short ce_enter_codeseg
  2570                                  
  2571                                  ;************************************************************************
  2572                                  ;*									*
  2573                                  ;*	outchr - this is our int 29h handler. it writes the		*
  2574                                  ;*	   character in al on the display using int 10h ttywrite	*
  2575                                  ;*									*
  2576                                  ;************************************************************************
  2577                                  
  2578                                  ; 30/12/2022
  2579                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:0762h)
  2580                                  
  2581                                  outchr:					
  2582 0000073D 50                      		push	ax		; int 29h handler
  2583 0000073E 56                      		push	si
  2584 0000073F 57                      		push	di
  2585 00000740 55                      		push	bp
  2586 00000741 53                      		push	bx
  2587 00000742 B40E                    		mov	ah, 0Eh
  2588 00000744 BB0700                  		mov	bx, 7
  2589 00000747 CD10                    		int	10h		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTER AND	ADVANCE	CURSOR (TTY WRITE)
  2590                                  					; AL = character, BH = display page (alpha modes)
  2591                                  					; BL = foreground color	(graphics modes)
  2592 00000749 5B                      		pop	bx
  2593 0000074A 5D                      		pop	bp
  2594 0000074B 5F                      		pop	di
  2595 0000074C 5E                      		pop	si
  2596 0000074D 58                      		pop	ax
  2597 0000074E CF                      		iret
  2598                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2599                                  
  2600                                  ;************************************************************************
  2601                                  ;*									*
  2602                                  ;*	block13 - our int13 hooker					*
  2603                                  ;*									*
  2604                                  ;************************************************************************
  2605                                  
  2606                                  block13:				
  2607 0000074F 2E803E[0D00]00          		cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2608 00000755 7408                    		jz	short skipa20
  2609 00000757 E84700                  		call	IsA20Off	; A20 Off?
  2610 0000075A 7503                    		jnz	short skipa20
  2611 0000075C E83600                  		call	EnableA20	; assure a20 enabled
  2612                                  
  2613                                  skipa20:				
  2614 0000075F 2E8C1E[1C00]            		mov	[cs:i13_ds], ds	; save caller's ds for call-through
  2615 00000764 9C                      		pushf			; fake interrupt
  2616 00000765 2EFF1E[C506]            		call	far [cs:i13x]
  2617                                  		;call	dword ptr cs:i13x
  2618                                  					; call through Bios_Code entry table
  2619 0000076A 2E8E1E[1C00]            		mov	ds, [cs:i13_ds]
  2620 0000076F CA0200                  		retf	2
  2621                                  
  2622                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  2623                                  
  2624                                  ; the int13 hook calls back here to call-through to the ROM
  2625                                  ; this is necessary because some people have extended their
  2626                                  ; ROM BIOSs to use ds as a parameter/result register and
  2627                                  ; our int13 hook relies heavily on ds to access Bios_Data
  2628                                  
  2629                                  call_orig13:	; proc far		
  2630 00000772 8E1E[1C00]              		mov	ds, [i13_ds]	; get caller's ds register
  2631 00000776 9C                      		pushf			; simulate an int13
  2632 00000777 2EFF1E[B400]            		call	far [cs:Orig13]
  2633                                  		;call	cs:Orig13
  2634 0000077C 2E8C1E[1C00]            		mov	[cs:i13_ds], ds
  2635 00000781 0E                      		push	cs
  2636 00000782 1F                      		pop	ds		; restore ds ->	Bios_Data before return
  2637                                  
  2638 00000783 9C                      		pushf
  2639                                  		; 10/12/2022
  2640                                  		; ds = cs
  2641 00000784 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0	; 16/10/2022
  2642                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2643 00000789 7403                    		jz	short corig13_popf_retf
  2644                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  2645                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:0725h	
  2646                                  		;call	IsA20Off
  2647                                  		;jnz	short corig13_popf_retf
  2648                                  		;call	EnableA20
  2649 0000078B E80200                  		call	EnsureA20On ; 07/08/2023
  2650                                  corig13_popf_retf:			
  2651 0000078E 9D                      		popf
  2652                                  re_init:	; 07/08/2023
  2653 0000078F CB                      		retf
  2654                                  
  2655                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2656                                  
  2657                                  ; BIOSDATA:07BBh (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  2658                                  ; BIOSDATA:07BBh (MSDOS 5.0, IO.SYS) ; 16/10/2022

  2661                                  ;HiMem:		dd 0FFFF0090h

  2669                                  ;************************************************************************
  2670                                  ;*									*
  2671                                  ;*	EnsureA20On - ensure that a20 is enabled if we're running	*
  2672                                  ;*	  in the HMA before interrupt entry points into Bios_Code	*
  2673                                  ;*									*
  2674                                  ;************************************************************************
  2675                                  
  2676                                  EnsureA20On:	; proc near		
  2677 00000790 E80E00                  		call	IsA20Off
  2678                                  		;jz	short EnableA20
  2679                                  		;retn
  2680                                  		; 18/12/2022
  2681 00000793 750B                    		jnz	short A20On_retn	
  2682                                  
  2683                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2684                                  
  2685                                  
  2686                                  EnableA20:	; proc near		
  2687 00000795 50                      		push	ax
  2688 00000796 53                      		push	bx
  2689 00000797 B405                    		mov	ah, 5	 ; local enable a20
  2690                                  		;call	cs:xms
  2691 00000799 2EFF1E[0E00]            		call	far [cs:xms] ; 16/10/2022
  2692 0000079E 5B                      		pop	bx
  2693 0000079F 58                      		pop	ax
  2694                                  A20On_retn:	; 18/12/2022	
  2695 000007A0 C3                      		retn
  2696                                  
  2697                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2698                                  
  2699                                  
  2700                                  IsA20Off:	; proc near		
  2701 000007A1 1E                      		push	ds
  2702 000007A2 06                      		push	es
  2703 000007A3 51                      		push	cx
  2704 000007A4 56                      		push	si
  2705 000007A5 57                      		push	di

  2967                                  ; WIN386 instance data structure

  2969                                  ; Here is a Win386 startup info structure which we set up and to which
  2970                                  ; we return a pointer when Win386 initializes.

  2979                                  
  2980                                  ; This table gives Win386 the instance data in the BIOS and ROM-BIOS data
  2981                                  ; areas. Note that the address and size of the hardware stacks must
  2982                                  ; be calculated and inserted at boot time.
  2983

  2987 00000857 1400                    		dw 14h			; ... 14H bytes
  2988 00000859 [0C00]                  		dw altah		; a con	device buffer...
  2989 0000085B 7000                    		dw 70h			; Bios_Data segment
  2990 0000085D 0100                    		dw 1			; ... 1 byte
  2991                                  
  2992                                  NextStack:
  2993                                  
  2994                                  ; NOTE:  If stacks are disabled by STACKS=0,0, the following
  2995                                  ;	instance items WILL NOT be filled in by SYSINIT.
  2996                                  ;	That's just fine as long as these are the last items
  2997                                  ;	in the instance list since the first item is initialized
  2998                                  ;	to 0000 at load time.
  2999                                  
  3000 0000085F 00000000                		dw 0, 0			; pointer to next stack	to be used...
  3001 00000863 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2 bytes
  3002 00000865 00000000                IT_StackLoc:	dd 0			; location of hardware stacks
  3003 00000869 0000                    IT_StackSize:	dw 0			; size of hardware stacks
  3004 0000086B 00000000                		dd 0			; terminate the	instance table

  3023 0000087B B88416                  		mov	ax, 1684h	; Get API entry	point

  3025                                  					; BX = virtual device (VxD) ID,	ES:DI =	0000h:0000h
  3026                                  					; Return: ES:DI	-> VxD API entry point,	or 0:0 if the VxD does not support an API

  3317 00001266 4E414D45           
  3318 0000126A 202020200000000000-     		db 20h,	20h, 20h, 20h, 0, 0, 0,	0, 0, 46h, 41h,	54h, 31h

  3320 0000127C 00                      		db 0
  3321                                  
  3322                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3323                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3324                                  ;***************************************************************************
  3325                                  
  3326                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3327                                  
  3328                                  ;***	ibm_disk_io - main routine, fixes at rom bug
  3329                                  ;
  3330                                  ;	entry:	(ah) = function, 02 or 0a for read.
  3331                                  ;		(dl) = drive number (80h or 81h).
  3332                                  ;		(dh) = head number.
  3333                                  ;		(ch) = cylinder number.
  3334                                  ;		(cl) = sector number (high 2 bits has cylinder number).
  3335                                  ;		(al) = number of sectors.
  3336                                  ;		(es:bx) = address of read buffer.
  3337                                  ;		for more on register contents see rom bios listing.
  3338                                  ;		stack set up for return by an iret.
  3339                                  ;
  3340                                  ;	exit:	(ah) = status of current operation.
  3341                                  ;		(cy) = 1 if failed, 0 if successful.
  3342                                  ;		for other register contents see rom bios listing.
  3343                                  ;
  3344                                  ;	uses:	
  3345                                  ;
  3346                                  ;
  3347                                  ;	warning: uses old13 vector for non-read calls.
  3348                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3349                                  ;		does segment arithmatic.
  3350                                  ;
  3351                                  ;	effects: performs disk i/o operation.
  3352                                  
  3353                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3354                                  ; 28/05/2019
  3355                                  cmd_block equ 42h ; ROMBIOS DATA segment (40h) offset 42h ; 13/12/2022
  3356                                  
  3357                                  ;* offsets into cmd_block for registers
  3358                                  
  3359                                  pre_comp equ 0	;write pre-compensation
  3360                                  sec_cnt	 equ 1	;sector count
  3361                                  sec_num	 equ 2	;sector number
  3362                                  cyl_low	 equ 3	;cylinder number, low part
  3363                                  cyl_high equ 4	;cylinder number, high part
  3364                                  drv_head equ 5	;drive/head (bit 7 = ecc mode, bit 5 = 512 byte sectors, 
  3365                                  		;            bit 4 = drive number, bits 3-0 have head number)
  3366                                  cmd_reg  equ 6	;command register
  3367                                  
  3368                                  ; 01/10/2022
  3369                                  disk_status1	equ 74h
  3370                                  hf_num		equ 75h
  3371                                  control_byte	equ 76h
  3372                                  
  3373                                  ; 30/12/2022
  3374                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:12DEh)
  3375                                  
  3376                                  ibm_disk_io:				
  3377 0000127D 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h		; main routine,	fixes at rom bug
  3378 00001280 720A                    		jb	short atd1	; pass through floppy disk calls. 
  3379 00001282 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3380 00001285 740A                    		jz	short atd2	; intercept call 02 (read sectors).
  3381 00001287 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 0Ah
  3382 0000128A 7405                    		jz	short atd2	; and call 0Ah (read long).
  3383                                  atd1:
  3384 0000128C 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]					
  3385                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13	; use rom int 13h handler
  3386                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3387                                  
  3388                                  atd2:					
  3389 00001291 53                      		push	bx
  3390 00001292 51                      		push	cx
  3391 00001293 52                      		push	dx
  3392 00001294 57                      		push	di
  3393 00001295 1E                      		push	ds
  3394 00001296 06                      		push	es
  3395 00001297 50                      		push	ax
  3396 00001298 B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; bioseg (rombios data segment)
  3397                                  					; establish bios segment addressing
  3398 0000129B 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3399                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3400 0000129D C606740000              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 0
  3401                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 0 ; [disk_status1]
  3402                                  					; initially no error code.
  3403 000012A2 80E27F                  		and	dl, 7Fh		; mask to hard disk number
  3404 000012A5 3A167500                		cmp	dl, [hf_num]
  3405                                  		;cmp	dl, ds:75h	; [hf_num] ; 40h:75h
  3406 000012A9 7207                    		jb	short atd3	; disk number in range
  3407                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 1 ; bad_disk
  3408 000012AB C606740001              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 1
  3409 000012B0 EB20                    		jmp	short atd4	; disk number out of range error,
  3410                                  					; return
  3411                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3412                                  
  3413                                  atd3:					
  3414 000012B2 53                      		push	bx
  3415 000012B3 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3416 000012B5 C1EB04                  		shr	bx, 4		; make es:bx to seg:000x form.
  3417 000012B8 01D8                    		add	ax, bx
  3418 000012BA 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  3419 000012BC 5B                      		pop	bx
  3420 000012BD 83E30F                  		and	bx, 0Fh
  3421 000012C0 0E                      		push	cs
  3422 000012C1 E8DF00                  		call	check_dma
  3423 000012C4 720C                    		jb	short atd4	; abort if dma across segment boundary
  3424 000012C6 58                      		pop	ax
  3425 000012C7 50                      		push	ax
  3426 000012C8 E81A00                  		call	setcmd		; set up command block for disk op
  3427 000012CB BAF603                  		mov	dx, 3F6h	; hf_reg_port 
  3428 000012CE EE                      		out	dx, al		; write out command modifier
  3429 000012CF E86B00                  		call	docmd		; carry out command
  3430                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3431                                  
  3432                                  atd4:	
  3433                                  
  3434                                  ;  new code - let logical or clear carry and then set carry if ah!=0
  3435                                  ;	      and save a couple bytes while were at it.
  3436                                  				
  3437 000012D2 58                      		pop	ax
  3438                                  		;mov	ah, ds:74h	; [disk_status1]
  3439 000012D3 8A267400                		mov	ah, [disk_status1]
  3440 000012D7 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  3441 000012D9 7401                    		jz	short atd5
  3442 000012DB F9                      		stc
  3443                                  atd5:					
  3444 000012DC 07                      		pop	es
  3445 000012DD 1F                      		pop	ds
  3446 000012DE 5F                      		pop	di
  3447 000012DF 5A                      		pop	dx
  3448 000012E0 59                      		pop	cx
  3449 000012E1 5B                      		pop	bx
  3450 000012E2 CA0200                  		retf	2		; far return, dropping flags
  3451                                  
  3452                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3453                                  
  3454                                  ;***	setcmd - set up cmd_block for the disk operation
  3455                                  ;
  3456                                  ;	entry:	(ds) = bios data segment.
  3457                                  ;		(es:bx) in seg:000x form.
  3458                                  ;		other registers as in int 13h call
  3459                                  ;	
  3460                                  ;	exit:	cmd_block set up for disk read call.
  3461                                  ;		control_byte set up for disk operation.
  3462                                  ;		(al) = control byte modifier
  3463                                  ;
  3464                                  ;	sets the fields of cmd_block using the register contents
  3465                                  ;	and the contents of the disk parameter block for the given drive.
  3466                                  ;
  3467                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3468                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3469                                  
  3470                                  setcmd:		; proc near		
  3471                                  		;mov	ds:43h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3472                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3473 000012E5 A24300                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_cnt], al
  3474                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 20h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3475 000012E8 C606480020              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 20h ; assume function 02h (read)
  3476 000012ED 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3477 000012F0 7405                    		jz	short setc1	; cmd_reg = 20h	if function 02h	(read)
  3478 000012F2 C606480022              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 22h
  3479                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 22h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3480                                  					; cmd_reg = 22h	if function 0Ah	(read long)
  3481                                  setc1:					
  3482 000012F7 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3483 000012F9 243F                    		and	al, 3Fh		; mask sector number
  3484                                  		;mov	ds:44h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_num]
  3485                                  		;mov	ds:45h,	ch	; [cmd_block+cyl_low]
  3486 000012FB A24400                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_num], al ; mov [44h],al
  3487 000012FE 882E4500                		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_low], ch ; mov [45h],ch
  3488 00001302 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3489 00001304 C0E806                  		shr	al, 6		; get two high bits of cylinder	number
  3490                                  		;mov	ds:46h,	al	; [cmd_block+cyl_high]
  3491 00001307 A24600                  		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_high], al ; mov [46h],al
  3492 0000130A 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  3493 0000130C C0E004                  		shl	al, 4		; drive	number
  3494 0000130F 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh
  3495 00001312 08E0                    		or	al, ah		; head number
  3496 00001314 0CA0                    		or	al, 0A0h	; set ecc and 512 bytes	per sector
  3497                                  		;mov	ds:47h,	al	; [cmd_block+drv_head]
  3498 00001316 A24700                  		mov	[cmd_block+drv_head], al  ; mov [47h],al 
  3499 00001319 06                      		push	es
  3500 0000131A 53                      		push	bx
  3501 0000131B 0E                      		push	cs
  3502 0000131C E85C00                  		call	get_vec
  3503 0000131F 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+fdp_precomp]
  3504                                  			 		; write pre-comp from disk parameters
  3505 00001323 C1E802                  		shr	ax, 2
  3506                                  		;mov	ds:42h,	al	; [cmd_block+pre_comp]
  3507 00001326 A24200                  		mov	[cmd_block+pre_comp], al ; mov [42h],al
  3508                                  					; only use low part
  3509 00001329 268A4708                		mov	al, [es:bx+8]	; [es:bx+fdp_control]
  3510                                  					; control byte modifier
  3511 0000132D 5B                      		pop	bx
  3512 0000132E 07                      		pop	es
  3513                                  		;mov	ah, ds:76h	; [control_byte]
  3514 0000132F 8A267600                		mov	ah, [control_byte] ; mov ah,[76h]
  3515 00001333 80E4C0                  		and	ah, 0C0h	; keep disable retry bits	
  3516 00001336 08C4                    		or	ah, al
  3517                                  		;mov	ds:76h,	ah
  3518 00001338 88267600                		mov	[control_byte], ah ; mov [76h],al
  3519 0000133C C3                      		retn
  3520                                  
  3521                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3522                                  
  3523                                  ;***	docmd - carry out read operation to at hard disk
  3524                                  ;
  3525                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = address for read in data.
  3526                                  ;		cmd_block set up for disk read.
  3527                                  ;
  3528                                  ;	exit:	buffer at (es:bx) contains data read.
  3529                                  ;		disk_status1 set to error code (0 if success).
  3530                                  ;
  3531                                  ;	
  3532                                  ;
  3533                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx), (dx), (di) destroyed.
  3534                                  ;		no check is made for dma boundary overrun.
  3535                                  ;
  3536                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3537                                  ;		performs disk input.
  3538                                  
  3539                                  docmd:		; proc near		
  3540 0000133D 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
  3541 0000133F 0E                      		push	cs
  3542 00001340 E84000                  		call	command
  3543 00001343 7535                    		jnz	short doc3
  3544                                  doc1:					
  3545 00001345 0E                      		push	cs
  3546 00001346 E84200                  		call	waitt		; wait for controller to complete read
  3547 00001349 752F                    		jnz	short doc3
  3548 0000134B B90001                  		mov	cx, 256		; 256 words per sector
  3549 0000134E BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3550 00001351 FC                      		cld			; string op goes up
  3551 00001352 FA                      		cli			; disable interrupts
  3552                                  					; (bug was forgetting this)
  3553                                  
  3554                                  ;	M062 -- some of these old machines have intermittent failures
  3555                                  ;		when the read is done at full speed. Instead of using
  3556                                  ;		a string rep instruction, we'll use a loop. There is
  3557                                  ;		a slight performance hit, but it only affects these
  3558                                  ;		very old machines with an exact date code match, and
  3559                                  ;		it makes said machines more reliable
  3560                                  ;
  3561                                  ;M062	repz	insw		;read in sector
  3562                                  
  3563                                  rsct_loop:				
  3564 00001353 6D                      		insw
  3565 00001354 E2FD                    		loop	rsct_loop
  3566 00001356 FB                      		sti
  3567                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3568 00001357 F606480002              		test	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 02h
  3569                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:48h, 2 ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3570                                  					; (ds =	40h)
  3571 0000135C 7410                    		jz	short doc2	; no ecc bytes to read.
  3572 0000135E 0E                      		push	cs
  3573 0000135F E83100                  		call	wait_drq	; wait for controller to complete read
  3574 00001362 7216                    		jb	short doc3
  3575 00001364 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes of ecc
  3576 00001367 BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3577 0000136A FA                      		cli
  3578 0000136B F36C                    		rep insb		; read in ecc
  3579 0000136D FB                      		sti
  3580                                  doc2:					
  3581 0000136E 0E                      		push	cs
  3582 0000136F E82900                  		call	check_status
  3583 00001372 7506                    		jnz	short doc3	; operation failed
  3584                                  		;dec	byte ptr ds:43h	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3585 00001374 FE0E4300                		dec	byte [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3586 00001378 75CB                    		jnz	short doc1	; loop while more sectors to read
  3587                                  doc3:					
  3588 0000137A C3                      		retn
  3589                                  
  3590                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3591                                  
  3592                                  ;***	define where the rom routines are actually located
  3593                                  ;	   in the buggy old AT BIOS that we might need to
  3594                                  ;	   install a special level of int13 handler for
  3595                                  
  3596                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3597                                  
  3598                                  romsegment 	equ 0F000h  ; segment
  3599                                  romcommand 	equ 2E1Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3600                                  romwait		equ 2E7Fh   ; offset in romsegment
  3601                                  romwait_drq 	equ 2EE2h   ; offset in romsegment
  3602                                  romcheck_status equ 2EF8h   ; offset in romsegment
  3603                                  romcheck_dma 	equ 2F69h   ; offset in romsegment	
  3604                                  romget_vec	equ 2F8Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3605                                  romfret		equ 0FF65h  ; far return in rom	
  3606                                  
  3607                                  ;***	get_vec - get pointer to hard disk parameters.
  3608                                  ;
  3609                                  ;	entry:	(dl) = low bit has hard disk number (0 or 1).
  3610                                  ;
  3611                                  ;	exit:	(es:bx) = address of disk parameters table.
  3612                                  ;
  3613                                  ;	uses:	ax for segment computation.
  3614                                  ;
  3615                                  ;	loads es:bx from interrupt table in low memory, vector 46h (disk 0)
  3616                                  ;	or 70h (disk 1).
  3617                                  ;	
  3618                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3619                                  ;		this does a direct call to the at rom.
  3620                                  
  3621                                  get_vec:	; proc near		
  3622                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3623                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F8Eh
  3624                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3625 0000137B 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3626 0000137E EA8E2F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romget_vec
  3627                                  
  3628                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3629                                  
  3630                                  ;***	command - send contents of cmd_block to disk controller.
  3631                                  ;
  3632                                  ;	entry:	control_byte 
  3633                                  ;		cmd_block - set up with values for hard disk controller.
  3634                                  ;
  3635                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3636                                  ;		nz if error, zr for no error.
  3637                                  ;
  3638                                  ;
  3639                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3640                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3641                                  ;
  3642                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3643                                  
  3644                                  command:	; proc near		
  3645                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3646                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E1Eh
  3647                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3648 00001383 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3649 00001386 EA1E2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcommand
  3650                                  
  3651                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3652                                  
  3653                                  ;***	waitt - wait for disk interrupt
  3654                                  ;
  3655                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3656                                  ;
  3657                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3658                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3659                                  ;
  3660                                  ;
  3661                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx) destroyed.
  3662                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3663                                  ;		
  3664                                  ;	effects: calls int 15h, function 9000h.
  3665                                  
  3666                                  waitt:		; proc near		
  3667                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3668                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E7Fh
  3669                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3670 0000138B 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3671 0000138E EA7F2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait
  3672                                  
  3673                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3674                                  
  3675                                  ;***	wait_drq - wait for data request.
  3676                                  ;
  3677                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3678                                  ;
  3679                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3680                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3681                                  ;
  3682                                  ;	warning: (al), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3683                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3684                                  
  3685                                  wait_drq:	; proc near		
  3686                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3687                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EE2h
  3688                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3689 00001393 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3690 00001396 EAE22E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait_drq
  3691                                  
  3692                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3693                                  
  3694                                  ;***	check_status - check hard disk status.
  3695                                  ;
  3696                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3697                                  ;
  3698                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3699                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3700                                  ;
  3701                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3702                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3703                                  
  3704                                  check_status:	; proc near		
  3705                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3706                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EF8h
  3707                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3708 0000139B 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3709 0000139E EAF82E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_status
  3710                                  
  3711                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3712                                  
  3713                                  ;***	check_dma - check for dma overrun 64k segment.
  3714                                  ;
  3715                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = addr. of memory buffer in seg:000x form.
  3716                                  ;		cmd_block set up for operation.
  3717                                  ;
  3718                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 - error code.
  3719                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3720                                  ;
  3721                                  ;	warning: does a direct call to the at rom.
  3722                                  
  3723                                  check_dma:	; proc near		
  3724                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3725                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F69h
  3726                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3727 000013A3 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3728 000013A6 EA692F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_dma
  3729                                  
  3730                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3731                                  
  3732                                  endatrom:
  3733                                  
  3734                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3735                                  
  3736                                  ;; M015 -- begin changes
  3737                                  ;;
  3738                                  ;; Certain old COMPAQ '286 machines have a bug in their ROM BIOS.
  3739                                  ;; When Int13 is done with AH > 15h and DL >= 80h, they trash
  3740                                  ;; the byte at DS:74h, assuming that DS points to ROM_DATA.
  3741                                  ;; If our init code detects this error, it will install this
  3742                                  ;; special Int13 hook through the same mechanism that was set
  3743                                  ;; up for the IBM patch above. This code is also dynamically
  3744                                  ;; relocated by MSINIT.
  3745                                  
  3746                                  compaq_disk_io:
  3747 000013AB 80FC15                  		cmp	ah, 15h		; compaq_disk_io proc far
  3748                                  					;
  3749                                  					; the following	label defines the end of the at	rom patch.
  3750                                  					; this is used at configuration	time.
  3751                                  					;
  3752                                  					; warning!!!
  3753                                  					; this code will be dynamically	relocated by msinit
  3754 000013AE 7705                    		ja	short mebbe_hookit ; only deal with functions > 15h
  3755                                  no_hookit:				
  3756                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13
  3757                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3758 000013B0 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]
  3759                                  
  3760                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3761                                  
  3762                                  mebbe_hookit:
  3763 000013B5 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h
  3764 000013B8 72F6                    		jb	short no_hookit
  3765 000013BA 1E                      		push	ds
  3766                                  		
  3767                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3768                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:1830h
  3769                                  		;push	ax
  3770                                  		;mov	ax, 40h
  3771                                  		;mov	ds, ax
  3772                                  		;pop	ax
  3773 000013BB 6A40                    		push	40h
  3774 000013BD 1F                      		pop	ds
  3775                                  
  3776 000013BE 9C                      		pushf
  3777                                  		;call	cs:Old13
  3778                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3779 000013BF 2EFF1E[0601]            		call	far [cs:Old13]
  3780 000013C4 1F                      		pop	ds
  3781 000013C5 CA0200                  		retf	2
  3782                                  
  3783                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3784                                  
  3785 000013C8 00                      end_compaq_i13hook: db 0			
  3786                                  
  3787                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3788                                  
  3789                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3790                                  %if 0  
  3791                                  
  3792                                  ; CMOS Clock setting support routines used by MSCLOCK.		
  3793                                  ; Warning!!! This code will be dynamically relocated by MSINIT.
  3794                                  
  3795                                  daycnt_to_day:	; proc far
  3796                                  
  3797                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  3798                                  ;
  3799                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  3800                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  3801                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  3802                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  3803                                  
  3804                                  		; 16/10/2022		
  3805                                  		push	word [cs:daycnt] ; save daycnt
  3806                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3807                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  3808                                  		jnb	short century20
  3809                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 19
  3810                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 80
  3811                                  		jmp	short years
  3812                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3813                                  		
  3814                                  century20:				
  3815                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 20
  3816                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 0
  3817                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3818                                  					; adjust daycnt
  3819                                  years:					
  3820                                  		xor	dx, dx
  3821                                  		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3822                                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  3823                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  3824                                  		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  3825                                  		mov	[cs:daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  3826                                  		mov	bl, 4
  3827                                  		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  3828                                  		add	[cs:base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  3829                                  		inc	word [cs:daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  3830                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; daycnt=remainder of leap year	bk
  3831                                  		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  3832                                  		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  3833                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  3834                                  		mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  3835                                  regularyear:				
  3836                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 365	; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365;	i++)
  3837                                  		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  3838                                  		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	;   { daycnt -=	365
  3839                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 365	;   }
  3840                                  		loop	regularyear	; }
  3841                                  					;
  3842                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3843                                  leapyear:				
  3844                                  		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  3845                                  					; change month table.
  3846                                  yeardone:				
  3847                                  		xor	bx, bx
  3848                                  		xor	dx, dx
  3849                                  		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3850                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
  3851                                  		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
  3852                                  		mov	cx, 12
  3853                                  months:					
  3854                                  		inc	bl
  3855                                  
  3856                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (if DS=CS, what for CS: prefixes are used !?)
  3857                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:si]
  3858                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (may be to keep code addrs as unchanged/fix!?)
  3859                                  		; ds = cs !? ((ofcourse ds must be same with cs here))
  3860                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 20/03/2019 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3861                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3862                                  		
  3863                                  		mov	dl, [si] ; ?	; mov dl, [cs:si]
  3864                                  		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
  3865                                  					; dh=0
  3866                                  		jbe	short month_done
  3867                                  		inc	si		; next month
  3868                                  		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
  3869                                  		loop	months		;
  3870                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3871                                  month_done:				
  3872                                  		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 28
  3873                                  					; restore month table value
  3874                                  		mov	dl, bl
  3875                                  		mov	dh, [cs:base_year]
  3876                                  		mov	cl, [cs:base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
  3877                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3878                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
  3879                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
  3880                                  		xchg	dl, al
  3881                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3882                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
  3883                                  		xchg	dh, al
  3884                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3885                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
  3886                                  		xchg	cl, al
  3887                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3888                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; ch = bcd century
  3889                                  		mov	ch, al
  3890                                  		pop	word [cs:daycnt] ; restore original value
  3891                                  		retf
  3892                                  
  3893                                  enddaycnttoday:	
  3894                                  
  3895                                  %endif
  3896                                  
  3897                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3898                                  
  3899                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3900                                  %if 0  
  3901                                  
  3902                                  bin_to_bcd:	; proc far		; real time clock support
  3903                                  
  3904                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  3905                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  3906                                  		
  3907                                  		push	cx		
  3908                                  		aam			; al=high digit	bcd, ah=low digit bcd
  3909                                  		mov	cl, 4
  3910                                  		shl	ah, cl		; mov the high digit to	high nibble
  3911                                  		or	al, ah
  3912                                  		pop	cx
  3913                                  		retf
  3914                                  %endif
  3915                                  
  3916                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3917                                  
  3918                                  ; the k09 requires the routines for reading the clock because of the suspend/
  3919                                  ; resume facility. the system clock needs to be reset after resume.
  3920                                  
  3921                                  ; the following routine is executed at resume time when the system
  3922                                  ; powered on after suspension. it reads the real time clock and
  3923                                  ; resets the system time and date, and then irets.
  3924                                  
  3925                                  ; warning!!! this code will be dynamically relocated by msinit.
  3926                                  
  3927                                  	; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3928                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:183Eh
  3929                                  int_6Ch:
  3930 000013C9 0E                      		push	cs
  3931 000013CA 1F                      		pop	ds
  3932                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0  
  3933 000013CB 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0
  3934 000013D0 7405                    		jz      short int6c
  3935 000013D2 BB[9007]                		mov     bx, EnsureA20On
  3936 000013D5 FFD3                    		call    bx
  3937                                  int6c:					
  3938                                  		;push	cs
  3939                                  		;pop	ds
  3940 000013D7 8F06[B306]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr]	; pop off return address
  3941 000013DB 8F06[B506]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr+2]
  3942 000013DF 9D                      		popf
  3943 000013E0 E81300                  		call	read_real_date	; get the date from the clock
  3944 000013E3 FA                      		cli
  3945 000013E4 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si	; update dos copy of date
  3946 000013E8 FB                      		sti
  3947 000013E9 E8B900                  		call	read_real_time	; get the time from the	rtc
  3948 000013EC FA                      		cli
  3949 000013ED B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  3950 000013EF CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  3951                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  3952                                  					; Return: time of day set
  3953 000013F1 FB                      		sti
  3954                                  		;jmp	int6c_ret_addr	; long jump
  3955                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3956 000013F2 FF2E[B306]              		jmp	far [int6c_ret_addr] ; long jump
  3957                                  
  3958                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3959                                  
  3960                                  ;   read_real_date reads real-time clock for date and returns the number
  3961                                  ;   of days elapsed since 1-1-80 in si
  3962                                  
  3963                                  read_real_date:	; proc near		
  3964 000013F6 50                      		push	ax
  3965 000013F7 51                      		push	cx
  3966 000013F8 52                      		push	dx
  3967 000013F9 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; throw	away clock roll	over
  3968 000013FB CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  3969                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  3970                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  3971                                  					; midnight
  3972                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  3973 000013FD 5A                      		pop	dx
  3974 000013FE 59                      		pop	cx
  3975 000013FF 58                      		pop	ax
  3976 00001400 50                      		push	ax
  3977 00001401 53                      		push	bx
  3978 00001402 51                      		push	cx
  3979 00001403 52                      		push	dx
  3980                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 1
  3981                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3982                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:187Ah
  3983 00001404 C706[BB06]0100          		mov	word [daycnt2], 1
  3984                                  					; REAL TIME CLOCK ERROR	FLAG (+1 DAY)
  3985 0000140A B404                    		mov	ah, 4
  3986 0000140C CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ DATE FROM REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  3987                                  					; Return: DL = day in BCD
  3988                                  					; DH = month in	BCD
  3989                                  					; CL = year in BCD
  3990                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  3991 0000140E 7303                    		jnb	short read_ok
  3992 00001410 E98300                  		jmp	r_d_ret
  3993                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3994                                  
  3995                                  read_ok:
  3996 00001413 882E[B706]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch
  3997 00001417 880E[B806]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl
  3998 0000141B 8836[B906]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh
  3999 0000141F 8816[BA06]              		mov	[bin_date_time+3], dl
  4000                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 2 ; READ OF R-T CLOCK SUCCESSFUL
  4001                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4002                                  		;mov	byte [daycnt2], 2
  4003 00001423 FE06[BB06]              		inc	byte [daycnt2] ; 2
  4004 00001427 E83401                  		call	bcd_verify	; verify bcd values in range
  4005 0000142A 726A                    		jb	short r_d_ret	; some value out of range
  4006                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 3
  4007                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4008                                  		;mov	byte [daycnt2], 3
  4009 0000142C FE06[BB06]              		inc	byte [daycnt2] ; 3
  4010 00001430 E8DB00                  		call	date_verify
  4011 00001433 7261                    		jb	short r_d_ret
  4012                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 0
  4013                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4014 00001435 C606[BB06]00            		mov	byte [daycnt2], 0
  4015 0000143A E8A100                  		call	in_bin
  4016 0000143D A0[B806]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1]
  4017 00001440 98                      		cbw
  4018 00001441 803E[B706]14            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20 ; 20th century?
  4019 00001446 7503                    		jnz	short century_19 ; no
  4020 00001448 83C064                  		add	ax, 100		; add in a century
  4021                                  century_19:				
  4022 0000144B 83E850                  		sub	ax, 80		; subtract off 1-1-80
  4023 0000144E B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; leap year every 4
  4024 00001450 F6F1                    		div	cl		; al= #	leap year blocks, ah= remainder
  4025 00001452 88E3                    		mov	bl, ah		; save odd years
  4026 00001454 98                      		cbw			; zero ah
  4027 00001455 B9B505                  		mov	cx, 1461	; 366+(3*365)
  4028                                  					; # of days in leap year blocks
  4029 00001458 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4030                                  		;mov	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; SAVE COUNT OF DAYS
  4031                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4032 0000145A A3[BB06]                		mov	[daycnt2], ax
  4033 0000145D 88D8                    		mov	al, bl		; get odd years	count
  4034 0000145F 98                      		cbw
  4035 00001460 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  4036 00001462 740B                    		jz	short leap_year
  4037 00001464 B96D01                  		mov	cx, 365		; days in year
  4038 00001467 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4039                                  		;add	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; ADD ON DAYS IN ODD YEARS
  4040                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4041 00001469 0106[BB06]              		add	[daycnt2], ax
  4042 0000146D EB07                    		jmp	short leap_adjustment ;	account	for leap year
  4043                                  					; possibly account for a leap day
  4044                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4045                                  
  4046                                  leap_year:
  4047 0000146F 803E[B906]02            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 2 ; is	month february?
  4048 00001474 7604                    		jbe	short no_leap_adjustment ; jan or feb. no leap day yet.
  4049                                  leap_adjustment:
  4050                                  		;inc	word [cs:daycnt2] ; account for leap day
  4051                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4052 00001476 FF06[BB06]              		inc	word [daycnt2]
  4053                                  no_leap_adjustment:			
  4054 0000147A 8A0E[BA06]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+3] ; get days of month
  4055 0000147E 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  4056 00001480 49                      		dec	cx		; because of offset from day 1,	not day	0
  4057                                  		;add	[cs:daycnt2], cx ; GET DAYS IN MONTHS PRECEEDING
  4058                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4059 00001481 010E[BB06]              		add	[daycnt2], cx
  4060 00001485 8A0E[B906]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+2] ; get month
  4061                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4062                                  		;xor	ch, ch
  4063 00001489 49                      		dec	cx		; january starts at offset 0
  4064                                  		
  4065                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4066                                  		;shl	cx, 1		; word offset
  4067                                  		;;mov	si, month_table
  4068                                  		;add	si, cx
  4069                                  		;; 16/10/2022
  4070                                  		;; ds must be same with cs here, if so..
  4071                                  		;; what for cs: prefixes are used !?)
  4072                                  		;; mov	ax, [cs:si]
  4073                                  		;; mov	ax, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - BIOSDATA:15D5h)
  4074                                  		;mov	ax, [si]	; mov ax, [cs:si]
  4075                                  		;			; get #	days in	previous months
  4076                                  		;add	[cs:daycnt2], ax

  4079                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:1907h

  4082                                  r_d_sum_loop:

  4091 0000149B 59                      		pop	cx
  4092 0000149C 5B                      		pop	bx
  4093 0000149D 58                      		pop	ax
  4094 0000149E C3                      		retn
  4095                                  
  4096                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4097                                  
  4098                                  r_t_retj:				
  4099 0000149F 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  4100 000014A1 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  4101 000014A3 EB38                    		jmp	short r_t_ret
  4102                                  
  4103                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4104                                  
  4105                                  ; read_real_time reads the time from the rtc. on exit, it has the number of
  4106                                  ; ticks (at 18.2 ticks per sec.) in cx:dx.
  4107                                  
  4108                                  read_real_time:	; proc near		
  4109 000014A5 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  4110 000014A7 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4111                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  4112                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  4113                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  4114 000014A9 72F4                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4115 000014AB 882E[B706]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch ; hours
  4116 000014AF 880E[B806]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl ; minutes
  4117 000014B3 8836[B906]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh ; seconds
  4118 000014B7 C606[BA06]00            		mov	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; unused for time
  4119 000014BC E89F00                  		call	bcd_verify
  4120 000014BF 72DE                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4121 000014C1 E88500                  		call	time_verify
  4122 000014C4 72D9                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4123 000014C6 E81500                  		call	in_bin		; from bcd to bin
  4124 000014C9 8A2E[B706]              		mov	ch, [bin_date_time]
  4125 000014CD 8A0E[B806]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+1]
  4126 000014D1 8A36[B906]              		mov	dh, [bin_date_time+2]
  4127 000014D5 8A16[BA06]              		mov	dl, [bin_date_time+3]
  4128                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4129                                  		; 17/09/2022
  4130                                  		; 31/05/2019
  4131 000014D9 FF1E[C106]              		call	far [ttticks] 
  4132                                  		;call	dword ptr ttticks ; note: indirect far call
  4133                                  					; cx:dx	= number of ticks
  4134                                  					; (at 18.2 ticks per sec.)
  4135                                  r_t_ret:				
  4136 000014DD C3                      		retn
  4137                                  
  4138                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4139                                  
  4140                                  ;   in_bin converts bin_date_time values from bcd to bin
  4141                                  
  4142                                  in_bin:		; proc near
  4143 000014DE A0[B706]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time] ; century or hours
  4144 000014E1 E81F00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4145 000014E4 A2[B706]                		mov	[bin_date_time], al
  4146 000014E7 A0[B806]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1] ; years or minutes
  4147 000014EA E81600                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4148 000014ED A2[B806]                		mov	[bin_date_time+1], al
  4149 000014F0 A0[B906]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+2] ; months or seconds
  4150 000014F3 E80D00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4151 000014F6 A2[B906]                		mov	[bin_date_time+2], al
  4152 000014F9 A0[BA06]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+3] ; days (not used for time)
  4153 000014FC E80400                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4154 000014FF A2[BA06]                		mov	[bin_date_time+3], al
  4155 00001502 C3                      		retn
  4156                                  
  4157                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4158                                  
  4159                                  ;   bcd_to_bin converts two bcd nibbles in al (value <= 99.) to
  4160                                  ;   a binary representation in al
  4161                                  ;   ah is destroyed
  4162                                  
  4163                                  bcd_to_bin:	; proc near
  4164 00001503 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4165 00001505 240F                    		and	al, 0Fh
  4166 00001507 B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  4167 00001509 D2EC                    		shr	ah, cl
  4168 0000150B D50A                    		aad
  4169 0000150D C3                      		retn
  4170                                  
  4171                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4172                                  
  4173                                  ;   date_verify loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4174                                  ;   in bin_date_time
  4175                                  
  4176                                  date_verify:	; proc near
  4177 0000150E 803E[B706]20            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20h ; century check
  4178 00001513 7732                    		ja	short date_error
  4179 00001515 740E                    		jz	short century_20 ; jmp in 21th century
  4180 00001517 803E[B706]19            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 19h ; century check
  4181                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4182                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4183 0000151C 722A                    		jb	short date_err2
  4184 0000151E 803E[B806]80            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 80h ; year check
  4185                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4186                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4187 00001523 7223                    		jb	short date_err2
  4188                                  century_20:
  4189 00001525 803E[B806]99            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 99h ; year check
  4190 0000152A 771B                    		ja	short date_error
  4191 0000152C 803E[B906]12            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 12h ; month check
  4192 00001531 7714                    		ja	short date_error
  4193 00001533 803E[B906]00            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 0
  4194                                  		;jbe	short date_error
  4195 00001538 760D                    		jna	short date_error
  4196 0000153A 803E[BA06]31            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 31h ; day check
  4197 0000153F 7706                    		ja	short date_error
  4198                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; day check
  4199                                  		;;jbe	short date_error
  4200                                  		;jna	short date_error
  4201                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4202                                  		; cf=0
  4203                                  		;clc
  4204                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4205 00001541 803E[BA06]01            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 1 ; day check
  4206 00001546 C3                      		retn
  4207                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4208                                  
  4209                                  date_error:
  4210 00001547 F9                      		stc
  4211                                  date_err2:
  4212 00001548 C3                      		retn
  4213                                  
  4214                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4215                                  
  4216                                  ; time_verify very loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4217                                  ; in bin_date_time
  4218                                  
  4219                                  time_verify:	; proc near
  4220 00001549 803E[B706]24            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 24h ; hour check
  4221 0000154E 770C                    		ja	short time_error
  4222 00001550 803E[B806]59            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 59h ; minute check
  4223 00001555 7705                    		ja	short time_error
  4224                                  		; 12/12/2022h
  4225                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 59h ; second check
  4226                                  		;ja	short time_error
  4227                                  		;clc
  4228                                  		;retn
  4229                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4230 00001557 803E[B906]5A            		cmp	byte  [bin_date_time+2], 5Ah	
  4231                                  time_error:
  4232                                  bv_error:
  4233 0000155C F5                      		cmc	; cf=0 -> cf=1, cf=1 -> cf=0
  4234 0000155D C3                      		retn
  4235                                  
  4236                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4237                                  
  4238                                  ;time_error:				
  4239                                  		;stc
  4240                                  		;retn
  4241                                  
  4242                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4243                                  
  4244                                  ;   bcd_verify checks values in bin_date_time to be valid
  4245                                  ;   bcd numerals.  carry set if any nibble out of range
  4246                                  
  4247                                  bcd_verify:	; proc near
  4248 0000155E B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes to check
  4249 00001561 BB[B706]                		mov	bx, bin_date_time
  4250                                  bv_loop:
  4251 00001564 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; get a	bcd number (0..99)
  4252 00001566 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4253 00001568 250FF0                  		and	ax, 0F00Fh	; 10's place in high ah, 1's in al
  4254                                  					; is 1's place in range?
  4255 0000156B 3C0A                    		cmp	al, 10
  4256 0000156D 77ED                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4257 0000156F D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4258 00001571 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4259 00001573 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4260 00001575 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4261 00001577 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh		; get rid of any erroneous bits
  4262 0000157A 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 10		; is 10's place in range
  4263 0000157D 77DD                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4264 0000157F 43                      		inc	bx		; next byte
  4265 00001580 49                      		dec	cx
  4266 00001581 75E1                    		jnz	short bv_loop
  4267 00001583 F8                      		clc			; set success flag
  4268 00001584 C3                      		retn
  4269                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4270                                  
  4271                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4272                                  ;bv_error:
  4273                                  		;stc			; set error flag
  4274                                  		;retn
  4275                                  
  4276                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4277

  4281                                  
  4282                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4283                                  ;									:
  4284                                  ;	System initialization						:
  4285                                  ;									:
  4286                                  ;	The entry conditions are established by the bootstrap		:
  4287                                  ;	loader and are considered unknown. The following jobs		:
  4288                                  ;	will be performed by this module:				:
  4289                                  ;									:
  4290                                  ;	1.	All device initialization is performed			:
  4291                                  ;	2.	A local stack is set up and DS:SI are set		:
  4292                                  ;		to point to an initialization table. Then		:
  4293                                  ;		an inter-segment call is made to the first		:
  4294                                  ;		byte of the dos 					:
  4295                                  ;	3.	Once the dos returns from this call the ds		:
  4296                                  ;		register has been set up to point to the start		:
  4297                                  ;		of free memory. The initialization will then		:
  4298                                  ;		load the command program into this area 		:
  4299                                  ;		beginning at 100 hex and transfer control to		:
  4300                                  ;		this program.						:
  4301                                  ;									:
  4302                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4303                                  
  4304                                  ; 01/10/2022
  4305                                  ; 08/01/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  4306
