  6902 00001E59 81C3FF01                		add	bx, 511		; bx +=	511 + bx/2

  6911                                  dobig:					
  6912 00001E64 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 (2^4) directory entries per sector
  6913 00001E66 52                      		push	dx		; save total sectors (high)
  6914 00001E67 8B550C                  		mov	dx, [di+0Ch]	; [di+BDS.direntries]
  6915 00001E6A D3EA                    		shr	dx, cl		; root dir sectors = BDS.direntries / 16;
  6916 00001E6C 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx
  6917 00001E6E 5A                      		pop	dx
  6918 00001E6F 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax	= total	sectors	- root dir sectors
  6919 00001E72 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1
  6920 00001E75 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax	= t - r	- d
  6921                                  					; total	secs - reserved	secs - root dir	secs
  6922 00001E78 B302                    		mov	bl, 2
  6923 00001E7A 8A7D08                  		mov	bh, [di+8]	; [di+BDS.secperclus]
  6924                                  					; bx = 256 * BDS.secperclus + 2
  6925                                  
  6926                                  ; I don't understand why to add bx here!!!
  6927                                  
  6928                                  		; 29/12/2018 - Erdogan Tan (Retro DOS v4.0)
  6929                                  		; 27/09/2022
  6930                                  		; (Microsoft FAT32 File	System Specification,
  6931                                  		; December 2000, Page 21)
  6932                                  		; TmpVal1 = DskSize - (BPB_ResvdSecCnt+RootrDirSectors)
  6933                                  		; TmpVal2 = (256*BPB_SecPerClus)+BPB_NumFATs
  6934                                  		; 8/8/2023 (Retro DOS v5.0)
  6935                                  		; If(FATType == FAT32)
  6936                                  		;   TmpVal2 = TmpVal2 / 2;
  6937                                  		; FATsz	= (TmpVal1+(TmpVal2-1))/TmpVal2
  6938                                  		; 8/8/2023 (Retro DOS v5.0)
  6939                                  		; If(FATType == FAT32) {
  6940                                  		;   BPB_FATSz16 = 0;
  6941                                  		;   BPB_FATSz32 = FATSz;
  6942                                  		;} else {
  6943                                  		;   BPB_FATSz16 = LOWORD(FATSz);
  6944                                  		;/* there is no BPB_FATSz32 in a FAT16 BPB */
  6945                                  		;}
  6946                                  					; dx:ax = TmpVal1, bx = TmpVal2
  6947 00001E7D 01D8                    		add	ax, bx		; 
  6948 00001E7F 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; dx:ax = TmpVal1+TmpVal2
  6949 00001E82 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1		
  6950 00001E85 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax = TmpVal1+TmpVal2-1
  6951                                  
  6952                                  ; assuming dx in the table will never be bigger than bx.
  6953                                  
  6954 00001E88 F7F3                    		div	bx		; BDS.fatsecs =
  6955                                  					; ceil((total-dir-res)/(256*BDS.secperclus+2))
  6956 00001E8A 894511                  		mov	[di+11h], ax	; [di+BDS.fatsecs]
  6957                                  					; number of fat	sectors
  6958                                  
  6959                                  ; now, set the default filesys_id, volume label, serial number
  6960                                  
  6961                                  		; 05/08/2023
  6962                                  		; [di+1Fh] = [fbigfat]
  6963                                  		;
  6964                                  		;;mov	bl, ds:fbigfat
  6965                                  		;; 17/10/2022

  6993                                  ; set according to the partition information. we are going to
  6994                                  ; see if (hidden sectors + total sectors) > a word. if it is true,
  6995                                  ; then no change. otherwise, BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be moved
  6996                                  ; to BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS and BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be set to 0.

  7247                                  		;mov	si, [bx+si]	; get address of bpb
  7248                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7249                                  		;mov	si, [BPBTABLE+bx]
  7250                                  		; 13/12/2022
  7251                                  		;mov	si, [SYSINITOFFSET+bpbtable+bx] ; wrong ! 14/08/2023
  7252                                  		; 14/08/2023
  7253                                  		SYSINIT_OFFSET equ (SYSINITSEG-DOSBIODATASEG<<4)
  7254                                  							; correct offset
  7255 00001F9D 8BB7[3C87]              		mov	si, [bx+SYSINIT_OFFSET+bpbtable]
  7256                                  		
  7257                                  		; 28/08/2023
  7258 00001FA1 81C6503D                		add	si, SYSINIT_OFFSET
  7259                                  set_recbpb:					
  7260 00001FA5 8D7D27                  		lea	di, [di+27h]	; [di+BDS.R_BPB]
  7261                                  					; es:di	-> recbpb
  7262 00001FA8 B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; bpbx.size
  7263 00001FAB F3A4                    		rep movsb		; move (size bpbx) bytes	
  7264                                  go_to_next_bds:				
  7265 00001FAD 5F                      		pop	di
  7266 00001FAE 07                      		pop	es		; restore pointer to bds
  7267 00001FAF 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
  7268 00001FB2 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; -1
  7269 00001FB5 740A                    		jz	short got_end_of_bds_chain
  7270 00001FB7 E94DFF                  		jmp	_next_bds
  7271                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7272                                  
  7273                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7274                                  ;got_end_of_bds_chain:			
  7275                                  		;retn
  7276                                  
  7277                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7278                                  
  7279                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7280                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7281                                  
  7282                                  ; al = device number
  7283                                  
  7284                                  print_init:	
  7285 00001FBA 98                      		cbw
  7286 00001FBB 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7287 00001FBD B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  7288 00001FBF CD17                    		int	17h		; PRINTER - INITIALIZE
  7289                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  7290                                  					; Return: AH = status
  7291                                  got_end_of_bds_chain:	; 18/12/2022
  7292 00001FC1 C3                      		retn
  7293

  7295

  7302                                  					; 2400,n,1,8 (msequ.inc)
  7303                                  		;mov	ah, 0
  7304                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7305 00001FC5 B8A300                  		mov	ax, 00A3h
  7306 00001FC8 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - INITIALIZE USART
  7307                                  					; 	AL = initializing parameters,
  7308                                  					;	DX = port number (0-3)
  7309                                  					; Return: AH = RS-232 status code bits,
  7310                                  					;	  AL = modem status bits
  7311 00001FCA C3                      		retn

  7314                                  
  7315                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7316                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7317                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7318                                  ; (19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0)
  7319                                  
  7320                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  7321                                  ;
  7322                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  7323                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  7324                                  ;
  7325                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  7326                                  ;
  7327                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  7328                                  ;   initialize it.
  7329                                  ;
  7330                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  7331                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  7332                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  7333                                  ;
  7334                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  7335                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  7336                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  7337                                  ;
  7338                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  7339                                  ;   save coding.
  7340                                  ;
  7341                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  7342                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  7343                                  ;
  7344                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  7345                                  ;
  7346                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  7347                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  7348                                  ;
  7349                                  ; called modules:
  7350                                  ;		  getboot
  7351                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7352                                  ;
  7353                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  7354                                  ;
  7355                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  7356                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  7357                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7358                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  7359                                  ;
  7360                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7361                                  
  7362                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7363                                  domini:	
  7364 00001FCB 8A36[0D16]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  7365                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7366 00001FCF 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  7367                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  7368 00001FD1 7430                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  7369 00001FD3 B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  7370                                  domini_loop:				
  7371 00001FD5 52                      		push	dx
  7372 00001FD6 8816[0C16]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  7373 00001FDA B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7374 00001FDC CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7375                                  					; DL = drive number
  7376                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7377                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7378                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7379                                  		
  7380                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7381                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2B36h
  7382                                  		;inc	dh
  7383                                  		;xor	ax, ax
  7384                                  		;mov	al, dh
  7385 00001FDE 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  7386 00001FE0 88F0                    		mov	al, dh	; <= 255
  7387 00001FE2 40                      		inc	ax	; (0FFh -> 100h)
  7388 00001FE3 A3[1216]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  7389                                  		;and	cl, 3Fh
  7390                                  		;mov	al, cl
  7391                                  		; 08/08/2023
  7392 00001FE6 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  7393 00001FE8 83E03F                  		and	ax, 3Fh
  7394 00001FEB A3[1416]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  7395 00001FEE 06                      		push	es
  7396 00001FEF 8A16[0C16]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7397 00001FF3 E882FB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  7398                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  7399 00001FF6 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  7400 00001FF8 E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  7401                                  domininext:				
  7402 00001FFB 07                      		pop	es
  7403 00001FFC 5A                      		pop	dx
  7404 00001FFD FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  7405 00001FFF FECE                    		dec	dh
  7406 00002001 75D2                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  7407                                  dominiret:				
  7408 00002003 C3                      		retn
  7409                                  
  7410                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7411                                  
  7412                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7413                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7414                                  
  7415                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7416                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7417                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7418                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7419                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7420                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7421                                  ;
  7422                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7423                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7424                                  
  7425                                  
  7426                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7427 00002004 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7428                                  fmpnext:				
  7429 00002008 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7430 0000200C 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7431 0000200E 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7432 00002011 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7433 00002015 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7434                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7435                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7436                                  fmpnextfound:
  7437 00002017 C3                      		retn
  7438                                  
  7439                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7440                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7441                                  ;fmpret:
  7442                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7443                                  
  7444                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7445                                  
  7446                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7447                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  7448 00002018 E8A500                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7449 0000201B 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7450 0000201D 8B3E[1016]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free	bds
  7451 00002021 C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7452                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7453 00002026 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7454                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7455                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7456 0000202A C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7457                                  					; ffHardFile
  7458 0000202E C606[8E15]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7459 00002033 A1[1216]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7460 00002036 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7461 00002039 A1[1416]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7462 0000203C 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7463 0000203F A0[0C16]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7464 00002042 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7465                                  					; set physical number
  7466 00002045 A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7467 00002048 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7468                                  					; set logical number
  7469 0000204B 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7470 00002050 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7471 00002052 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7472                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7473 00002057 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7474                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7475                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7476 00002059 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7477 0000205C 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7478 00002060 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7479 00002063 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7480 00002065 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7481 00002067 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7482 0000206B 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7483                                  					; set hidden trks
  7484 0000206E 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7485 00002072 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7486 00002076 8A16[0C16]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7487 0000207A BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7488 0000207D B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7489 00002080 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7490                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7491                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7492                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7493 00002082 7293                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7494 00002084 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7495                                  
  7496                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7497                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2C7Ch
  7498 00002087 26817F3C55AA            		cmp	word [es:bx+3Ch], 0AA55h ; 03C2h+03Ch = 3FEh
  7499 0000208D 7588                    		jne	short fmpnextfound ; not a valid boot sector !
  7500                                  
  7501                                  		; 13/08/2023
  7502                                  		;push	es
  7503 0000208F E80800                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7504                                  					; bx value saved.
  7505                                  		;pop	es  ; 13/08/2023
  7506 00002092 7203                    		jc	short fmpnextchain
  7507 00002094 E83E00                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7508                                  fmpnextchain:
  7509 00002097 E96EFF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7510                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7511                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7512                                  
  7513                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7514                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7515                                  		;retn
  7516                                  
  7517                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7518                                  
  7519                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7520                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
  7521                                  
  7522                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7523                                  	
  7524 0000209A 57                      		push	di
  7525 0000209B 53                      		push	bx
  7526                                  		; 12/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7527                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment
  7528                                  		;push	ds
  7529 0000209C 06                      		push	es
  7530                                  setmini_1:				
  7531 0000209D 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  7532 000020A1 741A                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7533 000020A3 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7534 000020A7 7414                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7535 000020A9 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG partition
  7536 000020AD 740E                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7537 000020AF 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7538 000020B2 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7539 000020B6 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7540 000020B8 F9                      		stc
  7541 000020B9 07                      		pop	es
  7542                                  		; 12/08/2023
  7543                                  		;pop	ds
  7544 000020BA 5B                      		pop	bx
  7545 000020BB 5F                      		pop	di
  7546 000020BC C3                      		retn
  7547                                  
  7548                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7549                                  setmini_2:
  7550 000020BD E964FB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  7551                                  
  7552                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7553                                  
  7554                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
  7555                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS) 
  7556                                  
  7557                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7558                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7559                                  ;
  7560                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7561                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7562                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7563                                  ;
  7564                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7565                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7566                                  ;			trash ax
  7567                                  
  7568                                  dmax_check:
  7569 000020C0 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7570 000020C5 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; return with carry if okay
  7571 000020C7 06                      		push	es
  7572                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7573 000020C8 B84504                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7574 000020CB 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  7575                                  		; 18/10/2022
  7576 000020CD 26C606[8303]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  7577                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7578                                  					; set message flag
  7579                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  7580 000020D3 07                      		pop	es
  7581                                  
  7582                                  		;;push	es
  7583                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  7584                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  7585                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7586                                  					; set message flag
  7587                                  		;;pop	es
  7588                                  		;
  7589                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7590                                  dmax_ok:
  7591 000020D4 C3                      		retn
  7592                                  
  7593                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7594                                  
  7595                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7596                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7597                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7598                                  ;								 
  7599                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7600                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7601                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7602                                  
  7603                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7604 000020D5 56                      		push	si
  7605 000020D6 53                      		push	bx
  7606 000020D7 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7607                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7608 000020DB 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7609 000020DE 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  7610                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7611 000020E0 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7612 000020E2 EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7613                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7614                                  
  7615                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7616                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7617 000020E4 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7618                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7619 000020E6 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7620                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7621 000020E9 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7622                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7623 000020ED 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7624                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7625                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7626 000020F0 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7627 000020F3 8B36[0E16]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7628 000020F7 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7629 000020F9 8306[0E16]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7630 000020FE FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7631 00002102 8306[1016]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7632 00002107 5B                      		pop	bx
  7633 00002108 5E                      		pop	si
  7634 00002109 C3                      		retn
  7635                                  
  7636                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7637                                  
  7638                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7639                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7640                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7641                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7642                                  
  7643                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7644 0000210A 50                      		push	ax
  7645 0000210B 51                      		push	cx
  7646 0000210C 52                      		push	dx
  7647 0000210D 55                      		push	bp
  7648 0000210E 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7649                                  loop_clock:				
  7650 00002110 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7651 00002112 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7652 00002114 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7653 00002116 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7654                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7655                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7656                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7657 00002118 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7658 0000211B 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7659 0000211D 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7660 00002120 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7661 00002122 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7662 00002125 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7663 00002127 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7664 00002128 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7665                                  delay:					
  7666 0000212B E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7667 0000212D EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7668                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7669                                  
  7670                                  clock_present:				
  7671 0000212F 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7672 00002135 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7673                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7674                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7675 00002138 56                      		push	si
  7676 00002139 E8BAF2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7677 0000213C FA                      		cli
  7678                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7679 0000213D 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7680 00002141 FB                      		sti
  7681 00002142 5E                      		pop	si
  7682                                  
  7683                                  no_readdate:				
  7684 00002143 5D                      		pop	bp
  7685 00002144 5A                      		pop	dx
  7686 00002145 59                      		pop	cx
  7687 00002146 58                      		pop	ax
  7688 00002147 C3                      		retn
  7689                                  
  7690                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7691                                  
  7692                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7693                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7694                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7695                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7696                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7697                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7698                                  ;
  7699                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7700                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7701                                  ;
  7702                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7703                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7704                                  ;
  7705                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7706                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7707                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7708                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7709                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7710                                  ;
  7711                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7712                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7713                                  
  7714                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7715                                  
  7716                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7717                                  
  7718                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7719                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7720                                  			
  7721 00002148 50                      		push	ax
  7722 00002149 2E803E[3606]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7723 0000214F 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7724 00002151 2E803E[3706]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7725                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7726 00002157 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  7727 00002159 2E803E[3706]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7728                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7729 0000215F 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  7730                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  7731                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7732                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  7733                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  7734                                  cmosck4:				
  7735 00002161 B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7736                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7737 00002163 B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7738                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7739 00002165 E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7740 00002168 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7741                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7742 0000216A E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7743 0000216D 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7744                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7745 0000216F 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7746 00002171 B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7747                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7748 00002173 E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7749                                  cmosck9:				
  7750 00002176 58                      		pop	ax
  7751 00002177 C3                      		retn
  7752                                  
  7753                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7754                                  
  7755                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7756                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7757                                  ;									       :
  7758                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7759                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7760                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7761                                  ;									       :
  7762                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7763                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7764                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7765                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7766                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7767                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7768                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7769                                  
  7770                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7771 00002178 9C                      		pushf
  7772 00002179 FA                      		cli
  7773 0000217A 53                      		push	bx
  7774 0000217B 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7775 0000217C 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7776 0000217E E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7777                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7778 00002180 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7779 00002181 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7780 00002183 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7781 00002185 58                      		pop	ax
  7782 00002186 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7783 00002188 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7784 0000218A E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7785                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7786 0000218C 90                      		nop
  7787 0000218D E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7788 0000218F 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7789 00002191 5B                      		pop	bx
  7790 00002192 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7791 00002193 E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7792 00002196 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7793                                  
  7794                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7795                                  
  7796                                  cmos_popf:				
  7797 00002197 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7798                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7799                                  
  7800                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7801                                  
  7802                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7803                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7804                                  ;									       :
  7805                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7806                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7807                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7808                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7809                                  ;									       :
  7810                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7811                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7812                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7813                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7814                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7815                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7816                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7817                                  
  7818                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  7819 00002198 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  7820 00002199 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7821 0000219A FA                      		cli
  7822 0000219B 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7823 0000219C 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7824 0000219E E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7825                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7826 000021A0 90                      		nop
  7827 000021A1 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7828 000021A3 E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7829 000021A5 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7830 000021A6 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7831 000021A8 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7832 000021AA E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7833                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7834 000021AC 90                      		nop
  7835 000021AD E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7836 000021AF 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7837 000021B0 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7838 000021B1 E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7839 000021B4 C3                      		retn
  7840                                  
  7841                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7842                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7843                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7844                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7845                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7846                                  
  7847                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7848                                  ;
  7849                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7850                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7851                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7852                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7853                                  
  7854                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7855                                  
  7856                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7857                                  ;
  7858                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7859                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7860                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7861                                  
  7862                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7863                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7864                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7865                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7866                                  
  7867                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7868                                  getclus:				
  7869 000021B5 51                      		push	cx
  7870 000021B6 57                      		push	di
  7871 000021B7 2E890E[8C15]            		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7872 000021BC 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7873 000021BE 48                      		dec	ax
  7874 000021BF 48                      		dec	ax
  7875 000021C0 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7876                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7877                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7878 000021C2 2E0306[8815]            		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7879 000021C7 2E1316[8A15]            		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7880                                  unpack:					
  7881 000021CC 1E                      		push	ds
  7882 000021CD 50                      		push	ax
  7883 000021CE 53                      		push	bx
  7884 000021CF 2E8B36[8F15]            		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7885 000021D4 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  7886 000021D6 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7887 000021D8 2EF606[8E15]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7888                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7889 000021DE 753C                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7890 000021E0 D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7891                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7892 000021E2 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  7893                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7894 000021E4 52                      		push	dx
  7895 000021E5 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7896 000021E7 E87C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7897 000021EA 5A                      		pop	dx
  7898 000021EB 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7899 000021ED 7517                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7900                                  		; 25/06/2023
  7901                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7902 000021EF 2EA2[9615]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7903 000021F3 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7904 000021F4 52                      		push	dx
  7905 000021F5 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7906 000021F7 E86C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7907 000021FA 5A                      		pop	dx
  7908                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7909 000021FB A00000                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7910 000021FE 2EA2[9715]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7911 00002202 2EA1[9615]              		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7912                                  even_odd:				
  7913 00002206 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7914 00002207 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7915 00002208 D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7916 0000220A 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7917 0000220C D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7918                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7919 0000220E D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7920 00002210 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7921 00002212 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7922                                  havclus:				
  7923 00002214 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7924 00002216 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7925 0000221A EB0E                    		jmp	short unpackx
  7926                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7927                                  
  7928                                  unpack16:				
  7929 0000221C 52                      		push	dx
  7930 0000221D 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7931 0000221F D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7932 00002221 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  7933 00002224 E83F00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7934 00002227 5A                      		pop	dx
  7935 00002228 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7936                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7937                                  unpackx:				
  7938 0000222A 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7939 0000222B 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7940 0000222C 1F                      		pop	ds
  7941 0000222D 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  7942 0000222F 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7943 00002232 7507                    		jnz	short getcl2
  7944 00002234 2E010E[8C15]            		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7945 00002239 EB91                    		jmp	short unpack
  7946                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7947                                  
  7948                                  getcl2:					
  7949 0000223B 53                      		push	bx
  7950 0000223C 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7951 0000223D 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7952 0000223E 2EA1[8615]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7953 00002242 2E8B0E[8C15]            		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7954 00002247 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7955 00002248 2E8F06[2305]            		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7956                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7957 0000224D 1E                      		push	ds
  7958 0000224E 0E                      		push	cs
  7959 0000224F 1F                      		pop	ds
  7960 00002250 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7961                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7962 00002251 BD[6109]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7963                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7964                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7965 00002254 E8CAF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7966 00002257 1F                      		pop	ds
  7967 00002258 5B                      		pop	bx
  7968 00002259 5F                      		pop	di
  7969 0000225A 2EA1[8C15]              		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7970 0000225E 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7971 00002260 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7972 00002262 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7973 00002264 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7974 00002265 C3                      		retn
  7975                                  
  7976                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7977                                  
  7978                                  
  7979                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7980                                  ;
  7981                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7982                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7983                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7984                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7985                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7986                                  ;
  7987                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7988                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7989                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7990                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7991                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7992                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7993                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7994                                  
  7995                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7996                                  get_fat_sector:	
  7997 00002266 50                      		push	ax
  7998 00002267 51                      		push	cx
  7999 00002268 57                      		push	di
  8000 00002269 56                      		push	si
  8001 0000226A 06                      		push	es
  8002 0000226B 1E                      		push	ds
  8003 0000226C 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  8004 0000226E 2E8B0E[9415]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8005 00002273 F7F1                    		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  8006 00002275 90                      		nop
  8007                                  
  8008                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  8009                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  8010                                  
  8011 00002276 06                      		push	es
  8012 00002277 1E                      		push	ds
  8013 00002278 57                      		push	di
  8014 00002279 50                      		push	ax
  8015 0000227A 0E                      		push	cs
  8016 0000227B 1F                      		pop	ds
  8017                                  
  8018 0000227C 2EA1[8615]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  8019 00002280 BD[7005]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  8020                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  8021                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  8022 00002283 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8023 00002284 E89AF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  8024 00002287 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  8025 00002288 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  8026                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  8027 0000228C 5F                      		pop	di
  8028 0000228D 1F                      		pop	ds
  8029 0000228E 07                      		pop	es
  8030 0000228F 2E3B06[9815]            		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  8031 00002294 742A                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  8032 00002296 2EA3[9815]              		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  8033                                  					; sector number
  8034                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  8035 0000229A 52                      		push	dx
  8036 0000229B 2EC706[2305]0000        		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  8037                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  8038                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  8039 000022A2 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  8040 000022A4 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  8041 000022A7 2EA1[8615]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  8042 000022AB 1E                      		push	ds
  8043 000022AC 07                      		pop	es
  8044 000022AD 31FF                    		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  8045 000022AF 1E                      		push	ds
  8046 000022B0 0E                      		push	cs
  8047 000022B1 1F                      		pop	ds
  8048 000022B2 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8049 000022B3 BD[6109]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  8050                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  8051                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  8052 000022B6 E868F3                  		call	call_bios_code
  8053 000022B9 1F                      		pop	ds
  8054 000022BA 5A                      		pop	dx
  8055 000022BB 2E8B0E[9415]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8056                                  
  8057                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  8058 000022C0 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  8059 000022C1 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  8060                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  8061                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  8062 000022C3 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  8063 000022C5 1F                      		pop	ds
  8064 000022C6 07                      		pop	es
  8065 000022C7 5E                      		pop	si
  8066 000022C8 5F                      		pop	di
  8067 000022C9 59                      		pop	cx
  8068 000022CA 58                      		pop	ax
  8069 000022CB C3                      		retn
  8070                                  
  8071                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8072                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  8073                                  
  8074                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8075                                  
  8076                                  		; 09/12/2022
  8077                                  		;db 0
  8078                                  
  8079                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
  8080                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  8081                                  
  8082                                  %if numbertomod>0 & numbertomod<16
  8083 000022CC 00<rep 4h>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  8084                                  %endif
  8085                                  
  8086                                  ;align 16
  8087                                  
  8088                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8089                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  8090                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  8091                                  
  8092                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS data segment --------------------------------------------
  8093                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8094                                  		;db 4 dup(0)
