  8099                                  ;============================================================================
  8100                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
  8101                                  ;============================================================================
  8102                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8103                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
  8104                                  
  8105                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0 
  8106                                  
  8107                                  ; 30/12/2022
  8108                                  ; (BIOSCODE SEGMENT is 2CCh for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)  -- ((25C0h+700h)>>4) --
  8109                                  
  8110                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  8111                                   
  8112                                  ; 02/10/2022
  8113                                  
  8114                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  8115                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8116                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8117                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8118                                  
  8119                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  8120 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  8121 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  8122                                  
  8123                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8124                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  8125                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8126                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  8127                                  
  8128                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8129                                  
  8130                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  8131                                  
  8132                                  ;************************************************************************
  8133                                  ;*									*
  8134                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  8135                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  8136                                  ;*									*
  8137                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  8138                                  ;*									*
  8139                                  ;************************************************************************
  8140                                  
  8141                                  	; 10/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  8142                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0032h 
  8143                                  
  8144                                  _seg_reinit:
  8145 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  8146                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  8147                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  8148 00000037 BF[BF06]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  8149                                  		;mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  8150                                  		; 10/08/2023
  8151 0000003A B90300                  		mov	cx, 3 ; (PCDOS 7.1)
  8152                                  _seg_reinit_1:
  8153 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  8154 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  8155 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  8156 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  8157                                  		; 10/08/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
  8158                                  		; (direct jump to i2f_handler from BIOSDATA:bios_i2f)
  8159                                  		; (instead of 'bcode_i2f: dw i2f_handler, IOSYSCODESEG')
  8160 00000042 26A3[0800]              		mov     [es:bios_i2f_seg], ax ; actual BIOSCODE segment
  8161 00000046 CB                      		retf
  8162                                  
  8163                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8164                                  
  8165                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8166                                  
  8167                                  ;************************************************************************
  8168                                  ;*									*
  8169                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  8170                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  8171                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  8172                                  ;*									*
  8173                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  8174                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  8175                                  ;*									*
  8176                                  ;************************************************************************
  8177                                  
  8178                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  8179 00000047 56                      		push	si
  8180 00000048 50                      		push	ax
  8181 00000049 51                      		push	cx
  8182 0000004A 52                      		push	dx
  8183 0000004B 57                      		push	di
  8184 0000004C 55                      		push	bp
  8185 0000004D 1E                      		push	ds
  8186 0000004E 06                      		push	es
  8187 0000004F 53                      		push	bx
  8188 00000050 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  8189 00000052 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  8190                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  8191                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8192 00000055 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8193 0000005A 8B4402                  		mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  8194 0000005D A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  8195 00000060 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  8196 00000064 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  8197 00000066 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  8198 0000006A 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  8199 0000006E 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  8200 00000072 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  8201 00000076 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  8202                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8203 0000007A 81FE[3B05]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  8204                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  8205                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  8206 0000007E 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8207                                  
  8208                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  8209                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  8210                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  8211                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  8212                                  ;
  8213                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  8214                                  ;
  8215                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  8216                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  8217                                  ;	  it has been used.
  8218                                  ;
  8219                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  8220                                  
  8221                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  8222 00000080 C706[2305]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  8223 00000086 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  8224 00000089 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8225 0000008B 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  8226                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  8227                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  8228 0000008F 8916[2305]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  8229 00000093 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  8230                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  8231                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  8232 00000097 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8233 00000098 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  8234 0000009C 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, cs:[si]
  8235 0000009F 732C                    		jnb	short command_error
  8236 000000A1 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  8237 000000A2 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  8238 000000A4 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  8239 000000A6 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8240 000000A7 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  8241 000000AB FC                      		cld
  8242                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8243 000000AC 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  8244                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  8245 000000B0 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  8246 000000B2 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8247                                  already_got_ah_status:
  8248                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022			
  8249                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8250                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  8251 000000B4 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8252                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8253 000000B9 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  8254 000000BD 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  8255                                  					; mark operation complete
  8256 000000C0 5B                      		pop	bx
  8257 000000C1 07                      		pop	es
  8258 000000C2 1F                      		pop	ds
  8259 000000C3 5D                      		pop	bp
  8260 000000C4 5F                      		pop	di
  8261 000000C5 5A                      		pop	dx
  8262 000000C6 59                      		pop	cx
  8263 000000C7 58                      		pop	ax
  8264 000000C8 5E                      		pop	si
  8265 000000C9 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  8266                                  	
  8267                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  8268                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  8269                                  bc_retf:
  8270 000000CC CB                      		retf
  8271                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8272                                  
  8273                                  command_error:				
  8274 000000CD E80900                  		call	bc_cmderr
  8275 000000D0 EBE2                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  8276                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8277                                  ; 01/05/2019
  8278                                  
  8279                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8280                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  8281                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  8282                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  8283                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  8284                                  ; high.
  8285                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8286                                  
  8287                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  8288                                  
  8289                                  		; 15/10/2022
  8290                                  
  8291 000000D2 0000                    		dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  8292                                  
  8293 000000D4 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  8294                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  8295                                  		
  8296                                  
  8297                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8298                                  
  8299                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  8300                                  
  8301                                  bc_cmderr:				
  8302 000000D9 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8303                                  					; unknown command error
  8304                                  
  8305                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8306                                  
  8307                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  8308                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  8309                                  
  8310                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  8311                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  8312                                  
  8313                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  8314                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8315                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8316 000000DB C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8317 000000DF 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  8318                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  8319 000000E3 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  8320 000000E5 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  8321 000000E6 C3                      		retn
  8322                                  
  8323                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8324                                  
  8325                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  8326                                  
  8327                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8328                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  8329                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8330                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8331                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8332                                  
  8333                                  ; 30/04/2019
  8334                                  
  8335                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  8336                                  
  8337                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  8338                                  
  8339                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  8340                                  
  8341                                  ;************************************************************************
  8342                                  ;*									*
  8343                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8344                                  ;*									*
  8345                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8346                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8347                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8348                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8349                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8350                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8351                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8352                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8353                                  ;*									*
  8354                                  ;************************************************************************
  8355                                  
  8356                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8357                                  		;db 0
  8358                                  
  8359                                  		; 13/12/202
  8360 000000E7 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8361                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8362 000000E8 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8363                                  					; 00 init
  8364 000000EA [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8365 000000EC [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8366 000000EE [D900]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8367                                  					; 03
  8368 000000F0 [5F01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8369                                  					; 04
  8370 000000F2 [A201]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8371                                  					; 05
  8372 000000F4 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8373 000000F6 [0B02]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8374                                  					; 07
  8375 000000F8 [FF01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8376                                  					; 08
  8377 000000FA [FF01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8378 000000FC [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8379                                  con_table_end:
  8380 000000FE 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8381                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8382 000000FF [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8383 00000101 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8384 00000103 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8385 00000105 [D900]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8386 00000107 [1C02]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8387                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8388 00000109 [CA01]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8389                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8390 0000010B [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8391 0000010D [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8392 0000010F [2102]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8393 00000111 [2102]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8394 00000113 [5202]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8395 00000115 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8396 00000117 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8397 00000119 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8398 0000011B [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8399 0000011D [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8400 0000011F [8C02]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8401 00000121 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8402 00000123 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8403 00000125 [BA02]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8404 00000127 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8405 00000129 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8406 0000012B [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8407 0000012D [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8408 0000012F [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8409 00000131 [EF02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8410                                  prn_table_end:
  8411 00000133 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8412                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8413 00000134 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8414 00000136 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8415 00000138 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8416 0000013A [D900]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8417 0000013C [0A03]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8418 0000013E [2F03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8419 00000140 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8420 00000142 [6503]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8421 00000144 [6C03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8422 00000146 [6C03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8423 00000148 [4F03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8424                                  aux_table_end:
  8425 0000014A 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8426                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8427 0000014B [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8428 0000014D [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8429 0000014F [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8430 00000151 [D900]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8431 00000153 [D104]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8432 00000155 [CA01]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8433 00000157 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8434 00000159 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8435 0000015B [D203]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8436 0000015D [D203]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8437                                  tim_table_end:
  8438                                  
  8439                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8440                                  
  8441                                  ;************************************************************************
  8442                                  ;*									*
  8443                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8444                                  ;*									*
  8445                                  ;************************************************************************
  8446                                  
  8447                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8448                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8449 0000015F E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8450                                  con_loop:				
  8451 00000161 E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8452 00000164 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8453 00000165 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8454                                  con_exit:				
  8455 00000167 F8                      		clc
  8456 00000168 C3                      		retn
  8457                                  
  8458                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8459                                  
  8460                                  ;************************************************************************
  8461                                  ;*									*
  8462                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8463                                  ;*									*
  8464                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8465                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8466                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8467                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8468                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8469                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8470                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8471                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8472                                  ;*									*
  8473                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8474                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8475                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8476                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8477                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8478                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8479                                  ;*									*
  8480                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8481                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8482                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8483                                  ;*									*
  8484                                  ;************************************************************************
  8485                                  
  8486                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8487                                  chrin:		
  8488 00000169 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8489 0000016D 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8490 0000016F 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8491 00000173 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8492 00000175 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8493 00000177 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8494 00000179 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8495 0000017B 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8496 0000017D 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8497 00000180 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8498 00000182 B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8499 00000184 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8500                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8501                                  
  8502                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8503                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8504                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8505                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8506                                  ;      else
  8507                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8508                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8509                                  ;      endif
  8510                                  ;    endif
  8511                                  ;  endif
  8512                                  
  8513                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8514 00000186 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8515 0000018B 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8516 0000018D 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8517 0000018F 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8518 00000191 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8519 00000193 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8520 00000195 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8521 00000197 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8522                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8523                                  
  8524                                  not_ext:				
  8525 00000199 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8526 0000019B 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8527                                  alt_save:				
  8528 0000019D 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8529                                  keyret:					
  8530 000001A1 C3                      		retn
  8531                                  
  8532                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8533                                  
  8534                                  ;************************************************************************
  8535                                  ;*									*
  8536                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8537                                  ;*									*
  8538                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8539                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8540                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8541                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8542                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8543                                  ;*									*
  8544                                  ;************************************************************************
  8545                                  
  8546                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8547                                  con_rdnd:				
  8548 000001A2 A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8549 000001A5 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8550 000001A7 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8551 000001A9 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8552 000001AD CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8553 000001AF 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8554 000001B1 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8555 000001B6 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8556 000001B8 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8557                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8558 000001BC 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8559                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8560 000001C1 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8561 000001C3 B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8562 000001C6 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8563 000001C8 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8564                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8565                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8566                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8567                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8568 000001CA F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8569 000001CB B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8570 000001CD C3                      		retn
  8571                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8572                                  
  8573                                  gotchr:					
  8574 000001CE 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8575 000001D0 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8576 000001D2 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8577 000001D6 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8578 000001D8 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8579                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8580                                  
  8581                                  notbrk:					
  8582 000001DA 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8583 000001DD 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8584 000001DF B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8585 000001E1 EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8586                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8587                                  
  8588                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8589 000001E3 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8590 000001E8 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8591 000001EA 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8592 000001EC 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8593 000001EE 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8594 000001F1 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8595 000001F3 B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8596                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8597                                  rdexit:					
  8598 000001F5 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8599 000001F9 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8600                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8601                                  bc_exvec:				
  8602 000001FD F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8603                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8604 000001FE C3                      		retn
  8605                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8606                                  
  8607                                  ;************************************************************************
  8608                                  ;*									*
  8609                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8610                                  ;*									*
  8611                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8612                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8613                                  ;*									*
  8614                                  ;************************************************************************
  8615                                  
  8616                                  con_writ:
  8617                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8618 000001FF E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8619                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8620                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8621                                  con_lp:					
  8622 00000201 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8623 00000204 47                      		inc	di
  8624 00000205 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8625                                  					; AL = character to display
  8626 00000207 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8627                                  cc_ret:					
  8628 00000209 F8                      		clc
  8629 0000020A C3                      		retn
  8630                                  
  8631                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8632                                  
  8633                                  ;************************************************************************
  8634                                  ;*									*
  8635                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8636                                  ;*									*
  8637                                  ;************************************************************************
  8638                                  
  8639                                  con_flush:
  8640 0000020B C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8641                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8642 00000210 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8643 00000212 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8644                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8645                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8646                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8647 00000214 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8648 00000216 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8649 00000218 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8650                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8651 0000021A EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8652                                  
  8653                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8654                                  
  8655                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8656                                  
  8657                                  ;************************************************************************
  8658                                  ;*									*
  8659                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8660                                  ;*									*
  8661                                  ;************************************************************************
  8662                                  
  8663                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8664                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8665                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8666                                  
  8667                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8668                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8669                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8670                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8671                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8672                                  ;
  8673                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8674                                  
  8675                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8676                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8677                                  
  8678                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8679                                  
  8680                                  ;************************************************************************
  8681                                  ;*									*
  8682                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8683                                  ;*									*
  8684                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8685                                  ;*									*
  8686                                  ;************************************************************************
  8687                                  
  8688                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8689 0000021C E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8690                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8691                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8692                                  prn_done:
  8693 0000021F F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8694 00000220 C3                      		retn
  8695                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8696                                  
  8697                                  ;************************************************************************
  8698                                  ;*									*
  8699                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8700                                  ;*									*
  8701                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8702                                  ;*									*
  8703                                  ;************************************************************************
  8704                                  
  8705                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8706                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8707 00000221 E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8708                                  prn_loop:				
  8709 00000223 BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8710                                  prn_out:				
  8711 00000226 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8712 00000229 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8713 0000022B 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8714 0000022E 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8715 00000230 E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8716 00000233 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8717 00000235 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8718 00000238 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8719 0000023A B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8720 0000023C C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8721 00000241 EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8722                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8723                                  
  8724                                  _prnwf:					
  8725 00000243 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8726 00000246 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8727                                  TestPrnError:				
  8728 00000248 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8729 00000249 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8730                                  pmessg:					
  8731 0000024B E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8732                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8733                                  
  8734                                  prn_con:				
  8735 0000024E 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8736 0000024F E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8737                                  ;prn_done:				
  8738                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8739                                  prn_done2:
  8740                                  		;clc
  8741                                  		; cf=0
  8742 00000251 C3                      		retn
  8743                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8744                                  
  8745                                  ;************************************************************************
  8746                                  ;*									*
  8747                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8748                                  ;*									*
  8749                                  ;************************************************************************
  8750                                  
  8751                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8752 00000252 E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8753 00000255 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8754 00000257 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8755                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8756                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8757 0000025A 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8758 0000025C E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8759                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8760                                  
  8761                                  ;************************************************************************
  8762                                  ;*									*
  8763                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8764                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8765                                  ;*									*
  8766                                  ;************************************************************************
  8767                                  
  8768                                  prnstat:				
  8769 0000025F B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8770                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8771                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8772                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8773                                  
  8774                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8775                                  
  8776                                  ;************************************************************************
  8777                                  ;*									*
  8778                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8779                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8780                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8781                                  ;*									*
  8782                                  ;************************************************************************
  8783                                  
  8784                                  prnop:	
  8785 00000261 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8786 00000265 CD17                    		int	17h		
  8787                                  
  8788                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8789                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8790                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8791                                  
  8792 00000267 50                      		push	ax
  8793 00000268 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8794 0000026B 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8795 0000026E 58                      		pop	ax
  8796 0000026F 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8797 00000271 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8798 00000274 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8799                                  
  8800                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8801                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8802                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8803                                  
  8804                                  NextTest:				
  8805 00000277 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8806                                  					; i/o error?
  8807 0000027A 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8808                                  
  8809                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8810                                  
  8811 0000027C B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8812                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8813 0000027E F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8814 00000281 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8815 00000283 FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8816                                  ret1:					
  8817 00000285 C3                      		retn
  8818                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8819                                  
  8820                                  checknotready:				
  8821 00000286 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8822 00000288 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8823 0000028B C3                      		retn
  8824                                  
  8825                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8826                                  
  8827                                  ;************************************************************************
  8828                                  ;*									*
  8829                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8830                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8831                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8832                                  ;*									*
  8833                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8834                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8835                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8836                                  ;*									*
  8837                                  ;************************************************************************
  8838                                  
  8839                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8840                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8841 0000028C 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8842                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8843 0000028E 51                      		push	cx
  8844 0000028F 53                      		push	bx
  8845 00000290 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8846 00000292 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8847 00000296 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8848                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8849 00000298 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8850 0000029C 5B                      		pop	bx
  8851                                  prn_getstat:				
  8852 0000029D E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8853 000002A0 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8854 000002A2 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8855 000002A5 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8856 000002A7 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8857 000002A8 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8858 000002AA 26                      		es
  8859 000002AB AC                      		lodsb
  8860                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8861                                  					; lodsb
  8862 000002AC 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8863 000002AE E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8864 000002B1 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8865 000002B3 E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8866                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8867                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8868                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8869 000002B5 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8870                                  
  8871                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8872                                  
  8873                                  prn_bperr:				
  8874 000002B6 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8875                                  prn_berr:				
  8876 000002B7 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8877                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8878                                  
  8879                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8880                                  
  8881                                  ;************************************************************************
  8882                                  ;*									*
  8883                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8884                                  ;*									*
  8885                                  ;************************************************************************
  8886                                  
  8887                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8888                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8889                                  
  8890                                  ;********************************;*
  8891                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8892                                  ;********************************;*
  8893                                  
  8894                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8895                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8896                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8897                                  
  8898                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  8899                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8900                                  ;;endstruc
  8901                                  
  8902                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8903                                  
  8904                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8905                                  
  8906                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8907                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  8908 000002BA C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8909 000002BE 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8910                                  					; ioc_pc
  8911 000002C3 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8912                                  
  8913                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8914 000002C5 E911FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  8915                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8916                                  
  8917                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  8918 000002C8 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8919 000002CC 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8920 000002D0 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8921                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8922 000002D2 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8923 000002D6 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8924                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  8925 000002D8 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8926 000002DC 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  8927 000002DE 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8928 000002E0 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  8929 000002E2 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  8930 000002E4 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  8931                                  prngetcount:				
  8932                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  8933 000002E7 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8934 000002EB 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8935                                  					; return current retry count
  8936                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8937                                  		; cf=0
  8938                                  		;clc
  8939 000002EE C3                      		retn
  8940                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8941                                  
  8942                                  ;************************************************************************
  8943                                  ;*									*

  8952                                  					; ioc_pc

  8955 000002FE 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; GET_RETRY_COUNT
  8956 00000300 7404                    		jz	short IOCtlSupported

  8958 00000304 7501                    		jnz	short prn_query_err

  8971                                  
  8972                                  ;************************************************************************
  8973                                  ;*									*
  8974                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8975                                  ;*									*
  8976                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8977                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8978                                  ;*									*
  8979                                  ;************************************************************************
  8980                                  
  8981                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8982                                  
  8983                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8984                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8985                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8986                                  
  8987                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8988                                  
  8989                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8990                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8991                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8992                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8993                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8994                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8995                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  8996                                  
  8997                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8998                                  
  8999                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  9000                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  9001                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  9002                                  
  9003                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9004                                  
  9005                                  ;************************************************************************
  9006                                  ;*									*
  9007                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  9008                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  9009                                  ;*									*
  9010                                  ;************************************************************************
  9011                                  
  9012                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  9013                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2

  9015 0000030C E87500                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  9016 0000030F 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9017 00000311 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  9018 00000313 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9019 00000315 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  9020                                  aux1:					
  9021 00000317 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  9022                                  					; won't return if error
  9023                                  aux2:					
  9024 0000031A AA                      		stosb
  9025 0000031B E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  9026                                  exvec2:					
  9027 0000031D F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  9028                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022

  9035                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  9036                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  9037                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*

  9046                                  		;retn
  9047                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)

  9050                                  
  9051                                  arbad:					
  9052 00000329 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  9053                                  		;xor	al, al
  9054                                  		;or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  9055                                  		; 11/08/2023

  9057 0000032C E9ACFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt

  9060                                  
  9061                                  ;************************************************************************
  9062                                  ;*									*

  9064                                  ;*									*
  9065                                  ;************************************************************************
  9066                                  
  9067                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h

  9070 00000334 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  9071 00000336 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  9072 00000338 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  9073 0000033B F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  9074 0000033E 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9075 00000340 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  9076 00000342 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9077 00000344 E8D8FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  9078 00000347 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  9079                                  auxdrx:

  9096 00000354 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9097 00000356 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  9098 00000359 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9099                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9100                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  9101                                  		;clc
  9102 0000035B C3                      		retn

  9104                                  
  9105                                  ;************************************************************************
  9106                                  ;*									*
  9107                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  9108                                  ;*									*
  9109                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  9110                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9111                                  ;*									*
  9112                                  ;************************************************************************
  9113                                  
  9114                                  auxstat:				
  9115 0000035C B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  9116                                  
  9117                                  		; fall into auxop
  9118                                  
  9119                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9120                                  
  9121                                  ;************************************************************************
  9122                                  ;*									*
  9123                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  9124                                  ;*									*
  9125                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  9126                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  9127                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9128                                  ;*									*
  9129                                  ;************************************************************************
  9130                                  
  9131                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  9132 0000035E 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  9133                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  9134                                  					; get port number
  9135 00000362 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  9136                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  9137                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  9138 00000364 C3                      		retn
  9139                                  
  9140                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9141                                  
  9142                                  ;************************************************************************
  9143                                  ;*									*
  9144                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  9145                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  9146                                  ;*									*
  9147                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  9148                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  9149                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  9150                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  9151                                  ;*									*
  9152                                  ;************************************************************************
  9153                                  
  9154                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  9155 00000365 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  9156 00000368 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  9157                                  					; zero out buffer
  9158                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9159                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9160                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  9161 0000036B C3                      		retn
  9162                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9163                                  
  9164                                  ;************************************************************************
  9165                                  ;*									*
  9166                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  9167                                  ;*									*
  9168                                  ;************************************************************************
  9169                                  
  9170                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  9171                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  9172 0000036C E3AF                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  9173                                  aux_loop:				
  9174 0000036E 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
  9175                                  					; move di pointer to next character
  9176 00000371 47                      		inc	di

  9178 00000374 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  9179 00000377 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  9180 0000037A 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
  9181 0000037C B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
  9182 0000037E E95AFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  9183                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9184                                  
  9185                                  awok:					
  9186 00000381 E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  9187                                  					; still	more character to print
  9188                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9189                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9190                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  9191 00000383 C3                      		retn
  9192                                  
  9193                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9194                                  
  9195                                  ;************************************************************************
  9196                                  ;*									*
