 10632                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10633                                  
 10634                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10635                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 10636                                  ; read in the fat sector and get the media byte from it.
 10637                                  ; input : es:di -> bds
 10638                                  ; output:
 10639                                  ;	  carry set if an error occurs, ax contains error code.
 10640                                  ;	  otherwise, ah contains media byte on exit
 10641                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 10642                                  
 10643                                  readfat:	
 10644                                  		;mov	dh, 0
 10645                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10646 00000809 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 10647 0000080B B90200                  		mov	cx, 2		; head 0
 10648                                  					; cylinder 0, sector 2
 10649 0000080E E80500                  		call	read_sector
 10650 00000811 7202                    		jb	short bad_fat_ret
 10651 00000813 8A27                    		mov	ah, [bx]	; media	byte
 10652                                  bad_fat_ret:				
 10653 00000815 C3                      		retn
 10654                                  
 10655                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10656                                  
 10657                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10658                                  
 10659                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10660                                  ; read a single sector into the temp buffer.
 10661                                  ; perform three retries in case of error.
 10662                                  ;   inputs:	es:[di].bds_drivenum has physical drive to use
 10663                                  ;		cx has sector and cylinder
 10664                                  ;		dh has head
 10665                                  ;		es:di has bds
 10666                                  ;		ds has Bios_Data
 10667                                  ;
 10668                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 10669                                  ;		    Bios_Data:bx point to sector
 10670                                  ;		       (note: some callers assume location of buffer)
 10671                                  ;
 10672                                  ;		carry set
 10673                                  ;		    ax has rom error code
 10674                                  ;
 10675                                  ; register bp is preserved.
 10676                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10677                                  
 10678                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10679                                  
 10680                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10681                                  read_sector:	
 10682 00000816 55                      		push	bp
 10683 00000817 BD0300                  		mov	bp, 3		; make 3 attempts
 10684 0000081A 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10685 0000081E BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector	; get es:bx to point to	buffer
 10686                                  rd_ret:					
 10687 00000821 06                      		push	es
 10688 00000822 1E                      		push	ds
 10689 00000823 07                      		pop	es
 10690 00000824 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 10691 00000827 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 10692                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 10693                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 10694                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 10695 00000829 07                      		pop	es
 10696 0000082A 734A                    		jnb	short okret2
 10697                                  rd_rty:					
 10698 0000082C E87404                  		call	again		; reset	disk, decrement	bp, preserve ax
 10699 0000082F 7442                    		jz	short err_rd_ret
 10700 00000831 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 10701                                  		;test	byte ptr [es:di+23h], 1	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10702                                  					; fnon_removable
 10703 00000836 75E9                    		jnz	short rd_ret
 10704 00000838 803E[3006]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10705 0000083D 7510                    		jnz	short rd_skip1_dpt
 10706 0000083F 50                      		push	ax
 10707 00000840 1E                      		push	ds		; for retry, set the head settle time to 0Fh
 10708 00000841 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 10709                                  		;mov	al, [si+9]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10710                                  		;mov	byte [si+9], 15 ; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10711                                  		;			; NORMSETTLE
 10712                                  		; 12/12/2022
 10713 00000845 B00F                    		mov	al, 15
 10714 00000847 864409                  		xchg	al, [si+9]
 10715                                  		; 
 10716 0000084A 1F                      		pop	ds
 10717 0000084B A2[2A01]                		mov	[save_head_sttl], al
 10718 0000084E 58                      		pop	ax
 10719                                  rd_skip1_dpt:				
 10720 0000084F 06                      		push	es
 10721 00000850 1E                      		push	ds
 10722 00000851 07                      		pop	es
 10723 00000852 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 10724 00000855 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 10725                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 10726                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 10727                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 10728 00000857 07                      		pop	es
 10729 00000858 9C                      		pushf
 10730 00000859 803E[3006]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10731 0000085E 750E                    		jnz	short rd_skip2_dpt
 10732 00000860 50                      		push	ax
 10733 00000861 A0[2A01]                		mov	al, [save_head_sttl]
 10734 00000864 1E                      		push	ds
 10735 00000865 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 10736 00000869 884409                  		mov	[si+9],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10737 0000086C 1F                      		pop	ds
 10738 0000086D 58                      		pop	ax
 10739                                  rd_skip2_dpt:				
 10740 0000086E 9D                      		popf
 10741 0000086F 7305                    		jnb	short okret2
 10742 00000871 EBB9                    		jmp	short rd_rty
 10743                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10744                                  
 10745                                  err_rd_ret:				
 10746 00000873 B2FF                    		mov	dl, 0FFh	; make sure we ask rom if media	has changed
 10747                                  					; return error
 10748 00000875 F9                      		stc
 10749                                  
 10750                                  ; update information pertaining to last drive accessed, time of access, last
 10751                                  ; track accessed in that drive.
 10752                                  
 10753                                  okret2:					
 10754 00000876 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl	; set up for head settle logic in disk
 10755 0000087A 8816[1E01]              		mov	[tim_drv], dl	; save drive last accessed
 10756 0000087E 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 10757                                  					; save last track accessed on this drive
 10758                                  					; preserve flags in case error occurred
 10759 00000882 9C                      		pushf
 10760 00000883 E8FD03                  		call	set_tim
 10761 00000886 9D                      		popf			; restore flags
 10762 00000887 5D                      		pop	bp
 10763 00000888 C3                      		retn
 10764                                  
 10765                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10766                                  ;	disk open/close routines
 10767                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10768                                  
 10769                                  dsk_open:				; 2C7h:80Ah = 70h:2D7Ah
 10770 00000889 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0
 10771 0000088E 7407                    		jz	short dsk_open_exit ; done if no changeline support
 10772 00000890 E8DDFC                  		call	SetDrive	; get bds for drive

 10774                                  dsk_open_exit:

 10776                                  		; cf = 0			
 10777                                  		;clc		; CF is	already	ZERO here (18/09/2022, MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10778                                  				; (19/07/2019 -	Erdogan	Tan - MSDOS 6.0	IO.SYS - retrodos4.s)

 10787 000008A7 7404                    		jz	short exitjx	; watch	out for	wrap
 10788 000008A9 26FF4D20                		dec	word [es:di+20h]
 10789                                  exitjx:					
 10790                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10791                                  		; cf = 0
 10792                                  		;clc		; CF is	already	ZERO here (18/09/2022, MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10793                                  				; (19/07/2019 -	Erdogan	Tan - MSDOS 6.0	IO.SYS - retrodos4.s)
 10794 000008AD C3                      		retn

 10853                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10854                                  
 10855                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10856                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10857                                  
 10858                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 10859                                  ; miscellaneous odd jump routines. 
 10860                                  ; moved out of mainline for speed.
 10861                                  
 10862                                  ; if we have a system where we have virtual drives, we need 
 10863                                  ; to prompt the user to place the correct disk in the drive.
 10864                                  ;
 10865                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds:->Bios_Data
 10866                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 10867                                  
 10868                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10869                                  checksingle:		
 10870 000008D8 50                      		push	ax
 10871 000008D9 53                      		push	bx
 10872 000008DA 268B5D23                		mov	bx, [es:di+23h]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10873                                  
 10874                                  ; if hard drive, cannot change disk.
 10875                                  ; if current owner of physical drive, no need to change diskette.
 10876                                  
 10877 000008DE F6C321                  		test	bl, 21h		; fnon_removable|fi_own_physical
 10878 000008E1 7573                    		jnz	short singleret
 10879 000008E3 F6C310                  		test	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 10880                                  					; is there a drive sharing this	physical drive?
 10881 000008E6 746E                    		jz	short singleret
 10882                                  
 10883                                  
 10884                                  ; look for the previous owner of this physical drive
 10885                                  ; and reset its ownership flag.
 10886                                  
 10887 000008E8 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10888                                  					; get physical drive number
 10889 000008EC 06                      		push	es		; preserve pointer to current bds
 10890 000008ED 57                      		push	di
 10891 000008EE C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; get first bds
 10892                                  scan_list:				
 10893 000008F2 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al
 10894 000008F6 7553                    		jnz	short scan_skip	; Not our drive. Try next bds.
 10895 000008F8 B320                    		mov	bl, 20h	; ' '   ; fi_own_physical ; test ownership flag
 10896 000008FA 26845D23                		test	[es:di+23h], bl
 10897 000008FE 744B                    		jz	short scan_skip	; he doesn't own it either. continue
 10898 00000900 26305D23                		xor	[es:di+23h], bl	; reset	ownership flag
 10899 00000904 5F                      		pop	di		; restore pointer to current bds
 10900 00000905 07                      		pop	es
 10901 00000906 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; ; set	ownership flag
 10902                                  
 10903                                  ; we examine the fsetowner flag. if it is set, then we are using the code in
 10904                                  ; checksingle to just set the owner of a drive. we must not issue the prompt
 10905                                  ; in this case.
 10906 0000090A 803E[7A00]01            		cmp	byte [fsetowner], 1
 10907 0000090F 7517                    		jnz	short not_fsetowner
 10908                                  		;cmp	byte ptr es:[di+4], 0 ;	are we handling	drive number 0 ?
 10909 00000911 26807D0400              		cmp	byte [es:di+4], 0
 10910 00000916 753E                    		jnz	short singleret
 10911 00000918 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]
 10912                                  		;mov	al, es:[di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 10913                                  					; get the DOS drive letter
 10914 0000091C 06                      		push	es
 10915 0000091D 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10916 00000921 26A20405                		mov	[es:LSTDRV], al
 10917                                  		;mov	es:504h, al	; [es:LSTDRV]
 10918                                  					; set up sdsb
 10919 00000925 07                      		pop	es		; restore bds pointer
 10920 00000926 EB2E                    		jmp	short singleret
 10921                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10922                                  
 10923                                  ; to support "backward" compatibility with ibm's "single drive status byte"
 10924                                  ; we now check to see if we are in a single drive system and the application
 10925                                  ; has "cleverly" diddled the sdsb
 10926                                  
 10927                                  not_fsetowner:				
 10928 00000928 803E[7800]02            		cmp	byte [single], 2 ; if (single_drive_system)
 10929 0000092D 7517                    		jnz	short ignore_sdsb
 10930 0000092F 50                      		push	ax
 10931 00000930 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; if (curr_drv == req_drv)
 10932 00000934 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
 10933 00000936 06                      		push	es
 10934 00000937 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10935 0000093B 2686060405              		xchg	al, [es:LSTDRV]
 10936                                  		;xchg	al, es:504h	; [es:LSTDRV]
 10937                                  					; then swap(curr_drv,req_drv)
 10938 00000940 07                      		pop	es
 10939 00000941 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al		; else
 10940 00000943 58                      		pop	ax		; swap(curr_drv,req_drv)
 10941 00000944 7410                    		jz	short singleret	; issue	swap_dsk_msg
 10942                                  ignore_sdsb:				
 10943 00000946 E8690E                  		call	swpdsk
 10944 00000949 EB0B                    		jmp	short singleret
 10945                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10946                                  
 10947                                  scan_skip:	
 10948 0000094B 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]			
 10949                                  		;les	di, es:[di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 10950                                  					; go to	next bds
 10951 0000094E 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; end of list?
 10952 00000951 759F                    		jnz	short scan_list	; ontinue until	hit end	of list
 10953 00000953 F9                      		stc
 10954 00000954 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 10955 00000955 07                      		pop	es
 10956                                  
 10957                                  singleret:

 10959 00000957 58                      		pop	ax

 10963                                  
 10964                                  baddrive:

 10966 0000095B EB02                    		jmp	short baddrive_ret

 10968                                  
 10969                                  unformatteddrive:				
 10970 0000095D B007                    		mov	al, 7		; unknown media

 10975                                  ioret:

 10977                                  
 10978                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10979                                  
 10980                                  ; 15/10/52022
 10981                                  
 10982                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10983                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 10984                                  ;
 10985                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 10986                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 10987                                  ;	cx = sector count
 10988                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 10989                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 10990                                  ;	ds = cs
 10991                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 10992                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 10993                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 10994                                  ;
 10995                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 10996                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code
 10997                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10998                                  
 10999                                  diskrd:	
 11000                                  		;mov	ds:rflag, 2	; romread
 11001                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11002 00000961 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2 ; romread
 11003                                  
 11004                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11005                                  
 11006                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11007                                  diskio:
 11008 00000966 89FB                    		mov	bx, di		; es:bx	= transfer address
 11009 00000968 8C06[2F05]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; save transfer	segment
 11010 0000096C E801FC                  		call	SetDrive
 11011 0000096F 268A4510                		mov	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 11012 00000973 A2[1F01]                		mov	[medbyt], al
 11013                                  		;jcxz	short ioret
 11014 00000976 E3E8                    		jcxz	ioret
 11015                                  
 11016                                  ; see if the media is formatted or not by checking the flags field in
 11017                                  ; in the bds. if it is unformatted we cannot allow i/o, so we should
 11018                                  ; go to the error exit at label unformatteddrive.
 11019                                  
 11020 00000978 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 2
 11021                                  		;test	byte ptr es:[di+24h], 2	; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
 11022                                  					; unformatted_media
 11023 0000097D 75DE                    		jnz	short unformatteddrive
 11024 0000097F 890E[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], cx	; save sector count
 11025 00000983 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; save sp
 11026                                  
 11027                                  ; ensure that we are trying to access valid sectors on the drive
 11028                                  
 11029 00000987 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 11030 00000989 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 11031 0000098B 01CA                    		add	dx, cx
 11032                                  		;adc	si, 0
 11033                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 11034 0000098D D1D6                    		rcl	si, 1
 11035 0000098F 26837D0E00              		cmp	word [es:di+0Eh], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 11036                                  					; 32 bit sector ?
 11037 00000994 740C                    		jz	short sanity32
 11038                                  		;cmp	si, 0
 11039                                  		; 02/09/2023
 11040 00000996 09F6                    		or	si, si
 11041 00000998 75BF                    		jnz	short baddrive
 11042 0000099A 263B550E                		cmp	dx, [es:di+0Eh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 11043 0000099E 77B9                    		ja	short baddrive
 11044 000009A0 EB12                    		jmp	short sanityok
 11045                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11046                                  
 11047                                  sanity32:				
 11048 000009A2 0336[2305]              		add	si, [start_sec_h]
 11049 000009A6 263B751D                		cmp	si, [es:di+1Dh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
 11050 000009AA 7208                    		jb	short sanityok
 11051 000009AC 77AB                    		ja	short baddrive
 11052 000009AE 263B551B                		cmp	dx, [es:di+1Bh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32]
 11053 000009B2 77A5                    		ja	short baddrive
 11054                                  
 11055                                  sanityok:				
 11056 000009B4 8B16[2305]              		mov	dx, [start_sec_h]
 11057 000009B8 26034517                		add	ax, [es:di+17h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs]
 11058 000009BC 26135519                		adc	dx, [es:di+19h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
 11059                                  
 11060                                  ; now dx;ax have the physical first sector.
 11061                                  ; since the following procedures is going to destroy ax, let's
 11062                                  ; save it temporarily to saved_word.
 11063                                  
 11064 000009C0 A3[2505]                		mov	[saved_word], ax ; save the sector number (low)
 11065                                  
 11066                                  ; set up pointer to disk base table in [dpt]. we cannot assume that iosetup
 11067                                  ; will do it because we will skip the set up stuff with hard disks.
 11068                                  
 11069 000009C3 06                      		push	es
 11070                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 11071                                  		; 02/09/2023
 11072 000009C4 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 11073 000009C6 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 11074 000009C8 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 11075                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 11076                                  					; current disk parm table
 11077 000009CD 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si

 11504 00000C05 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 11505                                  skip_timeout_chk:			
 11506 00000C07 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 11507 00000C0A 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 11508 00000C0C C706[2C05]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 11509                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 11510                                  dskerr1:				
 11511 00000C12 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 11512                                  		;jmp	retry
 11513                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11514 00000C13 E9F9FE                  		jmp	_retry
 11515                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11516                                  
 11517                                  write_fault_err:			
 11518 00000C16 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 11519                                  					; for write fault error.
 11520 00000C19 EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 11521                                  
 11522                                  		; fall into harderr
 11523                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11524                                  
 11525                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 11526                                  
 11527                                  harderr:				
 11528 00000C1B E84D00                  		call	maperror
 11529                                  harderr2:				
 11530 00000C1E C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 11531                                  					; force a media check through rom
 11532 00000C23 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 11533 00000C27 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 11534                                  
 11535                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 11536                                  
 11537                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 11538                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11539 00000C2B E958FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 11540                                  
 11541                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11542                                  
 11543                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 11544                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 11545                                  
 11546                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11547                                  normspeed:
 11548 00000C2E 803E[3006]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11549 00000C33 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 11550 00000C35 06                      		push	es
 11551 00000C36 50                      		push	ax
 11552 00000C37 A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 11553 00000C3A C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 11554 00000C3E 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11555 00000C42 58                      		pop	ax
 11556 00000C43 07                      		pop	es
 11557 00000C44 E80C00                  		call	fastspeed
 11558 00000C47 06                      		push	es
 11559 00000C48 C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 11560 00000C4C 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11561                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 11562 00000C51 07                      		pop	es
 11563 00000C52 C3                      		retn
 11564                                  
 11565                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11566                                  
 11567                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 11568                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 11569                                  
 11570                                  fastspeed:		
 11571 00000C53 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 11572                                  					; ftoobig
 11573 00000C58 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 11574 00000C5A 06                      		push	es
 11575 00000C5B 8E06[2F05]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 11576 00000C5F CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 11577 00000C61 8C06[2F05]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 11578 00000C65 07                      		pop	es
 11579 00000C66 C3                      		retn
 11580                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11581                                  
 11582                                  notready:

 11584 00000C68 B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 11585 00000C6A C3                      		retn
 11586                                  
 11587                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11588                                  
 11589                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 11590                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 11591                                  
 11592                                  maperror:	
 11593 00000C6B 51                      		push	cx
 11594 00000C6C 06                      		push	es
 11595 00000C6D 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 11596 00000C6E 07                      		pop	es
 11597 00000C6F 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 11598 00000C71 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 11599                                  		;mov	cx, 11 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 02/09/2023
 11600 00000C74 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 11601                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 11602 00000C77 BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 11603 00000C7A F2AE                    		repne scasb
 11604                                  		; 02/09/2023
 11605                                  		;mov	al, [di+10] ; PCDOS 7.1
 11606                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11607 00000C7C 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 11608                                  					; get translation
 11609                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 11610                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 11611 00000C7F 07                      		pop	es
 11612 00000C80 59                      		pop	cx
 11613 00000C81 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11614 00000C82 C3                      		retn
 11615                                  
 11616                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11617                                  
 11618                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11619                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11620                                  
 11621                                  set_tim:		
 11622 00000C83 50                      		push	ax
 11623 00000C84 E898F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11624                                  
 11625                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11626                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11627                                  
 11628 00000C87 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11629 00000C8B 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11630 00000C8D 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11631                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11632                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11633 00000C91 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11634                                  setaccess:				
 11635 00000C93 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11636 00000C98 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11637 00000C9C 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11638                                  done_set:				
 11639 00000CA0 F8                      		clc
 11640                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11641 00000CA1 58                      		pop	ax
 11642 00000CA2 C3                      		retn
 11643                                  
 11644                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11645                                  
 11646                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11647                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11648                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11649                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11650                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11651                                  
 11652                                  again:	
 11653 00000CA3 E86304                  		call	ResetDisk
 11654 00000CA6 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11655 00000CA9 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11656                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11657 00000CAB 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11658 00000CAC C3                      		retn
 11659                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11660                                  
 11661                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11662 00000CAD 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11663 00000CAF C3                      		retn

 11678                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the

 11769                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11770                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11771                                  ;
 11772                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11773                                  ;
 11774                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11775                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11776                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11777                                  ;
 11778                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11779                                  
 11780                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11781                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11782                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11783 00000CE0 E88DF8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11784 00000CE3 06                      		push	es
 11785 00000CE4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11786 00000CE8 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11787                                  					; RAWIO
 11788 00000CED 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11789 00000CF1 07                      		pop	es
 11790 00000CF2 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11791                                  
 11792                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11793                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11794                                  
 11795                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11796 00000CF4 BE[B10C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11797                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11798                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11799 00000CF7 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11800 00000CF9 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11801                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11802 00000CFB BE[C40C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11803                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11804                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11805                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11806 00000CFE 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11807 00000D00 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11808 00000D02 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11809 00000D05 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11810 00000D07 98                      		cbw
 11811 00000D08 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11812 00000D0A 46                      		inc	si
 11813 00000D0B 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11814 00000D0D 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11815                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11816 00000D10 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11817                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11818                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11819 00000D15 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11820 00000D17 C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11821                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11822                                  
 11823                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11824                                  		; as a fall through from above
 11825                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 11826 00000D18 5A                      		pop	dx
 11827                                  
 11828                                  IoctlFuncErr:				
 11829 00000D19 E9BDF3                  		jmp	bc_cmderr

 11834                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11835                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11836                                  ;
 11837                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11838                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11839                                  ;
 11840                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11841                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11842                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 11843                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 11844                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11845                                  
 11846                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11847                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 11848                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 11849                                  
 11850 00000D1C C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11851 00000D20 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11852                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 11853 00000D23 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11854 00000D27 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 11855 00000D2A 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11856 00000D2E 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 11857                                  					; Mask off other bits
 11858 00000D31 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 11859 00000D34 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 11860 00000D38 894704                  		mov	[bx+4],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 11861 00000D3B 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Set media type to default
 11862 00000D3D 884706                  		mov	[bx+6],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]
 11863                                  					
 11864                                  		; copy recommended bpb
 11865 00000D40 8D7527                  		lea	si, [di+39]	; [di+BDS.rbytespersec]	= [di+BDS.R_BPB]
 11866 00000D43 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11867                                  					; BUILD_DEVICE_BPB
 11868 00000D46 7412                    		jz	short UseBpbPresent
 11869 00000D48 1E                      		push	ds		; Save request packet segment
 11870 00000D49 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11871                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11872                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11873                                  					; Point back to Bios_Data
 11874 00000D4E E887FB                  		call	checksingle
 11875 00000D51 E842F9                  		call	GetBp		; Build	the bpb	from scratch
 11876 00000D54 1F                      		pop	ds		; Restore request packet segment
 11877 00000D55 720F                    		jb	short GetParmRet
 11878 00000D57 8D7506                  		lea	si, [di+6]	; [di+BDS.bytespersec] = [di+BSD.DP_BPB]
 11879                                  					; Use this subfield of bds instead
 11880                                  UseBpbPresent:				
 11881 00000D5A 8D7F07                  		lea	di, [bx+7]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB]
 11882                                  					; This is where	the result goes
 11883 00000D5D B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; A_BPB.size - 6
 11884                                  					; For now use 'small' bpb
 11885 00000D60 1E                      		push	ds		; reverse segments for copy
 11886 00000D61 06                      		push	es
 11887 00000D62 1F                      		pop	ds
 11888 00000D63 07                      		pop	es
 11889 00000D64 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 11890                                  		
 11891                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11892                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction -above- resets cf) 	
 11893                                  		;clc
 11894                                  GetParmRet:				
 11895 00000D66 C3                      		retn
 11896                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11897                                  
 11898                                  ; 17/10/2022
 11899                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11900

 11902                                  ; SetDeviceParameters:
 11903                                  ;
 11904                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive

 11908                                  SetDeviceParameters:			; 2C7h:0CF3h = 70h:3263h

 12067                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12068                                  ; FormatTrack:
 12069                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 12070                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 12071                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 12072                                  ;
 12073                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 12074                                  ;
 12075                                  ; output:
 12076                                  ;	for status call:
 12077                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 12078                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 12079                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 12080                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 12081                                  ;		3 - no media present
 12082                                  ;	carry cleared.
 12083                                  ;
 12084                                  ;	for format track:
 12085                                  ;		carry set if error
 12086                                  ;
 12087                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12088                                  
 12089                                  ; 16/03/2019
 12090

 12241                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 12242                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 12243                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 12244                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 12245                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 12246                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 12247                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be

 12342 00000F81 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_FIRSTSECTOR]
 12343 00000F85 268B4F07                		mov	cx, [es:bx+7]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_SECTORSTOREADWRITE]
 12344 00000F89 26C45F09                		les	bx, [es:bx+9]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_TRANSFERADDRESS]
 12345                                  					; Get transfer address
 12346                                  
 12347                                  		; we just trashed our packet address, but we no longer care
 12348                                  
 12349 00000F8D 8C06[2F05]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; Pass transfer	segment
 12350 00000F91 07                      		pop	es
 12351                                  
 12352                                  		; Fall into TrackIo
 12353                                  
 12354                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12355                                  
 12356                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12357                                  
 12358                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12359                                  ;
 12360                                  ; TrackIo:
 12361                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 12362                                  ;
 12363                                  ;   input:
 12364                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 12365                                  ;		  3 = write
 12366                                  ;		  4 = verify
 12367                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 12368                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 12369                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 12370                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 12371                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 12372                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 12373                                  ;
 12374                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12375                                  
 12376                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12377                                  		
 12378                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12379                                  TrackIo:	
 12380                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 12381 00000F92 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 12382 00000F96 E83FF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 12383 00000F99 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12384                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 12385 00000F9E 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 12386 00000FA0 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 12387 00000FA1 51                      		push	cx
 12388 00000FA2 E88FFA                  		call	iosetup
 12389 00000FA5 59                      		pop	cx
 12390 00000FA6 58                      		pop	ax
 12391                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 12392 00000FA7 BE[3305]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 12393 00000FAA D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12394 00000FAC D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12395 00000FAE 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 12396                                  
 12397                                  		; WE WANT:
 12398                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 12399                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 12400                                  		
 12401 00000FB0 BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 12402                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12403 00000FB3 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 12404                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12405                                  					; good_tracklayout
 12406 00000FB8 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 12407                                  		
 12408 00000FBA 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 12409                                  ionextsector:				
 12410 00000FBC 51                      		push	cx
 12411 00000FBD 52                      		push	dx
 12412 00000FBE 46                      		inc	si
 12413 00000FBF 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 12414                                  					; the track table
 12415 00000FC0 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 12416 00000FC1 A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 12417                                  
 12418                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 12419                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 12420                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 12421                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 12422                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 12423                                  		
 12424                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12425 00000FC4 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 12426                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12427                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 12428 00000FC9 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 12429                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12430 00000FCB F606[2705]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 12431                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 12432                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 12433 00000FD0 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 12434 00000FD2 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 12435 00000FD6 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 12436 00000FD8 E816FB                  		call	Disk
 12437 00000FDB 5A                      		pop	dx
 12438 00000FDC 59                      		pop	cx
 12439 00000FDD F8                      		clc
 12440 00000FDE C3                      		retn
 12441                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12442                                  
 12443                                  IoRemovable:				
 12444 00000FDF AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 12445                                  					; table	and save it
 12446 00000FE0 50                      		push	ax
 12447 00000FE1 56                      		push	si
 12448 00000FE2 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 12449 00000FE3 50                      		push	ax
 12450 00000FE4 8A26[2C01]              		mov	ah, [eot]	; Preserve whatever might be in	ah
 12451                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data
 12452 00000FE8 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 12453 00000FEC 884403                  		mov	[si+3],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_SECTOR_SIZ]
 12454 00000FEF 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12455 00000FF2 58                      		pop	ax
 12456 00000FF3 1F                      		pop	ds
 12457 00000FF4 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12458 00000FF6 A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax
 12459 00000FF9 E8F5FA                  		call	Disk
 12460 00000FFC 5E                      		pop	si		; Advance buffer pointer by adding
 12461                                  					; sector size
 12462 00000FFD 58                      		pop	ax
 12463                                  
 12464                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 12465                                  		;call	SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize
 12466 00000FFE 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
 12467 00001000 B88000                  		mov	ax, 128
 12468 00001003 D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl
 12469                                  
 12470 00001005 01C3                    		add	bx, ax
 12471 00001007 5A                      		pop	dx
 12472 00001008 59                      		pop	cx
 12473 00001009 E2B1                    		loop	ionextsector
 12474 0000100B 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12475                                  		;jz	short NoNeedDone
 12476                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12477 00001010 7404                    		je	short NoNeedDone2
 12478 00001012 E867FA                  		call	done		; set time of last access, and reset
 12479                                  					; entries in Dpt.
 12480                                  NoNeedDone:
 12481 00001015 F8                      		clc
 12482                                  NoNeedDone2:
 12483 00001016 C3                      		retn

 12485                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12486                                  
 12487                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12488                                  ;
 12489                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 12490                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 12491                                  ; are permissible.
 12492                                  ;
 12493                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 12494                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 12495                                  ; All other registers preserved
 12496                                  ;
 12497                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 12499                                  ; 02/09/2023
 12500                                  ;SectSizeToSectIndex:

 12502                                  ;					; examine upper	byte only
 12503                                  ;		ja	short OneK

 12505                                  ;		retn
 12506

 12526                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12527                                  ;
 12528                                  ; SetDASD
 12529                                  ;
 12530                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 12531                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 12532                                  ;
 12533                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds
 12534                                  ;
 12535                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12536                                  
 12537                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12538                                  SetDasd:
 12539 00001017 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 12540                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 12541 0000101C 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 12542                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12543 0000101E 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 12544                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12545                                  					; set_dasd_true
 12546 00001023 7447                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 12547                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12548 00001025 268065237F              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh
 12549                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12550                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 12551                                  DoSetDasd:
 12552 0000102A C606[3106]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; Reset it
 12553 0000102F C606[3B01]50            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 50h ; Format gap for 48tpi disks
 12554 00001034 B004                    		mov	al, 4
 12555                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12556 00001036 268A6522                		mov	ah, [es:di+22h] ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12557 0000103A 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
 12558                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12559                                  					; DEV_3INCH720KB
 12560 0000103D 7415                    		jz	short DoSet
 12561 0000103F 80FC01                  		cmp	ah, 1
 12562                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12563                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI
 12564                                  		;jz	short GotBig
 12565 00001042 B001                    		mov	al, 1
 12566                                  		;jmp	short DoSet
 12567                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12568 00001044 750E                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12569                                  
 12570                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12571                                  
 12572                                  GotBig:
 12573                                  		;mov	al, 2		; 160/320k in a	1.2 meg	drive
 12574                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12575 00001046 40                      		inc	ax  ; mov al, 2
 12576 00001047 803E[2F06]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 12577 0000104C 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12578                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive
 12579                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12580                                  		;inc	al  ; al = 3
 12581                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12582 0000104E 40                      		inc	ax  ; al = 3
 12583 0000104F C606[3B01]54            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 54h
 12584                                  DoSet:

 12587                                  
 12588                                  		;mov	ds, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vectors
 12589                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12590 00001056 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12591 00001058 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si	; 0
 12592                                  
 12593 0000105A C5367800                		lds	si, [DSKADR]
 12594                                  		;lds	si, [78h]	; [DSKADR]  (Int 1Eh)
 12595                                  		;;lds	si, ds:78h
 12596                                  
 12597 0000105E C644090F                		mov	byte [si+9], 0Fh ;
 12598                                  					; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12599 00001062 5E                      		pop	si
 12600 00001063 1F                      		pop	ds
 12601 00001064 B417                    		mov	ah, 17h
 12602 00001066 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 12603 0000106A CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 12604                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 12605                                  DasdHasBeenSet:
 12606 0000106C 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12607 00001070 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah
 12608 00001074 C3                      		retn
 12609                                  
 12610                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12611                                  
 12612                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12613                                  
 12614                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12615                                  ;
 12616                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12617                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12618                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12619                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12620                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12621                                  ;
 12622                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12623                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12624                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12625                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12626                                  ;
 12627                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12628                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12629                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12630                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12631                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12632                                  ;
 12633                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12634                                  
 12635                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12636                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12637 00001075 51                      		push	cx
 12638 00001076 52                      		push	dx
 12639                                  
 12640                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12641                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12642                                  
 12643 00001077 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12644 0000107C 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12645 0000107E 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12646 00001080 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12647 00001085 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12648 00001087 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12649                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12650                                  
 12651                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12652 00001089 06                      		push	es
 12653 0000108A 56                      		push	si
 12654                                  
 12655                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12656                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 12657 0000108B 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 12658 0000108D 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 12659                                  
 12660 0000108F 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12661                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12662                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12663 00001094 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12664 00001098 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12665                                  
 12666                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 12667                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 12668                                  
 12669 0000109C 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12670 000010A1 5E                      		pop	si
 12671 000010A2 07                      		pop	es
 12672                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:
 12673 000010A3 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12674 000010A7 49                      		dec	cx
 12675 000010A8 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12676 000010AB D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12677 000010AD D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12678 000010AF 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12679 000010B1 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12680 000010B5 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12681 000010B9 06                      		push	es
 12682 000010BA 1E                      		push	ds
 12683 000010BB 56                      		push	si
 12684 000010BC 57                      		push	di
 12685 000010BD B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12686 000010BF CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12687                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12688 000010C1 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12689 000010C3 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12690 000010C8 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12691 000010CA 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12692                                  
 12693                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12694                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12695 000010CB 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12696 000010CD 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 12697 000010CF 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12698                                  
 12699 000010D0 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12700                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12701                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 12702 000010D5 8936[3206]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 12703 000010D9 8C06[3406]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 12704                                  
 12705                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12706                                  		;;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12707                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 12708                                  		;mov	es, si
 12709 000010DD 07                      		pop	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12710                                  
 12711                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 12712 000010DE 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 12713                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 12714 000010E3 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 12715 000010E8 C606[3006]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12716                                  skip_disk_base_setting:
 12717 000010ED 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 12718                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag
 12719 000010EF A2[3106]                		mov	[had_format_error], al
 12720 000010F2 EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet
 12721                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12722                                  
 12723                                  FormaStatErr:
 12724                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12725 000010F4 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 12726                                  				
 12727 000010F6 80FC0C                  		cmp	ah, 0Ch		; DSK_ILLEGAL_COMBINATION
 12728                                  					; Illegal combination =	0Ch
 12729 000010F9 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb
 12730 000010FB 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR
 12731 000010FE 7402                    		jz	short FormatStatTimeOut
 12732                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12733                                  		;dec	al
 12734                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12735 00001100 48                      		dec	ax
 12736                                  		; al = 2
 12737                                  		;mov	al, 1		; Function not supported.
 12738                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 12739                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12740

 12743                                  		;dec	al	; 3 -> 2 or 2 -> 1
 12744                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12745 00001101 48                      		dec	ax

 12747                                  		;mov	al, 2		; Function supported, but
 12748                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.
 12749                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12750                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 12751                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12752                                  
 12753                                  FormatStatTimeOut:
 12754                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12755                                  		; al = 3
 12756                                  		;mov	al, 3		; Function supported, but
 12757                                  					; Media	not present.
 12758                                  PopStatRet:

 12760 00001103 5E                      		pop	si
 12761 00001104 1F                      		pop	ds

 12763                                  SetMediaRet:
