 12767                                  
 12768                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12769                                  
 12770                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12771                                  
 12772                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12773                                  ;
 12774                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12775                                  ;
 12776                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12777                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12778                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12779                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12780                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12781                                  ;
 12782                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12783                                  
 12784                                  ResetDisk:
 12785 00001109 50                      		push	ax
 12786                                  
 12787                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12788 0000110A B80100                  		mov	ax, 1 ; PCDOS 7.1
 12789 0000110D 3806[3006]              		cmp	[media_set_for_format], al ; 1
 12790                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12791                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 12792 00001111 7503                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 12793                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12794                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12795 00001113 A2[3106]                		mov	[had_format_error], al ; 1
 12796                                  ResetDisk_cont:
 12797                                  		; 02/09/2023 (ah=0)
 12798                                  		;xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12799 00001116 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12800                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12801 00001118 C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12802                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12803 0000111D 58                      		pop	ax
 12804 0000111E C3                      		retn
 12805                                  
 12806                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12807                                  
 12808                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12809                                  
 12810                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12811                                  ;
 12812                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12813                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12814                                  ;
 12815                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12816                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12817                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12818                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12819                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12820                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12821                                  ;
 12822                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12823                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12824                                  ;
 12825                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12826                                  
 12827                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12828                                  ToRom:	
 12829 0000111F 53                      		push	bx
 12830 00001120 56                      		push	si
 12831                                  
 12832                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 12833                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12834                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 12835                                  
 12836 00001121 F606[3006]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12837 00001126 7536                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 12838 00001128 50                      		push	ax
 12839 00001129 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12840 0000112A 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12841                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?
 12842 0000112F 9C                      		pushf			; (Save	the cmp	result)
 12843 00001130 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12844                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; Get pointer to disk base table
 12845 00001134 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12846                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 12847                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table
 12848 00001139 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12849 0000113D 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12850                                  		
 12851 00001141 A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 12852 00001144 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12853 00001148 A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]
 12854 0000114B 26884407                		mov	[es:si+7], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_FORMT_GAP]
 12855                                  					; Important for	format
 12856 0000114F 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12857                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 12858                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 12859 00001154 9D                      		popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 12860 00001155 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 12861 00001157 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 12862                                  MotorStrtOK:				
 12863 0000115C 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12864 0000115D 58                      		pop	ax
 12865                                  GotValidDpt:				
 12866 0000115E 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number
 12867 00001162 88D5                    		mov	ch, dl		; Set low 8 bits in ch
 12868 00001164 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 12869 00001168 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number
 12870 0000116C 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12871 0000116D 8E06[2F05]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 12872 00001171 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 12873 00001173 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12874 00001174 5E                      		pop	si
 12875 00001175 5B                      		pop	bx
 12876 00001176 C3                      		retn

 12880                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12881                                  
 12882                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12883                                  
 12884                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12885                                  ;
 12886                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12887                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12888                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12889                                  ;
 12890                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12891                                  
 12892                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12893                                  ioctl_getown:
 12894 00001177 E8F6F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12895 0000117A 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12896                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12897 0000117E C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12898                                  ownloop:				
 12899 00001182 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12900 00001186 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12901                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12902 00001188 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12903                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12904                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12905 0000118D 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 12906                                  getnextBDS:				
 12907 0000118F 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12908 00001192 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12909                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12910                                  
 12911                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12912                                  ;
 12913                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12914                                  ; in al to al.
 12915                                  ;
 12916                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12917                                  
 12918                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12919                                  ioctl_setown:
 12920 00001194 E8D9F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12921 00001197 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 12922                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 12923 0000119C E839F7                  		call	checksingle
 12924                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12925 0000119F FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 12926                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12927                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12928                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12929                                  
 12930                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12931                                  ;
 12932                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 12933                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12934                                  ;
 12935                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12936                                  
 12937                                  exitown:				
 12938 000011A3 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 12939                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12940 000011A5 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 12941                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12942                                  					; fi_am_mult
 12943 000011AA 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 12944 000011AC 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12945                                  					; Get logical drive number
 12946                                  					; Get it 1-based
 12947 000011B0 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 12948                                  exitnomult:				
 12949 000011B2 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12950 000011B6 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 12951                                  					; Exit normal termination
 12952                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12953                                  		; cf=0
 12954                                  		;clc
 12955 000011B9 C3                      		retn
 12956

 12977 000011C0 8606[3006]              		xchg	al, [media_set_for_format] ; get current flag setting

 12988 000011D4 268E06[1A00]            		mov	es, [es:zeroseg]

 12990

 12992 000011D9 2689367800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], si
 12993                                  		;mov	word ptr es:7Ah, ds ; [es:DSKADR+2]

 13009                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13010                                  ;	get media id
 13011                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13012                                  ;
 13013                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 13014                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13015                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 13016                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 13017                                  ;
 13018                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13019                                  ;
 13020                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 13021                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13022                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13023                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 13024                                  ;
 13025                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13026                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13027                                  ;
 13028                                  ; LOGIC:
 13029                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 13030                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 13031                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 13032                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 13033                                  ;
 13034                                  ; {
 13035                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 13036                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 13037                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 13038                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13039                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13040                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13041                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 13042                                  ;		};
 13043                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13044                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13045                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13046                                  ;		};
 13047                                  ;	else
 13048                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 13049                                  ;
 13050                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13051                                  
 13052                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 13053                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 13054                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 13055                                  
 13056                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13057                                  GetMediaId:
 13058 000011E8 E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13059 000011EB 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 13060 000011EF C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 13061 000011F4 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 13062 000011F7 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 13063                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13064 000011F9 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13065                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13066 000011FE 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 13067                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13068 00001200 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 13069 00001203 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 13070                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13071                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13072 00001206 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 13073 00001208 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 13074 0000120C 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13075                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13076 00001210 46                      		inc	si
 13077                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 13078                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13079 00001211 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13080 00001214 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13081                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13082                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13083 00001217 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 13084                                  	
 13085                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13086                                  		; cf = 0
 13087                                  		;clc
 13088                                  
 13089 00001219 C3                      		retn
 13090                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13091                                  
 13092                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 13093 0000121A B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13094 0000121C F9                      		stc
 13095                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 13096 0000121D C3                      		retn
 13097                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13098                                  
 13099                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13100                                  
 13101                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13102                                  ;  set media id
 13103                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13104                                  
 13105                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 13106                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13107                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 13108                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 13109                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 13110                                  ;	    the bds table.
 13111                                  ;
 13112                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13113                                  ;
 13114                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 13115                                  ;	    the request packet.
 13116                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 13117                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13118                                  ;
 13119                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13120                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13121                                  ;
 13122                                  ; logic:
 13123                                  ;
 13124                                  ; {
 13125                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 13126                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 13127                                  ;	BootIo;
 13128                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13129                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13130                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13131                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 13132                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 13133                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 13134                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 13135                                  ;		};
 13136                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13137                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13138                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13139                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 13140                                  ;		};
 13141                                  ;	else
 13142                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 13143                                  ;
 13144                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13145                                  
 13146                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13147                                  SetMediaId:
 13148 0000121E E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13149 00001221 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 13150                                  					; Logical drive	number
 13151 00001225 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 13152 00001227 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 13153 0000122C 52                      		push	dx
 13154 0000122D E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13155 00001230 5A                      		pop	dx
 13156 00001231 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 13157                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13158 00001233 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13159                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13160 00001238 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 13161 0000123A 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13162                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13163 0000123F 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 13164 00001241 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 13165 00001242 57                      		push	di
 13166 00001243 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 13167 00001244 07                      		pop	es
 13168 00001245 BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13169 00001248 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 13170 0000124C C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13171 0000124F 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13172 00001252 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13173                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13174                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13175 00001255 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 13176 00001257 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 13177 00001258 1F                      		pop	ds
 13178 00001259 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 13179 0000125A 07                      		pop	es
 13180 0000125B E876F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 13181 0000125E 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 13182 00001260 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 13183 00001265 E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 13184 00001268 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 13185                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 13186                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 13187 0000126D C3                      		retn
 13188                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13189                                  
 13190                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 13191 0000126E B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13192 00001270 F9                      		stc
 13193                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 13194 00001271 C3                      		retn
 13195                                  
 13196                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13197                                  
 13198                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13199                                  
 13200                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13201                                  ;	BootIo
 13202                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13203                                  ;
 13204                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 13205                                  ;
 13206                                  ; input :
 13207                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 13208                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 13209                                  ;
 13210                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 13211                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 13212                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 13213                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 13214                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13215                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13216                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 13217                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 13218                                  ;
 13219                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13220                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 13221                                  ;
 13222                                  ; logic:
 13223                                  ;
 13224                                  ; {
 13225                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 13226                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 13227                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 13228                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 13229                                  ; }
 13230                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13231                                  
 13232                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13233                                  BootIo:	
 13234 00001272 06                      		push	es
 13235 00001273 57                      		push	di
 13236 00001274 53                      		push	bx
 13237 00001275 1E                      		push	ds
 13238 00001276 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 13239                                  
 13240                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 13241                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 13242                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13243                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 13244                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 13245                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 13246                                  
 13247 00001277 BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 13248 0000127A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 13249 0000127C 8916[2305]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 13250 00001280 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 13251 00001283 E8E0F6                  		call	diskio
 13252 00001286 5B                      		pop	bx
 13253 00001287 5F                      		pop	di
 13254 00001288 07                      		pop	es
 13255 00001289 C3                      		retn
 13256                                  
 13257                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13258                                  
 13259                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13260                                  
 13261                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13262                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 13263                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13264                                  ;
 13265                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 13266                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 13267                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 13268                                  ; history in the flags.
 13269                                  ;
 13270                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 13271                                  ;
 13272                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 13273                                  ;
 13274                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 13275                                  ;
 13276                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13277                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 13278                                  ;
 13279                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13280                                  
 13281                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 13282 0000128A 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13283 0000128E 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 13284 00001290 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 13285                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13286 00001292 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 13287                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13288                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 13289 00001297 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13290 00001299 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 13291 0000129E 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13292 000012A0 E8EB06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 13293 000012A3 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 13294                                  
 13295                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 13296                                  
 13297 000012A5 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 13298 000012A7 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 13299                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 13300                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 13301 000012A9 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13302 000012AB 53                      		push	bx
 13303 000012AC BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 13304                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 13305                                  					; physical drive
 13306 000012AF E8B506                  		call	set_changed_dl
 13307 000012B2 5B                      		pop	bx
 13308                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 13309 000012B3 C3                      		retn

 13315                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13316                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 13317                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13318                                  ;
 13319                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13320                                  ;
 13321                                  ; INPUT :
 13322                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13323                                  ;
 13324                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 13325                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 13326                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13327                                  
 13328                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13329                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 13330 000012B4 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 13331 000012B8 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13332                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 13333                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13334 000012BB 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 13335                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13336 000012BD 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13337                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13338                                  					; unformatted_media
 13339 000012C2 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 13340 000012C4 FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 13341                                  
 13342                                  GafDone:				
 13343 000012C6 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13344 000012C9 C3                      		retn
 13345                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13346                                  
 13347                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13348                                  
 13349                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13350                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 13351                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13352                                  ;
 13353                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13354                                  ;
 13355                                  ; input :
 13356                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13357                                  ;
 13358                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 13359                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13360                                  
 13361                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13362                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 13363 000012CA C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 13364 000012CE C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13365                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13366 000012D1 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 13367                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13368                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 13369 000012D6 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13370 000012DA 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 13371                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13372 000012DC 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13373                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13374                                  					; unformatted_media
 13375                                  saf_Done:				
 13376 000012E1 C3                      		retn
 13377                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13378                                  
 13379                                  ; 16/10/2022

 13381                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13382                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 13383                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13384                                  ;
 13385                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 13386                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 13387                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 13388                                  ;
 13389                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13390                                  
 13391                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13392                                  ioctl_support_query:
 13393 000012E2 06                      		push	es
 13394 000012E3 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 13395 000012E7 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 13396                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 13397                                  
 13398                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 13399                                  		;cmp	al, 48h		; IOC_NEW_DC (PCDOS 7.1)
 13400                                  		;			; new generic ioctl function (FAT32)
 13401                                  		;jz	short ioctl_support
 13402                                  
 13403 000012EB 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 13404                                  					; See if major code is 8
 13405 000012ED 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 13406                                  ioctl_support:
 13407 000012EF 0E                      		push	cs
 13408 000012F0 07                      		pop	es
 13409                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13410                                  		;mov	cx, 14          ; (PCDOS 7.1) IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13411 000012F1 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13412                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13413 000012F4 BF[D50C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 13414                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 13415                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 13416 000012F7 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 13417 000012F9 F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 13418 000012FB 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 13419 000012FD B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 13420                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13421                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 13422                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 13423                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 13424                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 13425                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13426                                  ioctlsupexit:
 13427 00001300 07                      		pop	es
 13428                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13429                                  		; cf = 0
 13430                                  		;clc
 13431 00001301 C3                      		retn
 13432                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13433                                  nosupport:
 13434 00001302 07                      		pop	es
 13435 00001303 E9D3ED                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 13436                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13437                                  
 13438                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13439                                  
 13440                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13441                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 13442                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13443                                  ;
 13444                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 13445                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 13446                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 13447                                  ;	    drive)
 13448                                  ;
 13449                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 13450                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 13451                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 13452                                  ;
 13453                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 13454                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 13455                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 13456                                  ;
 13457                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 13458                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 13459                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13460                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13461                                  ;
 13462                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 13463                                  ;
 13464                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 13465                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 13466                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 13467                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 13468                                  ; 
 13469                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13470                                  
 13471                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13472                                  SenseMediaType:				
 13473 00001306 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 13474 0000130A C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13475                                  		; 10/10/2022
 13476                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 13477 0000130D 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 13478 0000130F 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 13479                                  		;
 13480 00001311 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13481                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 13482                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13483                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 13484 00001315 B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 13485                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 13486 00001317 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 13487 00001319 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 13488 0000131B FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 13489                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 13490 0000131D FEC8                    		dec	al
 13491 0000131F 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 13492 00001321 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13493 00001323 0404                    		add	al, 4
 13494 00001325 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 13495 00001327 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13496 00001329 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 13497 0000132B 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 13498                                  GotMediaType:				
 13499 0000132D 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 13500                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13501                                  		; cf = 0
 13502                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 13503 00001330 C3                      		retn
 13504                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13505                                  
 13506                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 13507 00001331 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 13508 00001334 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 13509 00001336 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 13510 00001338 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 13511 0000133B 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 13512                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 13513 0000133D B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 13514                                  SenseErrExit:				
 13515 0000133F B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 13516 00001341 F9                      		stc
 13517 00001342 C3                      		retn
 13518                                  
 13519                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13520                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13521                                  		;db    0
 13522                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13523                                  
 13524                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13525                                  
 13526                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13527                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 13528                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13529                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13530                                  
 13531                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 13532                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 13533                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 13534                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 13535                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 13536                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 13537                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 13538                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 13539                                  ;
 13540                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 13541                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 13542                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 13543                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 13544                                  ;
 13545                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 13546                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 13547                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 13548                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 13549                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 13550                                  ;
 13551                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 13552                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 13553                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 13554                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 13555                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 13556                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 13557                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 13558                                  
 13559                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 13560                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 13561                                  
 13562                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13563                                  
 13564                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 13565 00001343 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 13566 00001346 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 13567 00001348 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 13568 0000134B 7431                    		jz	short mine
 13569                                  
 13570                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 13571                                  
 13572 0000134D 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 13573 00001350 746C                    		jz	short win386call
 13574 00001352 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 13575 00001355 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 13576 00001357 E99700                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 13577                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13578                                  
 13579                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 13580 0000135A CF                      		iret
 13581                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13582                                  
 13583                                  int2f_replace_int13:
 13584 0000135B 50                      		push	ax	; free up a register for caller's ds
 13585 0000135C 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 13586                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 13587                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 13588                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 13589 0000135E 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 13590                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13591                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 13592                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 13593                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 13594                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 13595                                  		
 13596                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 13597                                  		;push	word [Orig13]
 13598 00001363 FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 13599                                  		;push	word [Old13]
 13600 00001367 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 13601                                  
 13602                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 13603                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 13604                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 13605                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 13606                                  		
 13607                                  		;mov	[Orig13], dx
 13608                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13609 0000136B 8716[B400]              		xchg	dx, [Orig13]
 13610 0000136F A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 13611                                  		;mov	[Old13], bx
 13612                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13613 00001372 871E[0601]              		xchg	bx, [Old13]
 13614 00001376 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 13615                                  
 13616 0000137A 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 13617                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13618                                  		;pop	bx
 13619 0000137B 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 13620                                  		;pop	dx ; 02/09/2023
 13621 0000137C 58                      		pop	ax
 13622                                  i2f_iret:
 13623 0000137D CF                      		iret
 13624                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13625                                  
 13626                                  mine:
 13627 0000137E 3CF8                    		cmp	al, 0F8h 		; iret on reserved functions
 13628 00001380 73FB                    		jnb	short i2f_iret
 13629 00001382 08C0                    		or	al, al			; a get installed state request?
 13630 00001384 7503                    		jnz	short disp_func
 13631 00001386 B0FF                    		mov	al, 0FFh
 13632                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret
 13633                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13634 00001388 CF                      		iret
 13635                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13636                                  
 13637                                  disp_func:
 13638 00001389 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1			; request for installing bds?
 13639 0000138B 7418                    		jz	short do_subfun_01
 13640 0000138D 3C03                    		cmp	al, 3			; get bds vector?
 13641 0000138F 7423                    		jz	short do_get_bds_vector
 13642                                  
 13643                                  ; set up pointer to request packet
 13644                                  
 13645 00001391 1E                      		push	ds
 13646 00001392 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022	
 13647                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13648                                  					; = [0070h:25A0h] = [02C7h:0030h]
 13649                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13650                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:ptrsav, bx
 13651                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:ptrsav+2, es
 13652 00001397 891E[1200]              		mov	[ptrsav], bx
 13653 0000139B 8C06[1400]              		mov	[ptrsav+2], es
 13654 0000139F 1F                      		pop	ds
 13655                                  		;jmp	far ptr	i2f_dskentry
 13656                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 13657                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1708h
 13658 000013A0 EA[1907]7000            		jmp	DOSBIOSSEG:dsk_entry ; BIOSDATA:dsk_entry
 13659                                  		;; 17/10/2022
 13660                                  		;;jmp	far DOSBIOSSEG:dsk_entry		
 13661                                  		;jmp	DOSBIOSSEG:i2f_dskentry ; 70h:i2f_dskentry
 13662                                  					; NOTE: jump to a FAR function, not an
 13663                                  					;  IRET type function. Callers of
 13664                                  					;  this int2f subfunction will have
 13665                                  					;  to be careful to do a popf
 13666                                  
 13667                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13668                                  
 13669                                  do_subfun_01:
 13670 000013A5 06                      		push	es
 13671 000013A6 1E                      		push	ds
 13672 000013A7 1E                      		push	ds
 13673 000013A8 07                      		pop	es
 13674                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13675 000013A9 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]	
 13676                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13677                                  					; point	ds: -> Bios_Data
 13678 000013AE E8BC03                  		call	install_bds
 13679 000013B1 1F                      		pop	ds
 13680 000013B2 07                      		pop	es
 13681                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret
 13682                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13683 000013B3 CF                      		iret
 13684                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13685                                  
 13686                                  do_get_bds_vector:
 13687                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13688 000013B4 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]			
 13689                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13690 000013B9 C53E[1901]              		lds	di, [start_bds]
 13691                                  		;lds	di, ds:start_bds
 13692                                  ;ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022
 13693                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret
 13694                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13695 000013BD CF                      		iret
 13696                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13697                                  
 13698                                  ; 17/10/2022
 13699                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13700                                  
 13701                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 13702                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 13703                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.
 13704                                  
 13705                                  win386call:				
 13706 000013BE 1E                      		push	ds
 13707 000013BF 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 13708                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13709                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h
 13710 000013C4 3C05                    		cmp	al, 5		; Win386_Init
 13711                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?
 13712 000013C6 7410                    		jz	short Win386Init
 13713 000013C8 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; Win386_Exit
 13714                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 13715 000013CA 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 13716                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13717 000013CC F6C201                  		test	dl, 1
 13718                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it	win386 or win286 dos extender?
 13719 000013CF 751E                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 13720                                  		;and	ds:IsWin386, 0	; indicate that	win386 is not present  
 13721 000013D1 8026[6F08]00            		and	byte [IsWin386], 0 
 13722 000013D6 EB17                    		jmp	short win_iret
 13723                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13724                                  
 13725                                  Win386Init:
 13726                                  		; 12/12/2022
