 14868                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14869                                  
 14870                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14871                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 14872                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14873                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 14874                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14875                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14876                                  
 14877                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14878 000017F4 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14879 000017F6 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14879 000017FF 736B6574746520666F-
 14879 00001808 7220647269766520   
 14880                                  
 14881                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14882 00001810 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14882 00001819 65737320616E79206B-
 14882 00001822 6579207768656E2072-
 14882 0000182B 656164790D0A       
 14883 00001831 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14884                                  
 14885                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14886                                  
 14887                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14888                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14889                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14890                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14891                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14892                                  
 14893                                  chkopcnt:		
 14894 00001833 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14895 00001838 C3                      		retn
 14896                                  
 14897                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14898                                  
 14899                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14900                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14901                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14902                                  ;
 14903                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14904                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14905                                  
 14906                                  mediacheck:	
 14907 00001839 E89CF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14908 0000183C 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14909 0000183E E84D01                  		call	haschange
 14910 00001841 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14911 00001843 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 14912 00001846 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14913 00001848 50                      		push	ax
 14914 00001849 52                      		push	dx
 14915 0000184A 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14916                                  					; set logical drive number
 14917 0000184E B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14918 00001850 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14919                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14920                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14921 00001852 5A                      		pop	dx
 14922 00001853 58                      		pop	ax
 14923 00001854 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14924 00001856 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14925                                  
 14926                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14927                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14928                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14929                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14930                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14931                                  ; status.
 14932                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14933 00001859 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14934 0000185D 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14935                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14936                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14937                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14938                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14939 00001861 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14940                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14941                                  
 14942                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14943                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14944                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14945                                  
 14946 00001863 50                      		push	ax
 14947 00001864 51                      		push	cx
 14948 00001865 52                      		push	dx
 14949 00001866 E88DED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14950 00001869 5A                      		pop	dx
 14951 0000186A 59                      		pop	cx
 14952 0000186B 58                      		pop	ax
 14953 0000186C 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14954 0000186E 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14955                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14956 00001870 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14957                                  mediaret:				
 14958 00001872 C3                      		retn
 14959                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14960                                  
 14961                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14962                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14963                                  ; or write.
 14964                                  
 14965                                  mediadovolid:				
 14966 00001873 E820EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14967 00001876 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14968 00001878 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14969 0000187B 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14970 0000187D E9EBF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14971                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14972                                  
 14973                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14974                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14975                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14976                                  ; dos.
 14977                                  ;
 14978                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14979                                  
 14980                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14981                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14982                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14983                                  
 14984                                  checklatchio:	
 14985                                  
 14986                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14987                                  			
 14988 00001880 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14989 00001883 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14990                                  
 14991                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14992                                  
 14993 00001885 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 14994 00001888 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14995                                  
 14996                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14997                                  ; expensive verification.
 14998                                  
 14999 0000188A E809EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 15000 0000188D 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 15001 0000188F E81600                  		call	check_vid
 15002 00001892 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 15003 00001894 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15004 00001896 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 15005 00001898 E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 15006                                  checklatchret:				
 15007 0000189B E8CDF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15008                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 15009 0000189E F9                      		stc
 15010 0000189F 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 15011                                  checkret:				
 15012 000018A0 C3                      		retn
 15013                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15014                                  
 15015                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 15016                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 15017                                  ;
 15018                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15019                                  
 15020                                  checkfatvid:				
 15021 000018A1 E8BD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 15022 000018A4 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15023 000018A6 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 15024                                  
 15025                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 15026                                  
 15027                                  		; fall into check_vid
 15028                                  
 15029                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15030                                  
 15031                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 15032                                  ;
 15033                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 15034                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 15035                                  ;
 15036                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 15037                                  ;
 15038                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 15039                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 15040                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 15041                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 15042                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 15043                                  ;
 15044                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 15045                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 15046                                  ; routine.)
 15047                                  ;
 15048                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 15049                                  
 15050                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15051                                  check_vid:
 15052                                  
 15053                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 15054                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 15055                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 15056                                  
 15057 000018A8 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 15058                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 15059                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 15060 000018AD 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 15061 000018AF E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 15062 000018B2 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 15063 000018B4 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15064 000018B6 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 15065                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 15066 000018BB 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 15067                                  					; if not fat system
 15068 000018BD E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 15069 000018C0 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 15070 000018C2 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 15071 000018C5 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15072                                  					; definitely changed
 15073 000018C8 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 15074                                  
 15075 000018CA 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 15076                                  vid_no_changed:				
 15077 000018CB E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 15078                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15079                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 15080                                  		;clc
 15081                                  checkfatret:				
 15082 000018CE C3                      		retn
 15083                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15084                                  
 15085                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15086                                  changed_drv:
 15087 000018CF F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 15088 000018D0 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 15089                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 15090 000018D5 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 15091                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15092                                  
 15093                                  ; extended id check
 15094                                  
 15095                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15096                                  
 15097                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 15098                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 15099                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 15100                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 15101                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 15102                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 15103                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 15104                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 15105                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 15106                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 15107                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 15108                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 15109                                  ;
 15110                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 15111                                  
 15112                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15113                                  do_ext_check_id:
 15114 000018D6 50                      		push	ax
 15115                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 15116                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 15117 000018D7 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 15118                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15119 000018DA 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15120 000018DC 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 15121 000018E0 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15122 000018E2 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 15123 000018E5 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 15124 000018E9 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15125                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 15126                                  					; don't know
 15127 000018EB 58                      		pop	ax
 15128 000018EC EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 15129                                  					; reset the flag
 15130                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15131                                  
 15132                                  ext_changed:
 15133 000018EE 58                      		pop	ax
 15134                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15135 000018EF 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 15136                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15137                                  					; disk changed!
 15138                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15139                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 15140                                  		;clc
 15141 000018F0 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 15142                                  
 15143                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15144                                  
 15145                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 15146                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 15147                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 15148                                  ;
 15149                                  ; es:di -> bds
 15150                                  
 15151                                  checkio:				
 15152 000018F2 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 15153 000018F5 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 15154 000018F7 E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15155 000018FA 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 15156 000018FC E897ED                  		call	GetBp
 15157 000018FF 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 15158 00001901 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 15159 00001904 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 15160 00001906 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15161 00001908 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 15162 0000190A 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 15163 0000190B C3                      		retn
 15164                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15165                                  
 15166                                  checkioerr:				
 15167 0000190C E80700                  		call	returnvid
 15168                                  
 15169                                  checkioret:				
 15170 0000190F F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 15171 00001910 E908F3                  		jmp	harderr
 15172                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15173                                  
 15174                                  no_error_map:				
 15175 00001913 E908F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 15176                                  
 15177                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15178                                  
 15179                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 15180                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 15181                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 15182                                  
 15183                                  returnvid:		
 15184 00001916 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 15185                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 15186 00001919 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 15187 0000191C B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 15188 0000191E F9                      		stc
 15189 0000191F C3                      		retn
 15190                                  
 15191                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15192                                  
 15193                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 15194                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 15195                                  ;
 15196                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 15197                                  ; **trashes si**
 15198                                  
 15199                                  media_set_vid:				
 15200 00001920 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 15201                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 15202                                  
 15203                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 15204                                  
 15205                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15206                                  
 15207                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 15208                                  
 15209                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15210                                  vid_into_packet:
 15211 00001923 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 15212 00001924 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 15213 00001928 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15214 0000192B 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 15215 0000192D 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15216 00001930 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 15217 00001933 1F                      		pop	ds
 15218                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 15219 00001934 C3                      		retn
 15220                                  
 15221                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15222                                  
 15223                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15224                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 15225                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 15226                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 15227                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 15228                                  ;
 15229                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 15230                                  ;		ah has media byte
 15231                                  ;
 15232                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 15233                                  ;		    no registers modified
 15234                                  ;		carry set
 15235                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 15236                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 15237                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 15238                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 15239                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 15240                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 15241                                  ;
 15242                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15243                                  
 15244                                  hidensity:
 15245                                  
 15246                                  ; check for correct drive
 15247                                  		
 15248                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15249 00001935 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15250                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 15251                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 15252 0000193A 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 15253                                  
 15254                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 15255                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 15256                                  
 15257 0000193C 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 15258 00001941 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 15259                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 15260                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 15261 00001943 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 15262 00001946 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 15263                                  
 15264                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 15265                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 15266                                  
 15267                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15268 00001948 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15269 0000194C 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 15270                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15271                                  					; ffOther
 15272 0000194E 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 15273 00001950 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 15274                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15275                                  					; ff288
 15276 00001952 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 15277 00001954 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 15278 00001956 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 15279                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 15280                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 15281 00001959 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 15282                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 15283                                  					; 2 sides
 15284                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15285 0000195C 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 15286 0000195D BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 15287                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 15288                                  					; & head max
 15289                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15290 00001960 E9A5ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 15291                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15292                                  
 15293                                  Is720K:
 15294                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15295 00001963 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 15296                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15297 00001964 E968ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 15298                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15299                                  
 15300                                  		; 18/12/2022
 15301                                  ;dofloppy:
 15302                                  		;retn
 15303                                  
 15304                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15305                                  
 15306                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15307                                  
 15308                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15309                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 15310                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 15311                                  ;
 15312                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 15313                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 15314                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15315                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 15316                                  ;
 15317                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 15318                                  ;
 15319                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 15320                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15321                                  
 15322                                  set_changed_dl:	
 15323 00001967 06                      		push	es
 15324 00001968 57                      		push	di
 15325                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 15326                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15327 00001969 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 15328                                  
 15329                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 15330                                  
 15331                                  scan_bds:				
 15332 0000196D 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15333 00001971 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 15334                                  
 15335                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 15336                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 15337                                  
 15338 00001973 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15339                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 15340                                  get_next_bds:				
 15341 00001977 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 15342                                  					; go to	next bds
 15343 0000197A 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 15344 0000197D 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 15345 0000197F 5F                      		pop	di
 15346 00001980 07                      		pop	es
 15347 00001981 C3                      		retn
 15348                                  
 15349                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15350                                  
 15351                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15352                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15353                                  ;
 15354                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15355                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 15356                                  ;		zero reset - change
 15357                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15358                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15359                                  
 15360                                  checkromchange:	
 15361                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 15362                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15363 00001982 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 15364                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15365                                  					; fchanged
 15366 00001987 C3                      		retn
 15367                                  
 15368                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15369                                  
 15370                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15371                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 15372                                  ;
 15373                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15374                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15375                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15376                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15377                                  
 15378                                  resetchanged:	
 15379                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 15380                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15381 00001988 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 15382                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15383                                  					; ~fchanged
 15384 0000198D C3                      		retn
 15385                                  
 15386                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15387                                  
 15388                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15389                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15390                                  ;
 15391                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15392                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15393                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15394                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15395                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15396                                  
 15397                                  haschange:
 15398                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15399                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15400 0000198E 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15401                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15402                                  					; fchangeline
 15403 00001993 C3                      		retn
 15404                                  
 15405                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15406                                  
 15407                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15408                                  
 15409                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15410                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15411                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15412                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15413                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15414                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15415                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15416                                  
 15417                                  ; set_volume_id
 15418                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15419                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15420                                  ;
 15421                                  ;   on entry:
 15422                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15423                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15424                                  ;
 15425                                  ;   on exit:
 15426                                  ;	carry clear:
 15427                                  ;	   successful call
 15428                                  ;	carry set
 15429                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15430                                  
 15431                                  set_volume_id:				
 15432 00001994 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15433 00001995 50                      		push	ax
 15434 00001996 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15435 00001999 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15436 0000199B E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15437 0000199E 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15438 000019A0 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15439 000019A3 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15440                                  setvret:				
 15441                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15442                                  		; cf = 0
 15443                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15444 000019A6 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15445 000019A7 5A                      		pop	dx
 15446 000019A8 C3                      		retn
 15447                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15448                                  
 15449                                  seterr:					
 15450 000019A9 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15451 000019AA 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15452 000019AB C3                      		retn
 15453                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15454 000019AC 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15455                                  
 15456                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15457                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15458                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15459                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15460                                  
 15461                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15462                                  
 15463                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15464                                  
 15465                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15466                                  ;
 15467                                  ;   on entry:
 15468                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15469                                  ;
 15470                                  ;   on exit:
 15471                                  ;	carry clear
 15472                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15473                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15474                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15475                                  ;
 15476                                  ;	carry set:
 15477                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15478                                  
 15479                                  read_volume_id:
 15480 000019AE 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15481 000019AF 51                      		push	cx
 15482 000019B0 53                      		push	bx
 15483 000019B1 50                      		push	ax
 15484 000019B2 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15485 000019B3 57                      		push	di
 15486 000019B4 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15487 000019B5 07                      		pop	es
 15488 000019B6 BF[AB08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15489 000019B9 BE[9F08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15490                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 15491 000019BC B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15492 000019BF F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15493 000019C1 5F                      		pop	di
 15494 000019C2 07                      		pop	es
 15495 000019C3 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15496                                  					; # of fats
 15497 000019C7 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15498                                  					; sectors / fat
 15499 000019CB F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15500 000019CD 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15501                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15502                                  					;
 15503                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15504                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15505 000019D1 2EA3[AC19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15506                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15507                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15508 000019D5 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15509                                  					; # root dir entries
 15510 000019D9 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15511 000019DB D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15512                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15513                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15514 000019DD 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15515                                  next_sec:
 15516 000019DE 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15517 000019DF 2EA1[AC19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15518                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15519                                  					; get sector #
 15520 000019E3 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15521                                  					; sectors / track
 15522 000019E7 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15523 000019E9 F7F1                    		div	cx
 15524                                  
 15525                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15526                                  
 15527 000019EB 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15528                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15529 000019EC 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15530 000019EE 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15531 000019F0 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15532                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15533 000019F4 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15534 000019F6 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15535 000019F8 E81BEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15536                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15537 000019FB 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15538 000019FD B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15539 00001A00 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15540                                  fvid_loop:
 15541                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15542 00001A02 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 15543                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15544 00001A04 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15545 00001A06 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15546 00001A09 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15547 00001A0B 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15548 00001A0E 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15549                                  ent_loop:
 15550 00001A10 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15551 00001A13 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15552 00001A15 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15553 00001A16 2EFF06[AC19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15554                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15555                                  					; next sector
 15556 00001A1B E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15557                                  notfound:
 15558                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15559                                  		;xor	si, si
 15560 00001A1D EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15561                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15562                                  
 15563                                  found_vid:
 15564                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15565                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  			
 15566 00001A1F 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15567 00001A20 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15568 00001A22 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15569 00001A23 57                      		push	di
 15570 00001A24 1E                      		push	ds
 15571 00001A25 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15572 00001A26 BF[AB08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15573 00001A29 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15574                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15575 00001A2C F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15576                                  		;xor	al, al
 15577                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15578 00001A2E 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15579 00001A2F AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15580                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15581                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15582                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15583 00001A30 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15584 00001A31 07                      		pop	es
 15585                                  fvid_ret:
 15586                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15587 00001A32 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15588                                  				
 15589 00001A34 58                      		pop	ax
 15590                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15591                                  		; cf = 0
 15592                                  		;clc
 15593                                  rvidret:
 15594 00001A35 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15595 00001A36 59                      		pop	cx
 15596 00001A37 5A                      		pop	dx
 15597 00001A38 C3                      		retn
 15598                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15599                                  
 15600                                  no_vid:
 15601 00001A39 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15602                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15603                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15604 00001A3A EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15605                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15606                                  
 15607                                  readviderr:
 15608 00001A3C 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15609 00001A3D 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15610 00001A3E EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15611                                  
 15612                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15613                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15614                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15615                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15616 00001A40 BE[AB08]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15617                                  		;
 15618                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15619                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15620                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15621                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15622 00001A43 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15623 00001A46 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15624                                  		;
 15625 00001A49 FC                      		cld
 15626 00001A4A C3                      		retn
 15627                                  
 15628                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15629                                  
 15630                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15631                                  ;
 15632                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15633                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15634                                  
 15635                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15636 00001A4B 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15637 00001A4C 56                      		push	si
 15638 00001A4D 51                      		push	cx
 15639                                  		
 15640                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15641                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15642                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15643                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15644                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15645                                  		;cld
 15646                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15647 00001A4E E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15648                                  
 15649 00001A51 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15650 00001A53 59                      		pop	cx
 15651 00001A54 5E                      		pop	si
 15652 00001A55 5F                      		pop	di
 15653 00001A56 C3                      		retn
 15654                                  
 15655                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15656                                  
 15657                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15658                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15659                                  ;
 15660                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15661                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15662                                  
 15663                                  check_volume_id:
 15664 00001A57 57                      		push	di
 15665 00001A58 51                      		push	cx
 15666                                  		
 15667                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15668                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15669                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15670                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15671                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15672                                  		;cld
 15673                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15674 00001A59 E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15675                                  
 15676 00001A5C F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15677 00001A5E 59                      		pop	cx
 15678 00001A5F 5F                      		pop	di
 15679 00001A60 C3                      		retn
 15680                                  
 15681                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15682                                  
 15683                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15684                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15685                                  ;
 15686                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15687                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15688                                  ;
 15689                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15690                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15691                                  ;
 15692                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15693                                  
 15694                                  fat_check:		
 15695 00001A61 50                      		push	ax
 15696 00001A62 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15697 00001A64 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15698 00001A67 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15699                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15700 00001A6B 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15701 00001A6D 4E                      		dec	si
 15702                                  okret1:					
 15703 00001A6E 58                      		pop	ax
 15704 00001A6F C3                      		retn
 15705                                  
 15706                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15707                                  
 15708                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 15709                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15710                                  
 15711                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15712                                  
 15713                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15714                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15715                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15716                                  
 15717                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15718                                  
 15719                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15720                                  		;db 0
 15721                                  
 15722                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15723                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15724                                  
 15725                                  %if number2mod>0 & number2mod<16
 15726 00001A70 00<rep 10h>             		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15727                                  %endif
 15728                                  
 15729                                  ;align 16
 15730                                  
 15731                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15732                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15733                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 15734                                  ; 13/12/2022
 15735                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 15736                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 15737                                  
 15738                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
 15739                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 15740
