 31375                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31376                                  ;*** UmbHead - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 31377                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31378                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 31379                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 31380                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 31381                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31382                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31383                                  ; Early in the boot-cycle, the pointer used to obtain this value isn't set up;
 31384                                  ; to be precise, before a UMB provider is around. In this event, the pointer
 31385                                  ; is always set to 0xFFFF; it changes once a provider is around. On most
 31386                                  ; machines (all of 'em I've seen), it changes to 0x9FFF at that point.
 31387                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31388                                  
 31389                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31390                                  UmbHead:
 31391                                  	; 13/05/2019 (because of callers, pushs & pops are not needed here)
 31392                                  
 31393                                  	;push	si ; ?
 31394                                  	;push	ds ; ? 
 31395                                  	;push	es
 31396                                  	;push	bx ; *	
 31397                                  
 31398                                  	; 09/04/2019
 31399                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 31400                                  
 31401 00002C3B B452                    	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31402 00002C3D CD21                    	int	21h
 31403                                  
 31404 00002C3F 26A18C00                	mov	ax,[es:DOS_UMB_HEAD]	; And read what's in ES:[008C]
 31405                                  	
 31406                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31407 00002C43 83F8FF                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31408 00002C46 F5                      	cmc
 31409                                  	; if AX=0FFFFh -> CF=1
 31410 00002C47 C3                      	retn
 31411                                  
 31412                                  ; 01/01/2023
 31413                                  ;%if 0
 31414                                  ;	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31415                                  ;	je	short uhE		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 31416                                  ;
 31417                                  ;	clc				; Else, it isn't (CLC done by prev cmp)
 31418                                  ;	;jmp	short uhX
 31419                                  ;	; 12/12/2022
 31420                                  ;	retn
 31421                                  ;uhE:	
 31422                                  ;	stc
 31423                                  ;uhX:	
 31424                                  ;	;pop	bx ; *

 31427                                  ;	;pop	si ; ?

 31431                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31432                                  ;*** isSysMCB - sets ZF if ES points to an MCB owned by "SC" + (8 or 9)
 31433                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31434                                  ; ENTRY:  ES:0 should point to a valid MCB
 31435                                  ; EXIT:   ZF set if owned by SC+8 or SC+9 (for japan)
 31436                                  ; USES:   Flags
 31437                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31438                                  
 31439                                  isSysMCB:
 31440                                  	;push	ax
 31441                                  
 31442                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 31443                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 31444                                  	;je	short ism10
 31445                                  	;cmp	ax,JapanPSPOwner	; 9 (for Japan) is valid
 31446                                  	;;je	short ism10
 31447                                  	;;jmp	short ismX		; Anything else isn't.
 31448                                  	;jne	short ismX
 31449 00002C48 26833E010008            	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8  ; 09/04/2019
 31450 00002C4E 7507                    	jne	short ismX 
 31451                                  ism10:	
 31452                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]	; Check the name...
 31453                                  	;cmp	ax,'SC' ; 4353h
 31454 00002C50 26813E08005343          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 31455                                  ismX:	
 31456                                  	;pop	ax
 31457 00002C57 C3                      	retn

 31459                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31460                                  
 31461                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31462                                  ;*** AddrToUmb - converts a segment address in AX to its appropriate UMB number
 31463                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31464                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a segment address
 31465                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain the UMB number which contains the address (0==conv)
 31466                                  ; ERROR:  If the address is above UM Range, AX will return as FFFF.
 31467                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31468                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31469                                  ; An address in the following areas is treated as:
 31470                                  ;    0      <-> umbhead (0x9FFF)          = Conventional memory
 31471                                  ;    0x9FFF <-> addr of first UM sys MCB  = UMB #1
 31472                                  ;      ...
 31473                                  ;    addr of last UM sys MCB <-> TOM      = invalid; returns #0xFFFF
 31474                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31475                                  
 31476                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31477                                  AddrToUmb:
 31478                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31479                                  	;push	cx
 31480                                  	;push	dx
 31481 00002C58 06                      	push	es
 31482                                  
 31483 00002C59 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX = address to search for
 31484                                  
 31485 00002C5B E8DDFF                  	call	UmbHead		; AX = first segment
 31486 00002C5E 7222                    	jc	short atuE	; If it couldn't get it, error out.
 31487                                  
 31488                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31489                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *	; ES = first UMB segment
 31490 00002C60 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now... (cx = UMB#)
 31491                                  
 31492                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31493                                  atu10:
 31494 00002C62 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; ** ; 22/07/2023
 31495                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 31496                                  ; ATU10--ES - Current MCB address
 31497                                  ;        DX - Address given for conversion
 31498                                  ;        CX - Current UMB #
 31499                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 31500                                  
 31501                                  ;atu10:	
 31502                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 18/07/2023
 31503 00002C64 39D0                            cmp	ax,dx		; Present segment >= given segment?
 31504 00002C66 731D                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep--done.
 31505                                  
 31506 00002C68 E8DDFF                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if this is a system MCB
 31507 00002C6B 7501                    	jnz	short atu20
 31508                                  
 31509 00002C6D 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ a system MCB, we're in a new UMB.
 31510                                  atu20:	
 31511                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31512                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 31513                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31514                                  	; ax = es
 31515                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31516 00002C6E 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31517 00002C73 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 31518 00002C79 7403                    	je	short atu30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31519                                  
 31520                                  	;NextMCB es,ax
 31521                                  
 31522                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31523                                  	;;add	ax,[es:3]
 31524                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31525 00002C7B 40                      	inc	ax
 31526                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31527                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 31528 00002C7C EBE4                    	jmp	short atu10
 31529                                  
 31530                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31531                                  ; if we get to atu30, they specified a number that was past the last MCB.
 31532                                  ; make sure it's not _inside_ that MCB before we return an error condition.
 31533                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31534                                  
 31535                                  atu30:	
 31536                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31537                                  	; ax = es + [es:ARENA.SIZE] 
 31538                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31539                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE] ; **
 31540 00002C7E 39D0                    	cmp	ax,dx		; Present >= given?
 31541 00002C80 7303                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep! It _was_ inside.
 31542                                  atuE:	
 31543 00002C82 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Else, fall through with UMB # == -1
 31544 00002C84 49                      	dec	cx		; (that makes it return 0xFFFF and sets CF)
 31545                                  atuX:	
 31546 00002C85 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx		; Return the UMB number in AX
 31547                                  	
 31548 00002C87 07                      	pop	es	
 31549                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31550                                  	;pop	dx
 31551                                  	;pop	cx
 31552 00002C88 C3                      	retn
 31553                                  
 31554                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31555                                  ;*** convUMB - checks after GetXNum to convert an address to a UMB number
 31556                                  ;            -- if GetXNum read a hex number, we interperete that as a segment
 31557                                  ; address rather than a UMB number... and use that address to look up a UMB.
 31558                                  ; This routine checks for that condition and calls AddrToUmb if necessary.
 31559                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31560                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a UMB number or segment, gnradix has been set by GetXNum
 31561                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain a UMB number
 31562                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31563                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31564                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31565                                  
 31566                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31567                                  convUMB:
 31568 00002C89 2E833E[8C2B]10          	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16
 31569 00002C8F 7507                    	jne	short cu10	; If it didn't read in hex, it's not an address
 31570 00002C91 E8C4FF                  	call	AddrToUmb	; Else, convert the address to a UMB number
 31571                                  	;cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31572                                  	;jne	short cu10
 31573                                  	;inc	ax		; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 31574                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31575 00002C94 40                      	inc	ax
 31576 00002C95 7401                    	jz	short cu10	; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 31577 00002C97 48                      	dec	ax
 31578                                  cu10:	
 31579 00002C98 C3                      	retn

 31609                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31610                                  ;*** loadLow - returns AL==0 if UMB0 == 0, else AL==1
 31611                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31612                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 31613                                  ; EXIT:   AL==0 if mem strategy should be set to LOW_FIRST, else AL==1
 31614                                  ;         Carry set if UMB0 not specified (_NOT_ an error)
 31615                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31616                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_strat, fm_umb
 31617                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31618                                  ; We want to set the memory strategy to LOW_FIRST if the user specified a
 31619                                  ; load UMB, and it is 0. That 0 can be either from the user having _specified_
 31620                                  ; zero (/L:0;...), or from having specified a too-big min size (/L:1,99999999)
 31621                                  ; such that the load UMB is too small, and shouldn't be used.
 31622                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31623                                  
 31624                                  loadLow:
 31625                                  	;push	ds
 31626                                  	;push	cs		; Point DS into appropriate data segment
 31627                                  	;pop	ds	
 31628                                  
 31629                                  	;mov	al,[UmbLoad]
 31630                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad]
 31631                                  	cmp	al,UNSPECIFIED ; 0FFh, -1
 31632                                  	jne	short ll10
 31633                                  
 31634                                  	stc
 31635                                  ll15:
 31636                                  	mov	al,1		; Return with AL==1 && STC if no UMBs specified
 31637                                  	;stc
 31638                                  	;jmp	short llX
 31639                                  	retn
 31640                                  ll10:	
 31641                                  	or	al,al		; AL=the load UMB: Is it == 0?
 31642                                  	;jz	short llX	; Yep... CF==0 (from OR) && AL=0, so just exit
 31643                                  
 31644                                  	jnz	short ll15	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31645                                  	retn
 31646                                  
 31647                                  	;mov	al,1
 31648                                  	;clc
 31649                                  ;llX:
 31650                                  	;pop	ds		; Return DS to where it was
 31651                                  	;retn
 31652                                  
 31653                                  %endif
 31654

 32116                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32117                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 32118                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 32119                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32120                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32121                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 32122                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 32123                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 32124                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32125

 32134

 32136

 32138                                  
 32139 00002D66 E8D2FE                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 32140                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32141                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 32142 00002D69 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 32143                                  
 32144                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32145                                  fu10:
 32146 00002D6B 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; **
 32147                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32148                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 32149                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 32150                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 32151                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32152                                  
 32153                                  ;fu10:	
 32154 00002D6D 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 32155 00002D6F 7417                    	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 32156                                  
 32157 00002D71 E8D4FE                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 32158 00002D74 7501                    	jnz	short fu20
 32159                                  
 32160 00002D76 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 32161                                  fu20:	
 32162                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32163                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32164                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32165 00002D77 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end 
 32166 00002D7D 7408                    	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 32167                                  
 32168                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 32169                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32170                                  	; ax = es

 32173 00002D7F 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32174 00002D84 40                      	inc	ax
 32175                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32176                                  	;mov	es,ax ; **
 32177 00002D85 EBE4                    	jmp	short fu10
 32178                                  fuE:	
 32179 00002D87 F9                      	stc
 32180                                  fuX:
 32181                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32182                                  	;pop	dx
 32183                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32184 00002D88 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 32185                                  	;pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 32186 00002D89 C3                      	retn
 32187                                  
 32188                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32189                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 32190                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32191                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32192                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 32193                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 32194                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 32195                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32196                                  
 32197                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 32198                                  BigFree:
 32199                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32200                                  	;push	bx
 32201 00002D8A 51                      	push	cx
 32202                                  
 32203 00002D8B E8D3FF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 32204 00002D8E 723A                    	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 32205                                  
 32206 00002D90 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 32207 00002D92 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 32208                                  
 32209                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32210                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 32211                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 32212                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 32213                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32214                                  
 32215                                  bf10:	
 32216 00002D94 E8B1FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 32217 00002D97 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 32218                                  
 32219                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 32220 00002D99 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 32221 00002D9F 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 32222                                  
 32223 00002DA1 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32224                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 32225 00002DA5 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 32226                                  	;jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 32227                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32228 00002DA7 7D04                    	jge	short bf20
 32229                                  
 32230 00002DA9 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 32231                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 32232 00002DAB 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32233                                  
 32234                                  bf20:	
 32235                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32236                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 32237                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32238                                  	;cmp	byte [es:0],'Z'
 32239 00002DAD 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32240 00002DB3 740C                    	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 32241                                  
 32242                                  	;NextMCB es,ax			; Go on forward.
 32243 00002DB5 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 32244                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32245 00002DB7 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32246 00002DBC 40                      	inc     ax
 32247 00002DBD 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 32248                                  
 32249 00002DBF EBD3                    	jmp	short bf10
 32250                                  
 32251 00002DC1 8EC3                    bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 32252 00002DC3 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 32253 00002DC5 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 32254 00002DC7 7501                    	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 32255                                  bfE:	
 32256 00002DC9 F9                      	stc
 32257                                  bfX:
 32258 00002DCA 59                      	pop	cx
 32259                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32260                                  	;pop	bx
 32261 00002DCB C3                      	retn
 32262                                  
 32263                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32264                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 32265                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32266                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32267                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 32268                                  ; ERROR:    None

 32280

 32283                                  	;push	ds

 32288

 32292 00002DD0 8A87[361F]              	mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 32293                                  
 32294 00002DD4 08C0                    	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 32295

 32298                                  	;pop	ax

 32300 00002DD6 C3                      	retn
 32301                                  
 32302                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32303                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 32304                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32305                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 32306                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 32307                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 32308                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32309                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32310                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 32311                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 32312                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 32313                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 32314                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 32315                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32316                                  
 32317                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 32318                                  
 32319                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32320                                  
 32321                                  shrinkMCB:
 32322                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 32323                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32324                                  	;push	bx
 32325 00002DD7 51                      	push	cx
 32326 00002DD8 06                      	push	es
 32327                                  
 32328 00002DD9 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 32329                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32330                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 32331                                  
 32332 00002DDB 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32333                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32334 00002DE0 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 32335                                  
 32336 00002DE2 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 32337                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 32338                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 32339                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 32340                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32341                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 32342                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32343 00002DE5 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 32344 00002DE7 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 32345                                  
 32346 00002DE9 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32347                                  	
 32348                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32349                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32350 00002DEE 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32351                                  
 32352 00002DF0 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 32353 00002DF5 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 32354                                  
 32355 00002DFB 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 32356 00002DFD 40                      	inc	ax
 32357 00002DFE 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 32358                                  
 32359 00002E00 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 32360 00002E02 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 32361                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32362                                  	; ax > 0
 32363 00002E04 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 32364                                  
 32365                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32366 00002E05 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 32367                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 32368 00002E0A 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 32369                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32370                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 32371                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 32372                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 32373                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 32374                                  
 32375                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32376 00002E0E E8A801                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 32377                                  
 32378                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32379                                  	; cf=0
 32380                                  	;clc
 32381                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32382                                  	;jmp	short smX
 32383                                  smE:	
 32384                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32385                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 32386                                  	;stc
 32387                                  smX:	
 32388                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 32389 00002E11 07                      	pop	es
 32390 00002E12 59                      	pop	cx
 32391                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32392                                  	;pop	bx
 32393 00002E13 C3                      	retn
 32394                                  
 32395                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32396                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 32397                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32398                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 32399                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 32400                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32401                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 32402                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32403                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 32404                                  ;
 32405                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 32406                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 32407                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 32408                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 32409                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 32410                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 32411                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 32412                                  ;       Endif
 32413                                  ;    Endif
 32414                                  ; Endif
 32415                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 32416                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 32417                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 32418                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 32419                                  ;    ENDIF
 32420                                  ; ENDIF
 32421                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32422                                  
 32423                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32424                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 32425                                  _hideUMB_:
 32426                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32427                                  	; ds = cs
 32428                                  
 32429                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32430                                  	;push	bx
 32431                                  	;push	dx
 32432 00002E14 06                      	push	es
 32433                                  
 32434 00002E15 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 32435 00002E17 E8B2FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 32436 00002E1A 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 32437                                  
 32438 00002E1C 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 32439 00002E1E E869FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 32440 00002E21 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 32441                                  
 32442 00002E23 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 32443 00002E24 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 32444 00002E26 E8AAFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 32445 00002E29 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 32446                                  
 32447 00002E2A 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 32448 00002E2C 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 32449                                  
 32450 00002E2E 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 32451 00002E30 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 32452                                  
 32453 00002E32 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 32454 00002E34 E81DFD                  	call	unMarkUMB
 32455 00002E37 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 32456                                  hu_10:	
 32457                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 32458                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 32459                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32460                                  ;isTiny:
 32461                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 32462                                  	;or	al,al
 32463 00002E39 800E[321F]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 32464 00002E3E 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 32465                                  
 32466 00002E40 E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 32467 00002E43 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 32468                                  
 32469 00002E45 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 32470 00002E47 EB09                    	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 32471                                  
 32472 00002E49 89C8                    hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 32473 00002E4B E87EFF                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 32474 00002E4E 7510                    	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 32475                                  
 32476 00002E50 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 32477                                  hu_30:	
 32478 00002E52 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 32479                                  
 32480 00002E54 E89DFE                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 32481                                  
 32482 00002E57 09D2                    	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 32483 00002E59 7405                    	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 32484                                  
 32485 00002E5B 8EC2                    	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 32486 00002E5D E8E6FE                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 32487                                  hu_X:	
 32488 00002E60 07                      	pop	es
 32489                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32490                                  	;pop	dx
 32491                                  	;pop	bx
 32492 00002E61 C3                      	retn
 32493                                  
 32494                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32495                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 32496                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32497                                  ; Entry:  None
 32498                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 32499                                  ; Error:  None
 32500                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 32501                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32502                                  
 32503                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32504                                  UnFreeze:
 32505                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32506                                  	;push	ax
 32507 00002E62 06                      	push	es
 32508                                  
 32509 00002E63 E8D5FD                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 32510 00002E66 721C                    	jc	short ufX
 32511                                  
 32512                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32513                                  uf10:
 32514 00002E68 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; *
 32515                                  
 32516                                  ; ------------------------------
 32517                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 32518                                  ; ------------------------------
 32519                                  
 32520                                  ;uf10:	
 32521 00002E6A E81900                  	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 32522 00002E6D 7505                    	jnz	short uf20
 32523 00002E6F E8D4FE                  	call	unHideMCB
 32524                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32525                                  	; ax <> es
 32526 00002E72 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es ; *
 32527                                  uf20:	
 32528                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32529                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32530                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32531 00002E74 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32532 00002E7A 7408                    	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.. that's it.
 32533                                  
 32534                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 32535                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32536                                  	; ax = es
 32537                                  	;mov	ax,es ; *
 32538                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32539 00002E7C 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32540 00002E81 40                      	inc	ax
 32541                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32542                                  	;mov	es,ax
 32543 00002E82 EBE4                    	jmp	short uf10
 32544                                  ufX:	
 32545 00002E84 07                      	pop	es
 32546                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32547                                  	;pop	ax
 32548 00002E85 C3                      	retn
 32549                                  
 32550                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32551                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 32552                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32553                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 32554                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 32555                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32556                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32557                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32558                                  
 32559                                  isFrozMCB:
 32560                                  	;push	ax
 32561                                  
 32562                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 32563                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 32564 00002E86 26833E010008            	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 32565 00002E8C 7522                    	jne	short ifmX
 32566                                  
 32567                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 32568                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 32569 00002E8E 26813E08004652          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 32570 00002E95 7519                    	jne	short ifmX
 32571                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 32572                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 32573 00002E97 26813E0A004F5A          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 32574 00002E9E 7510                    	jne	short ifmX
 32575                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 32576                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 32577 00002EA0 26813E0C00454E          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 32578 00002EA7 7507                    	jne	short ifmX
 32579                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 32580                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32581 00002EA9 26813E0E002020          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 32582                                  ifmX:	
 32583                                  	;pop	ax
 32584 00002EB0 C3                      	retn
 32585                                  
 32586                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32587                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 32588                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 32600 00002ECD 26C7060E002020          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '

 32602                                  
 32603                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32604                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 32605                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32606                                  ; Entry:  None
 32607                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 32608                                  ; Error:  None
 32609                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 32610                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32611                                  
 32612                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2  
 32613                                  FreezeUM:
 32614                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32615                                  	;push	ax
 32616                                  	;push	cx
 32617                                  	;push	dx
 32618 00002ED5 06                      	push	es
 32619                                  
 32620                                  	;;call	GetLoadUMB
 32621                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32622                                  	; ds = cs
 32623                                  	;mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32624 00002ED6 A0[351F]                	mov	al,[UmbLoad] 	
 32625                                  
 32626 00002ED9 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 32627 00002EDB 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 32628                                  
 32629 00002EDD E85BFD                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 32630                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32631                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 32632 00002EE0 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 32633                                  
 32634                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32635                                  fum10:

 32688                                  ; ERROR:    None

 33095                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------

 33099                                  
 33100                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33101                                  ;
 33102                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 33103                                  ;
 33104                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 33105                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 33106                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 33107                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 33108                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 33109                                  ;
 33110                                  ;	Output : none
 33111                                  ;
 33112                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 33113                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 33114                                  ;
 33115                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33116                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 33117                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 33118                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 33119                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 33120                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33121                                  
 33122                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33123                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33124                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 33125                                  InitDevLoad:
 33126                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33127                                  	;push	es ; *
 33128                                  
 33129                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33130                                  	; ds = cs
 33131 00002FF3 803E[871F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 33132                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 33133                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 33134 00002FF8 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 33135                                  
 33136                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33137                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33138                                  ; %if 0
 33139                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33140 00002FFA 803E[771F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 33141                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 33142 00002FFF 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 33143                                  
 33144                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 33145                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 33146                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 33147                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 33148                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 33149                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 33150                                  
 33151 00003001 E85904                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 33152                                  
 33153 00003004 E892FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 33154 00003007 E8CBFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 33155 0000300A E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 33156 0000300D 9C                      	pushf
 33157 0000300E E851FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 33158 00003011 9D                      	popf
 33159                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 33160                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 33161                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 33162 00003012 EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 33163                                  
 33164                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 33165                                  
 33166                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33167                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 33168                                  InitForConv:
 33169                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33170                                  	; ds = cs
 33171 00003014 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 33172                                  					;  current UMB ?
 33173 00003017 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 33174 00003019 E84104                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 33175 0000301C E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 33176                                  idl0: ; 06/07/2023
 33177 0000301F 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 33178                                  					;  in low memory
 33179                                  InitForHi:
 33180                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33181                                  	; ds = cs
 33182                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 33183                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 33184                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 33185 00003021 A1[7D1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 33186 00003024 8B16[791F]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 33187 00003028 0316[7B1F]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 33188 0000302C EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 33189                                  
 33190                                  InitForLo:
 33191                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33192                                  	; ds = cs
 33193                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 33194 0000302E C606[871F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 33195                                  initforlo_x:
 33196                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33197                                  	; ds = cs
 33198                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 33199                                  					;  we are loading low
 33200                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 33201                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 33202 00003033 A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 33203 00003036 8B16[A502]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 33204                                  idl1:
 33205 0000303A E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 33206                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33207                                  	; ds = cs
 33208                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 33209                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 33210                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 33211                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 33212 0000303D A3[6B1F]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 33213 00003040 8916[6D1F]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 33214 00003044 C706[6F1F]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 33215 0000304A A3[711F]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 33216                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33217                                  	;pop	es ; *
 33218 0000304D C3                      	retn
 33219                                  
 33220                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33221                                  ;
 33222                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 33223                                  ;
 33224                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 33225                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 33226                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 33227                                  ;		   current UMB
 33228                                  ;

 33260                                  ;
 33261                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 33262                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 33263                                  ;

 33276                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax

 33281                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33282                                  ;
 33283                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 33284                                  ;
 33285                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 33286                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 33287                                  ;		 the device.
 33288                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 33289                                  ;
 33290                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 33291                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 33292                                  ;	UMB.
 33293                                  ;
 33294                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 33295                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 33296                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 33297                                  ;
 33298                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33299                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33300                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 33301                                  
 33302                                  GetUMBForDev:
 33303                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33304                                  	; ds = cs
 33305 00003064 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 33306 00003067 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 33307 0000306A CD21                    	int	21h
 33308                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 33309                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 33310                                  
 33311 0000306C 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 33312                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 33313                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33314 0000306E 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 33315                                  
 33316 00003070 4B                      	dec	bx
 33317                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33318                                  	; ds = cs
 33319 00003071 391E[691F]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 33320                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 33321 00003075 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 33322                                  
 33323 00003077 43                      	inc	bx
 33324                                  
 33325 00003078 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 33326 0000307B CD21                    	int	21h
 33327 0000307D 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 33328                                  
 33329                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33330                                  	;dec	ax
 33331                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 33332                                  	;
 33333                                  PrepareMark:
 33334 0000307F 1E                      	push	ds
 33335 00003080 48                      	dec	ax
 33336 00003081 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33337 00003083 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 33338 00003089 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 33339 0000308F 40                      	inc	ax
 33340 00003090 1F                      	pop	ds
 33341                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33342                                  	; ds = cs
 33343                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 33344                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33345                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33346                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023

 33348 00003095 A3[791F]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 33349 00003098 A3[7D1F]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 33350                                  	;
 33351                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33352                                  	; cf=0
 33353                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 33354 0000309B C3                      	retn
 33355                                  
 33356                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33357                                  %if 1
 33358                                  gufd_err:
 33359 0000309C 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 33360                                  gufd_error:

 33362 000030A0 F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 33363 000030A1 EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 33364                                  %endif
 33365                                  
 33366                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33367                                  %if 0
 33368                                  gufd_err:
 33369                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 33370                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33371                                  	; ds = cs
 33372                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 33373                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33374                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33375                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 33376                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 33377                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 33378                                  	stc
 33379                                  	retn

 33384                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 33385                                  ;
 33386                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 33387                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 33388                                  ;
 33389                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 33390                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 33391                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 33392                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 33393                                  ;
 33394                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 33395                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 33396                                  ;
 33397                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33398

 33414

 33416

 33419                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 33420 000030B4 C536[7C03]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]

 33423 000030BA FC                      	cld
 33424                                  dsm_again:

 33426 000030BC 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 33427 000030BE 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 33428 000030C0 89F7                    	mov	di,si

 33438 000030D0 89FE                    	mov	si,di

 33441 000030D5 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 33442                                  dsm_next_char:

 33456 000030EB 5E                      	pop	si
 33457 000030EC 1F                      	pop	ds
 33458                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33459                                  	;pop	di
 33460 000030ED 07                      	pop	es
 33461 000030EE C3                      	retn

 33913                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33914                                  ;
 33915                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 33916                                  ;
 33917                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 33918                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 33919                                  ;
 33920                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 33921                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 33922                                  ;
 33923                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 33924                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 33925                                  ;
 33926                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33927                                  
 33928                                  ; 13/05/2019
 33929                                  
 33930                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33931                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 33932                                  
 33933                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33934                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 33935                                  GetHexNum:
 33936 00003227 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 33937 00003229 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 33938                                  ghn_next:
 33939 0000322B 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 33940 0000322E 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 33941 00003231 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 33942 00003233 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 33943 00003236 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 33944 00003238 50                      	push	ax
 33945 00003239 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 33946 0000323B E8DA0F                  	call	delim
 33947 0000323E 58                      	pop	ax
 33948                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33949 0000323F B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 33950 00003242 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 33951 00003244 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 33952                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 33953                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33954 00003247 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 33955                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33956                                  	;mov	cx,4
 33957                                  ghn_shift1:
 33958 00003249 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 33959 0000324B D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 33960 0000324D E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 33961 0000324F 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 33962 00003251 46                      	inc	si
 33963 00003252 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 33964                                  ghn_into_paras:
 33965 00003254 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 33966 00003257 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 33967 0000325A F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 33968 0000325E 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 33969                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33970                                  	;mov	cx,4
 33971                                  ghn_shift2:
 33972 00003260 F8                      	clc
 33973 00003261 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 33974 00003263 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 33975 00003265 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 33976 00003267 F8                      	clc
 33977 00003268 C3                      	retn
 33978                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33979                                  ghn_err:
 33980                                  gnib_err:
 33981 00003269 F9                      	stc
 33982                                  ghn_ret:
 33983                                  gnib_ret:
 33984 0000326A C3                      	retn
 33985                                  
 33986                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33987                                  ;
 33988                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 33989                                  ;
 33990                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 33991                                  ;
 33992                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 33993                                  ;
 33994                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 33995                                  ;
 33996                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33997                                  
 33998                                  GetNibble:
 33999 0000326B 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 34000                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 34001                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34002 0000326E 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 34003 00003270 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 34004 00003273 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 34005 00003275 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 34006 00003278 C3                      	retn
 34007                                  is_it_hex:
 34008 00003279 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 34009                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 34010                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34011 0000327C 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 34012 0000327E 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 34013 00003281 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 34014 00003283 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 34015 00003286 C3                      	retn
 34016                                  
 34017                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34018                                  ;gnib_err:
 34019                                  ;	stc
 34020                                  ;gnib_ret:
 34021                                  ;	retn

 34028                                  DOS_ARENA	equ 24h		; offset of arena_head var in DOS data segm.
 34029                                  UMB_ARENA	equ 8Ch		; offset of umb_head in DOS data
