 34035                                  
 34036                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34037                                  ;
 34038                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 34039                                  ;
 34040                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 34041                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 34042                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 34043                                  ;			; DS = data
 34044                                  ;
 34045                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 34046                                  ;
 34047                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 34048                                  ;
 34049                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34050                                  
 34051                                  umb_insert:
 34052 00003287 1E                      	push	ds
 34053                                  
 34054                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34055                                  	; ds = cs
 34056                                  
 34057                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34058 00003288 8E1E[961F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 34059                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 34060 0000328C 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 34061 00003290 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 34062 00003292 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34063                                  ui_next:
 34064 00003294 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 34065                                  					;    new block
 34066 00003296 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 34067                                  					; Q: is current block the
 34068                                  					;    last
 34069 00003298 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34070 0000329E 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 34071                                  					; N: get next block
 34072 000032A0 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 34073                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 34074 000032A2 E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34075 000032A5 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 34076                                  
 34077                                  ui_insert:
 34078 000032A7 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 34079 000032A9 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 34080                                  
 34081 000032AA 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 34082 000032AC F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 34083                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 34084 000032AE C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34085                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 34086 000032B3 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34087                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 34088 000032B9 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 34089                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 34090 000032BD C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34091                                  
 34092                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34093                                  
 34094 000032C3 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34095 000032C5 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34096 000032CB 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 34097                                  					; mark as free
 34098 000032D2 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 34099                                  					; start & end of new block
 34100 000032D5 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 34101                                  
 34102                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 34103                                  	
 34104 000032DA 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 34105 000032DC 43                      	inc	bx
 34106 000032DD 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 34107 000032DF 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 34108                                  
 34109                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 34110                                  					; this block
 34111 000032E0 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 34112                                  	
 34113 000032E2 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34114 000032E8 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34115 000032EF 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34116 000032F3 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34117                                  
 34118 000032FA EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 34119                                  
 34120                                  ui_append:
 34121                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 34122 000032FC 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 34123 00003301 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 34124                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 34125                                  					; block for the next arena.
 34126                                  	; 13/05/2019
 34127 00003307 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34128                                  
 34129 0000330D 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 34130 0000330F 40                      	inc	ax
 34131 00003310 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 34132                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 34133 00003312 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 34134                                  
 34135 00003314 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 34136                                  
 34137 00003316 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34138 0000331C 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34139 00003323 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34140 00003327 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 34141                                  
 34142                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34143 0000332E 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34144 00003330 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 34145 00003336 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 34146                                  					; mark as free
 34147 0000333D 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 34148 0000333E 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 34149                                  ui_done:
 34150                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 34151 00003343 1F                      	pop	ds
 34152                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 34153                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 34154                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 34155 00003344 C3                      	retn

 34159                                  ; procedure : AllocUMB
 34160                                  ;
 34161                                  ;	Allocate all UMBs and link it to DOS arena chain
 34162                                  ;
 34163                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 34165                                  AllocUMB:

 34184                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 34185                                  
 34186                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34187                                  
 34188                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34189                                  
 34190                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34191                                  ;
 34192                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 34193                                  ;
 34194                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 34195                                  ;	if it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 34196                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 34197                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 34198                                  ;
 34199                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 34200                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 34201                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 34202                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 34203                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 34204                                  ;
 34205                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34206                                  
 34207                                  umb_coalesce:
 34208                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34209                                  	; ds = cs
 34210 00003354 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 34211                                  
 34212 00003355 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 34213                                  
 34214                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34215                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34216 00003357 8E06[961F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34217 0000335B 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 34218                                  uc_nextfree:
 34219 00003360 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34220 00003362 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34221                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 34222 00003364 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 34223 00003369 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 34224                                  					; N: get next arena
 34225 0000336B E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34226 0000336E 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34227 00003370 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 34228                                  uc_again:
 34229 00003372 E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34230 00003375 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34231                                  uc_check:
 34232 00003377 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 34233 0000337C 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 34234                                  					; Y: coalesce
 34235 0000337E 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 34236 00003383 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 34237                                  	;add	[3],cx
 34238 00003384 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 34239 00003388 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 34240 0000338B 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 34241 0000338D EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 34242                                  
 34243                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34244                                  ;uc_done:
 34245                                  	;retn

 34295                                  ;
 34296                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 34297                                  ;
 34298                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 34299                                  ;
 34300                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 34301                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 34302                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 34303                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 34304                                  ;				NC
 34305                                  ;			  else 
 34306                                  ;				CY
 34307                                  ;
 34308                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 34309                                  ;
 34310                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------

 34313                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34314                                  	; ds = cs

 34318                                  					;   possible
 34319                                  	; 31/12/2022

 34321                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 34322                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 34323                                  					; the largest UMB
 34324 000033C7 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 34325 000033C9 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 34326

 34328                                  
 34329                                  	; 31/12/2022

 34332

 34336 000033D4 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 34337                                  ua_err:
 34338 000033D6 F9                      	stc	
 34339                                  
 34340                                  	;clc
 34341                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34342                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34343                                  	; cf=0
 34344                                  	;clc

 34346 000033D7 58                      	pop	ax
 34347 000033D8 C3                      	retn

 34364                                  get_next:
 34365 000033D9 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'

 34367                                  _get_next_:

 34393                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34394                                  	; ds = cs

 34397

 34399                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 34400

 34402                                  	; ds = cs

 34405 000033F3 B106                    	mov	cl,6

 34407                                  
 34408 000033F7 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 34409 000033F9 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 34410

 34412                                  
 34413                                  	;sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 34414                                  	; 09/09/2023

 34417                                  	
 34418 00003400 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'

 34420

 34422 00003411 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34423

 34428 00003420 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 34429                                  					; mark as free

 34431 00003428 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx

 34434                                  	; 31/12/2022

 34436 00003431 BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch

 34438                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 34439                                  					;  just below Top of Mem

 34442

 34457                                  	; 09/12/2022

 34459                                  got_last:

 34462 00003451 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 34463                                  
 34464 00003456 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34465                                  	;clc
 34466                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34467                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34468                                  	; cf=0
 34469                                  	;clc
 34470 0000345C C3                      	retn
 34471

 34473                                  ;;lfu_err:

 34479                                  ;	retn

 34483                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 34484                                  ;
 34485                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 34486                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool

 34491                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34492                                  	; ds = cs
 34493 0000345D 833E[791F]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0

 34499                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34500                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 34501                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 34502                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 34503 00003465 8B1E[7D1F]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 34504 00003469 2B1E[791F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 34505 0000346D 8E06[791F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 34506                                  	
 34507 00003471 B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 34508 00003474 CD21                    	int	21h
 34509                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 34510                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 34511                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 34512 00003476 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34513 00003478 48                      	dec	ax

 34515 0000347B 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 34516                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34517                                  	;pop	bx
 34518 00003482 07                      	pop	es
 34519                                  su_exit:

 34539                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34540 0000348D 8E06[961F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34541                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 34542 00003491 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 34543 00003496 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 34544                                  ulu_next:

 34546 0000349E 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 34547 000034A0 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 34548 000034A2 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 34549 000034A4 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34550 000034A6 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 34551                                  ulu_found:

 34553 000034A8 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34554                                  ulu_x:

 34556 000034AE 1F                      	pop	ds

 34559                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34560                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 34561                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34562                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34563                                  
 34564                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34565                                  ;
 34566                                  ; Summary:
 34567                                  ;
 34568                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 34569                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 34570                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 34571                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 34572                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 34573                                  ;
 34574                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 34575                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 34576                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 34577                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 34578                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 34579                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 34580                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 34581                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 34582                                  ;
 34583                                  ; Example:
 34584                                  ;
 34585                                  ;   [menu]
 34586                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 34587                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 34588                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 34589                                  ;
 34590                                  ;   [network]
 34591                                  ;   include misc
 34592                                  ;   device=foo
 34593                                  ;
 34594                                  ;   [misc]
 34595                                  ;   device=bar
 34596                                  ;   include alternate
 34597                                  ;
 34598                                  ;   [alternate]
 34599                                  ;   device=tar
 34600                                  ;
 34601                                  ;
 34602                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 34603                                  ;
 34604                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 34605                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 34606                                  ;
 34607                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 34608                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 34609                                  ;   following order:
 34610                                  ;
 34611                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 34612                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 34613                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 34614                                  ;
 34615                                  
 34616                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 34617                                  
 34618                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 34619                                  
 34620                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 34621                                  
 34622                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 34623                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 34624                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 34625                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 34626                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 34627                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 34628                                  
 34629                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34630                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34631                                  
 34632                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 34633                                  
 34634                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34635                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 34636                                  
 34637 000034B0 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 34638

 34640                                  ;
 34641                                  ; procedure : setparms

 34643                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in

 34663                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 34664 000034BF BA[4448]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters

 34673 000034C8 CD21                    	int	21h
 34674                                  
 34675                                  ; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 34676 000034CA 8A26[6D49]              	mov	ah,[switches]

 34798                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?

 34800

 34863                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 34864                                  ;
 34865                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 34866                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 34867                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 34868                                  ; error.

 34879                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)
 34880 00003515 C3                      	retn

 35137                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35138                                  ;
 35139                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 35140                                  ;
 35141                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 35142                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 35143                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 35144                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 35145                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 35146                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 35147                                  ;
 35148                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 35149                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 35150                                  ;
 35151                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 35152                                  ;
 35153                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35154                                  
 35155                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35156                                  
 35157                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35158                                  
 35159                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35160                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 35161                                  
 35162                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35163                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4236h)
 35164                                  
 35165                                  setdeviceparameters:
 35166                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35167                                  	; ds = cs
 35168                                  
 35169 000035D5 06                      	push	es
 35170                                  
 35171 000035D6 0E                      	push	cs
 35172 000035D7 07                      	pop	es
 35173                                  
 35174 000035D8 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 35175 000035DA 8A1E[4548]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 35176 000035DE 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 35177 000035E1 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 35178                                  
 35179 000035E3 C706[4848]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 35180                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 35181                                  got_80:
 35182 000035E9 D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 35183 000035EB 8BB7[EC49]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 35184                                  
 35185                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 35186                                  	; 02/11/2022

 35249                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 35250                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses

 35252                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 35253                                  
 35254                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 35255                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other

 35864                                  ;
 35865                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 35866                                  ;
 35867                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 35868                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 35869                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 35870                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 35871                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 35872                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 35873                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 35874                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 35875                                  ;
 35876                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35877                                  
 35878                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35879                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)
 35880                                  
 35881                                  skip_comment:
 35882 0000387D E3EA                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 35883                                  
 35884                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35885                                  	; ds = cs	
 35886                                  
 35887 0000387F 803E[5003]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 35888                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 35889 00003884 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 35890                                  
 35891 00003886 803E[5103]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 35892                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 35893 0000388B 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 35894                                  
 35895 0000388D 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35896                                  	
 35897 00003890 3806[5203]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 35898                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 35899 00003894 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 35900                                  
 35901 00003896 803E[5103]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 35902                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 35903 0000389B 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35904                                  
 35905 0000389D 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 35906                                  	
 35907 000038A1 3806[5303]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 35908                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 35909 000038A5 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 35910                                  skip_cmmt:
 35911 000038A7 E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 35912 000038A9 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35913 000038AC 46                      	inc	si
 35914 000038AD 49                      	dec	cx
 35915 000038AE 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 35916 000038B0 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35917                                  no_commt:
 35918 000038B2 C3                      	retn

 35928                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35929                                  ;
 35930                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 35931                                  ;
 35932                                  ;   INPUT
 35933                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 35934                                  ;
 35935                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35936                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 35937                                  ;
 35938                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35939                                  ;       All
 35940                                  ;
 35941                                  ;   HISTORY
 35942                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 35943                                  ;
 35944                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35945                                  
 35946                                  kbd_read:
 35947 000038B3 F606[1047]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 35948 000038B8 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 35949                                  
 35950 000038BA 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 35951 000038BB 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 35952 000038BD 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 35953                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 35954                                  kbd_loop:
 35955 000038BF B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 35956 000038C1 CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 35957 000038C3 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 35958 000038C5 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 35959 000038C7 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 35960 000038C9 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 35961 000038CB 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 35962 000038CD A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 35963                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 35964                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35965 000038D0 2E2B06[8603]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 35966                                  
 35967 000038D5 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 35968 000038D7 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 35969                                  kbd_loopdone:
 35970 000038D9 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 35971                                  kbd_nodelay:
 35972 000038DA 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 35973 000038DC B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 35974 000038DE CD16                            int     16h             ;
 35975 000038E0 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 35976 000038E2 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 35977 000038E4 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 35978 000038E5 43                              inc     bx
 35979                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 35980 000038E6 800E[1447]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35981                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 35982 000038EB B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 35983 000038ED CD16                            int     16h             ;
 35984 000038EF 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 35985 000038F1 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 35986 000038F3 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 35987                                  
 35988                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 35989 000038F5 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 35990 000038F8 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 35991                                  	
 35992 000038FA 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35993 000038FD 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 35994                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 35995 000038FF BA[A74B]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 35996 00003902 E8DD0B                          call    print
 35997                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 35998 00003905 800E[1447]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 35999 0000390A EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 36000                                  kbd_notf5:
 36001                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 36002 0000390C 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 36003 0000390F 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 36004                                  
 36005 00003911 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 36006 00003914 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 36007                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 36008 00003916 BA[E54B]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 36009 00003919 E8C60B                          call    print           ;
 36010 0000391C B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 36011 0000391E 881E[1447]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 36012                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 36013 00003922 B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 36014 00003924 CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 36015 00003926 C606[1A47]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 36016 0000392B 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 36017 0000392D 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 36018                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 36019 0000392F 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 36020 00003932 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 36021                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 36022 00003934 E86E08                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 36023 00003937 F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 36024 00003938 C3                              retn			;
 36025                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 36026 00003939 F8                              clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 36027 0000393A C3                              retn			;
 36028                                  
 36029                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36030                                  ;
 36031                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 36032                                  ;
 36033                                  ;   INPUT
 36034                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 36035                                  ;
 36036                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36037                                  ;       None
 36038                                  ;
 36039                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36040                                  ;       None
 36041                                  ;
 36042                                  ;   HISTORY
 36043                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 36044                                  ;
 36045                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36046                                  
 36047                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 36048                                  
 36049                                  set_numlock:
 36050                                          ; 04/01/2023
 36051                                  	;push	ax
 36052 0000393B 1E                              push    ds
 36053 0000393C 29C0                            sub     ax,ax
 36054 0000393E 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax
 36055 00003940 268B04                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 36056 00003943 2E3B06[824B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 36057 00003948 7507                            jne	short not_off	; no
 36058 0000394A 80261704DF                      and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 36059 0000394F EB0D                            jmp     short set_done
 36060                                  not_off:
 36061 00003951 2E3B06[804B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 36062 00003956 F9                              stc
 36063 00003957 7505                            jne	short set_done	; no
 36064 00003959 800E170420                      or      byte [0417h],20h
 36065                                  set_done:
 36066 0000395E 1F                              pop     ds
 36067                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36068                                  	;pop	ax
 36069 0000395F C3                              retn
 36070                                  
 36071                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36072                                  
 36073                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36074                                  ;
 36075                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 36076                                  ;
 36077                                  ;   INPUT
 36078                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 36079                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 36080                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 36081                                  ;
 36082                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36083                                  ;       Same as above; the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 36084                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 36085                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 36086                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 36087                                  ;
 36088                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36089                                  ;       All
 36090                                  ;
 36091                                  ;   NOTES
 36092                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 36093                                  ;
 36094                                  ;   HISTORY
 36095                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36096                                  ;
 36097                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36098                                  
 36099                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36100                                  	; (SYSINIT:4378h)
 36101                                  
 36102                                  menu_check:
 36103                                  
 36104                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present; if so, then
 36105                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 36106                                  
 36107 00003960 51                              push    cx              ;
 36108 00003961 56                              push    si              ;
 36109 00003962 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 36110                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 36111 00003964 E83507                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 36112 00003967 724C                            jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 36113 00003969 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; '['
 36114 0000396B 7503                            jne	short swchk_next1 ;

 36473                                  
 36474                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or

 36484 00003BF3 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36485                                  
 36486                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 36487                                  ;
 36488                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 36489                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 36490                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 36491                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 36492                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 36493                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 36494                                  ;
 36495                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 36496                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 36497                                  
 36498                                  copyblock_loop:
 36499 00003BF5 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 36500 00003BF6 E82F01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 36501 00003BF9 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36502 00003BFA 7232                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36503                                  
 36504                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 36505                                  
 36506                                  copyblock_begin:
 36507                                  
 36508                                  ; 10/09/2023
 36509                                  %if 0
 36510                                          push    ax              ;
 36511                                          push    cx              ;
 36512                                          push    si              ;
 36513                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 36514                                          mov     di,szCommon
 36515                                          push    ds              ;
 36516                                          push    cs              ;
 36517                                          pop     ds              ;
 36518                                          call    comp_names      ;
 36519                                          pop     ds              ;
 36520                                          pop     di              ;
 36521                                          pop     si              ;
 36522                                          pop     cx              ;
 36523                                          pop     ax              ;
 36524                                          je	short copyblock_check
 36525                                  %endif
 36526                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36527 00003BFC 57                      	push	di
 36528 00003BFD BF[5A47]                	mov	di,szCommon	; always do "common" blocks
 36529 00003C00 E81602                  	call	comp_names_x	; (comp_names_safe)
 36530 00003C03 5F                      	pop	di
 36531 00003C04 740F                    	je	short copyblock_check
 36532                                  
 36533 00003C06 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 36534 00003C08 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 36535 00003C0A 57                              push    di              ;
 36536 00003C0B 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 36537 00003C0D 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36538 00003C0E 06                              push    es              ;
 36539 00003C0F 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36540 00003C10 E8E501                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 36541 00003C13 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36542 00003C14 5F                              pop     di              ;
 36543                                  copyblock_check:
 36544 00003C15 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36545 00003C17 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip ;
 36546 00003C19 E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36547 00003C1C EBD7                            jmp	short copyblock_loop
 36548                                  
 36549                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 36550 00003C1E E85504                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 36551 00003C21 E87804                          call    get_char        ;

 36553 00003C26 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh

 36556 00003C2C EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 36557                                  ;
 36558                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 36559                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 36560                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 36561                                  ;
 36562                                  move_config:
 36563 00003C2E 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 36564 00003C30 51                              push    cx              ;
 36565                                  ;
 36566                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 36567                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 36568                                  ;

 36572 00003C37 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 36573                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 36574                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 36575                                  copy_boot: 
 36576                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];

 36578 00003C39 AC                      	lodsb
 36579 00003C3A 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;

 36584                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 36585                                  	; 04/01/2023

 36587 00003C42 2E8B36[1747]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 36588 00003C47 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?

 36591 00003C4C 07                              pop     es              ;

 36593 00003C50 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 36594 00003C53 E8B205                          call    any_delim       ;
 36595 00003C56 7406                            je	short l2	;

 36598 00003C5B 47                              inc     di              ;

 36601 00003C61 07                              pop     es              ;
 36602                                  
 36603                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 36604                                  
 36605 00003C62 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36606 00003C64 2E893E[BC14]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 36607 00003C69 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36608 00003C6B 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 36609                                  
 36610 00003C6C 51                              push    cx              ;
 36611 00003C6D F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 36612 00003C6F 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36613 00003C70 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 36614 00003C72 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36615                                  
 36616                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 36617                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 36618                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 36619                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 36620                                  ;   is empty.
 36621                                  
 36622 00003C73 06                              push    es              ;

 36625 00003C77 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block

 36627 00003C80 07                              pop     es
 36628                                  
 36629                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 36630                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 36631                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 36632                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 36633                                  
 36634                                  menu_done:

 36636 00003C86 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 36637 00003C88 06                              push    es              ;

 36639 00003C8C 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36640 00003C8E A1[1247]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;

 36645                                  menu_exit:
 36646 00003C9D 890E[5603]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 36647 00003CA1 890E[5803]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 36648                                          ; 10/09/2023 (*) - Erdogan Tan
 36649                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:46D3h
 36650                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:491Ah
 36651                                  	;sub	si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 36652 00003CA5 C3                      	retn
 36653                                  
 36654                                  ; (*) NOTE: MSDOS 6.0 source code (SYSINIT2.ASM) contains 'sub si,si' at this
 36655                                  ;	position (then 'retn' just after it)
 36656                                  ;	but MSDOS 6.21 and PCDOS 7.1 SYSINITs contain only 'retn' here.
 36657                                  
 36658                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36659                                  ;
 36660                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36661                                  ;
 36662                                  ;   INPUT
 36663                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 36664                                  ;
 36665                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36666                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 36667                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 36668                                  ;
 36669                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36670                                  ;       None
 36671                                  ;
 36672                                  ;   NOTES
 36673                                  ;       None
 36674                                  ;
 36675                                  ;   HISTORY
 36676                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36677                                  ;
 36678                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36679                                  
 36680                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36681                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 36682                                  
 36683                                  copy_envvar:
 36684 00003CA6 51                              push    cx              ;
 36685 00003CA7 56                              push    si              ;
 36686 00003CA8 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36687 00003CA9 06                              push    es              ;
 36688 00003CAA 06                              push    es              ;

 36690 00003CAF 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 36691                                  
 36692                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 36693                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 36694                                  ;   config.sys line)
 36695                                  ;
 36696                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 36697                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 36698                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 36699                                  
 36700 00003CB0 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 36701                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 36702 00003CB2 AC                              lodsb                   ;
 36703 00003CB3 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 36704                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36705 00003CB5 746B                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 36706 00003CB7 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr           ;
 36707                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36708 00003CB9 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 36709 00003CBB 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf           ;
 36710                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36711 00003CBD 7463                            je	short copy_envexit
 36712 00003CBF 41                              inc     cx              ;
 36713 00003CC0 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 36714 00003CC2 75EE                            jne	short copy_varlen
 36715 00003CC4 B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 36716 00003CC6 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 36717 00003CC8 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 36718 00003CCA 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 36719 00003CCB 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 36720                                  copy_varsrch:
 36721 00003CCD 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 36722 00003CD0 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 36723 00003CD2 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 36724 00003CD4 51                              push    cx              ;
 36725 00003CD5 56                              push    si              ;
 36726 00003CD6 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 36727 00003CD8 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36728 00003CD9 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36729 00003CDA 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 36730 00003CDC 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 36731 00003CE0 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 36732                                  
 36733                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 36734                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 36735                                  
 36736 00003CE2 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 36737 00003CE5 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 36738 00003CE7 56                              push    si              ;
 36739 00003CE8 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 36740 00003CEA 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 36741 00003CEC 2E8B0E[BC14]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 36742 00003CF1 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 36743                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 36744                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 36745                                  
 36746 00003CF3 F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 36747 00003CF4 26                      	es	; 26h
 36748 00003CF5 A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 36749                                  
 36750 00003CF6 5E                      	pop     si
 36751                                  copy_envprep:
 36752 00003CF7 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 36753 00003CFA 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 36754 00003CFC 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 36755 00003CFF 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 36756                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 36757                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36758                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 36759 00003D01 AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 36760 00003D02 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 36761 00003D04 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 36762 00003D06 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 36763 00003D08 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 36764 00003D0A AA                      	stosb                   ;
 36765 00003D0B EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 36766                                  
 36767                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 36768 00003D0D 51                              push    cx              ;
 36769 00003D0E B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 36770 00003D11 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 36771 00003D13 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36772 00003D14 EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 36773                                  
 36774                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36775                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 36776                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 36777                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 36778                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 36779                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 36780                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 36781                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 36782                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 36783                                  
 36784                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 36785 00003D16 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 36786 00003D18 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 36787                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
