 36789 00003D1C 2E893E[BC14]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 36790                                  	; 10/09/2023 (x) - Erdogan Tan
 36791 00003D21 F9                      	stc ; in order to clear carry flag via cmc (compact code trick!)
 36792                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 36793 00003D22 F5                      	cmc ; (x) ; reverse carry flag status (je -> cf=1)
 36794 00003D23 07                              pop     es              ;
 36795 00003D24 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36796 00003D25 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36797 00003D26 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36798                                  
 36799                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 36800 00003D27 C3                              retn
 36801                                  
 36802                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36803                                  ;
 36804                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 36805                                  ;
 36806                                  ;   INPUT
 36807                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 36808                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 36809                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 36810                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 36811                                  ;
 36812                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36813                                  ;       Same as above
 36814                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 36815                                  ;
 36816                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36817                                  ;       All
 36818                                  ;
 36819                                  ;   NOTES
 36820                                  ;       None
 36821                                  ;
 36822                                  ;   HISTORY
 36823                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36824                                  ;
 36825                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36826                                  
 36827                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36828                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 36829                                  
 36830                                  copy_block:
 36831 00003D28 E87103                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 36832 00003D2B 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 36833 00003D2D 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36834 00003D2F 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 36835 00003D31 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 36836                                  
 36837 00003D33 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 36838 00003D35 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 36839 00003D37 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 36840                                  
 36841                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 36842                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 36843                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 36844                                  
 36845 00003D39 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 36846 00003D3E 57                              push    di              ;
 36847                                  
 36848 00003D3F BF[5547]                        mov     di,szMenu
 36849 00003D42 E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 36850 00003D45 7426                            je	short copy_skip	;
 36851                                  
 36852 00003D47 BF[5A47]                        mov     di,szCommon
 36853 00003D4A E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 36854 00003D4D 741E                            je	short copy_skip	;
 36855                                  
 36856 00003D4F 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 36857 00003D51 E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 36858 00003D54 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 36859                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36860                                  	;pop    di              ;
 36861 00003D56 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 36862 00003D58 5F                      	pop	di  ; 10/09/2023
 36863 00003D59 51                              push    cx              ;
 36864 00003D5A 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 36865 00003D5C 56                              push    si              ;
 36866 00003D5D 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 36867 00003D5E 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 36868 00003D60 E80E03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 36869 00003D63 E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 36870 00003D66 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36871 00003D67 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36872 00003D68 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 36873 00003D6A EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 36874                                  
 36875                                  copy_error:
 36876                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36877 00003D6C F8                      	clc
 36878                                  copy_skip:
 36879 00003D6D 5F                              pop     di
 36880                                  ;copy_error:
 36881                                  	; 10/09/2023 (cf=0)
 36882                                  	;clc                    ;
 36883 00003D6E E80004                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 36884 00003D71 EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 36885                                  
 36886                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 36887                                  
 36888                                  copy_line:
 36889 00003D73 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36890 00003D75 47                              inc     di              ;
 36891 00003D76 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 36892 00003D78 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 36893 00003D7A 2E803E[C114]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 36894 00003D80 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 36895 00003D82 E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 36896 00003D85 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 36897 00003D87 47                              inc     di              ;
 36898 00003D88 47                              inc     di              ;
 36899 00003D89 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 36900                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 36901 00003D8B E80E03                          call    get_char        ;
 36902 00003D8E 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 36903 00003D90 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36904 00003D92 47                              inc     di              ;
 36905                                  copy_next:
 36906 00003D93 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 36907 00003D95 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 36908                                  
 36909                                  copy_nextline:
 36910 00003D97 E8DC02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36911 00003D9A EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 36912                                  
 36913                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36914                                  ;copy_done:
 36915                                          ;retn
 36916                                  
 36917                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36918                                  ;
 36919                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 36920                                  ;
 36921                                  ;   INPUT
 36922                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 36923                                  ;
 36924                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36925                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 36926                                  ;
 36927                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36928                                  ;       DX
 36929                                  ;
 36930                                  ;   NOTES
 36931                                  ;       None
 36932                                  ;
 36933                                  ;   HISTORY
 36934                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36935                                  ;
 36936                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36937                                  
 36938                                  get_linenum:
 36939 00003D9C 50                              push    ax              ;
 36940 00003D9D 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 36941 00003D9F 51                              push    cx              ;
 36942 00003DA0 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 36943 00003DA2 56                              push    si              ;
 36944 00003DA3 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 36945 00003DA8 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 36946                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 36947 00003DAA E8C402                          call    skip_line       ;
 36948 00003DAD 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 36949 00003DAF 43                              inc     bx              ;
 36950 00003DB0 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 36951 00003DB2 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 36952                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 36953 00003DB4 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36954 00003DB5 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36955 00003DB6 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36956 00003DB7 C3                              retn
 36957                                  
 36958                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36959                                  ;
 36960                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 36961                                  ;
 36962                                  ;   INPUT
 36963                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 36964                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 36965                                  ;
 36966                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36967                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 36968                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 36969                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 36970                                  ;
 36971                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36972                                  ;       None
 36973                                  ;
 36974                                  ;   NOTES
 36975                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 36976                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 36977                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 36978                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 36979                                  ;
 36980                                  ;   HISTORY
 36981                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36982                                  ;
 36983                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36984                                  
 36985                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 36986 00003DB8 50                              push    ax              ;
 36987 00003DB9 51                              push    cx              ;
 36988 00003DBA 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 36989 00003DBF 56                              push    si              ;
 36990 00003DC0 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36991 00003DC2 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36992 00003DC3 06                              push    es              ;
 36993 00003DC4 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36994 00003DC5 E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 36995 00003DC8 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 36996 00003DCA 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 36997 00003DCC 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36998 00003DCD 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36999 00003DCE 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37000 00003DCF 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37001                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 37002 00003DD0 C3                              retn			;
 37003                                  
 37004                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37005                                  ;
 37006                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 37007                                  ;
 37008                                  ;   INPUT
 37009                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 37010                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 37011                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 37012                                  ;
 37013                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37014                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 37015                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37016                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37017                                  ;
 37018                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37019                                  ;       AX
 37020                                  ;
 37021                                  ;   NOTES
 37022                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 37023                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 37024                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 37025                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 37026                                  ;
 37027                                  ;   HISTORY
 37028                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37029                                  ;
 37030                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37031                                  
 37032                                  find_block:
 37033 00003DD1 E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 37034 00003DD4 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 37035 00003DD6 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 37036 00003DD8 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 37037 00003DDA 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 37038 00003DDC 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 37039 00003DDE 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 37040 00003DE0 2E800E[C114]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37041 00003DE6 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 37042                                  check_line:
 37043 00003DE8 2E800E[C114]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37044 00003DEE E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 37045 00003DF1 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 37046                                  next_line:
 37047 00003DF3 E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 37048 00003DF6 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 37049                                  ;find_exit:
 37050                                  ;	retn
 37051                                  
 37052                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37053                                  ;
 37054                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 37055                                  ;
 37056                                  ;   INPUT
 37057                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 37058                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37059                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37060                                  ;
 37061                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37062                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 37063                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37064                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37065                                  ;
 37066                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37067                                  ;       AX
 37068                                  ;
 37069                                  ;   NOTES
 37070                                  ;       None
 37071                                  ;
 37072                                  ;   HISTORY
 37073                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37074                                  ;
 37075                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37076                                  
 37077                                  comp_names:
 37078 00003DF8 57                              push    di              ;
 37079                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 37080 00003DF9 E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 37081 00003DFC 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 37082 00003DFE E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 37083 00003E01 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 37084 00003E03 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 37085 00003E05 47                              inc     di              ;
 37086 00003E06 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 37087                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 37088 00003E09 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 37089 00003E0B 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 37090 00003E0D F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 37091                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 37092 00003E0E 5F                              pop     di              ;
 37093 00003E0F C3                              retn			;
 37094                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 37095 00003E10 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 37096 00003E12 E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 37097 00003E15 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 37098 00003E17 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 37099                                  
 37100                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37101                                  
 37102                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37103                                  comp_names_x:
 37104                                  	;
 37105                                  comp_names_safe:
 37106 00003E19 50                              push    ax
 37107 00003E1A 51                              push    cx
 37108 00003E1B 56                              push	si
 37109 00003E1C 1E                              push    ds
 37110 00003E1D 0E                              push    cs
 37111 00003E1E 1F                              pop     ds
 37112 00003E1F E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 37113 00003E22 1F                              pop     ds
 37114 00003E23 5E                      	pop	si
 37115 00003E24 59                              pop     cx
 37116 00003E25 58                              pop     ax
 37117 00003E26 C3                              retn
 37118                                  
 37119                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37120                                  ;
 37121                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 37122                                  ;
 37123                                  ;   INPUT
 37124                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 37125                                  ;
 37126                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37127                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 37128                                  ;
 37129                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37130                                  ;       None
 37131                                  ;
 37132                                  ;   NOTES
 37133                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 37134                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 37135                                  ;
 37136                                  ;   HISTORY
 37137                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37138                                  ;
 37139                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37140                                  
 37141                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37142                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 37143                                  
 37144                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 37145 00003E27 50                              push    ax              ;
 37146 00003E28 53                              push    bx              ;
 37147 00003E29 51                              push    cx              ;
 37148 00003E2A 52                              push    dx              ;
 37149 00003E2B 56                              push    si              ;
 37150 00003E2C B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37151 00003E2E 8A3E[0C47]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 37152 00003E32 CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 37153 00003E34 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 37154 00003E35 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37155 00003E37 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 37156 00003E39 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 37157 00003E3C B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 37158 00003E3E CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 37159 00003E40 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37160 00003E42 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 37161 00003E44 8A26[0B47]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 37162 00003E48 3A1E[1547]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 37163 00003E4C 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37164 00003E4E 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 37165 00003E51 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 37166 00003E53 B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 37167 00003E55 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 37168 00003E57 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 37169 00003E59 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37170 00003E5B 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 37171                                  print_other:                    ;
 37172 00003E5E B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 37173 00003E60 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 37174 00003E62 8BBF[3947]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 37175 00003E66 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 37176 00003E68 8A3E[0C47]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 37177 00003E6C B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 37178 00003E6E B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 37179 00003E71 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37180 00003E73 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37181 00003E75 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37182 00003E77 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37183                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 37184 00003E79 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 37185 00003E7C CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 37186 00003E7E FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37187 00003E80 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37188 00003E82 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37189                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 37190 00003E84 B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 37191 00003E87 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 37192 00003E89 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37193 00003E8B B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37194 00003E8D CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37195 00003E8F 06                              push    es              ;
 37196                                  print_loop:                     ;
 37197 00003E90 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 37198 00003E93 47                              inc     di              ;
 37199 00003E94 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 37200 00003E96 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 37201 00003E98 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 37202                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 37203 00003E9A 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 37204 00003E9C 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 37205 00003E9E 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 37206 00003EA0 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 37207 00003EA2 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 37208 00003EA4 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37209 00003EA6 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37210 00003EA8 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 37211 00003EAB 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 37212 00003EAD B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37213 00003EAF CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37214 00003EB1 EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 37215                                  print_done:                     ;
 37216 00003EB3 07                              pop     es              ;
 37217 00003EB4 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37218 00003EB5 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37219 00003EB7 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 37220 00003EB9 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37221 00003EBA 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37222 00003EBB 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37223 00003EBC 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37224 00003EBD 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37225 00003EBE C3                              retn			;
 37226                                  
 37227                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37228                                  ;
 37229                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 37230                                  ;
 37231                                  ;   INPUT
 37232                                  ;       None
 37233                                  ;
 37234                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37235                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 37236                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 37237                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 37238                                  ;
 37239                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37240                                  ;       None
 37241                                  ;
 37242                                  ;   NOTES
 37243                                  ;       None
 37244                                  ;
 37245                                  ;   HISTORY
 37246                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37247                                  ;
 37248                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37249                                  
 37250                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 37251 00003EBF 8A1E[1547]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 37252 00003EC3 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37253 00003EC5 E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 37254 00003EC8 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 37255 00003ECB 803E[1947]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 37256 00003ED0 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 37257 00003ED2 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 37258 00003ED4 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37259 00003ED6 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 37260                                  check_time:
 37261 00003ED8 A0[1947]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 37262 00003EDB 2A06[1A47]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 37263 00003EDF 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 37264 00003EE1 800E[1447]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 37265 00003EE6 C606[1A47]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 37266 00003EEB E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 37267                                  show_time:
 37268 00003EEE 53                              push    bx              ;
 37269 00003EEF 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 37270 00003EF1 8A3E[0C47]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 37271 00003EF5 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37272 00003EF7 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37273 00003EF9 52                              push    dx              ;
 37274 00003EFA 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 37275 00003EFD B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37276 00003EFF CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37277 00003F01 BA[CE4C]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 37278 00003F04 E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 37279 00003F07 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 37280 00003F09 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 37281 00003F0A B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 37282 00003F0C F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 37283 00003F0E 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 37284 00003F10 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37285 00003F12 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37286 00003F14 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 37287 00003F16 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 37288 00003F18 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37289 00003F1A B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37290 00003F1C CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 37291 00003F1E 5A                              pop     dx
 37292 00003F1F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 37293 00003F21 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37294 00003F23 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37295                                  input_key:
 37296 00003F24 B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 37297 00003F26 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 37298 00003F28 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37299 00003F2A 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 37300 00003F2C 803E[1947]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 37301 00003F31 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 37302 00003F33 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 37303 00003F35 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 37304 00003F37 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 37305 00003F39 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 37306 00003F3B 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 37307 00003F3D 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 37308 00003F3F B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 37309                                  got_time:
 37310 00003F41 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 37311 00003F43 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 37312 00003F45 0036[1A47]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 37313 00003F49 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 37314                                  got_key:
 37315 00003F4B 50                              push    ax              ;
 37316 00003F4C B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 37317 00003F4F 8706[1947]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 37318 00003F53 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 37319 00003F55 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 37320 00003F57 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 37321 00003F58 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 37322 00003F5B 8B1E[0B47]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 37323 00003F5F B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 37324 00003F62 CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 37325 00003F64 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 37326                                  
 37327                                  timeout_disabled:
 37328 00003F65 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37329 00003F66 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 37330 00003F68 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 37331 00003F6A CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 37332 00003F6C 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 37333                                  
 37334 00003F6E 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 37335 00003F70 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 37336 00003F72 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 37337 00003F75 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 37338 00003F77 FE0E[1547]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37339 00003F7B E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37340 00003F7E FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 37341 00003F80 EB12                            jmp     short print1
 37342                                  not_up:
 37343 00003F82 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 37344 00003F84 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 37345 00003F86 3A1E[1647]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 37346 00003F8A 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 37347 00003F8C FE06[1547]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37348 00003F90 E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37349 00003F93 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 37350                                  print1: 
 37351 00003F94 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 37352                                  print2: 
 37353 00003F96 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 37354 00003F99 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 37355                                  to_input_key:
 37356 00003F9C EB86                            jmp	short input_key ; 10/09/2023
 37357                                  not_down:
 37358 00003F9E F606[1047]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37359 00003FA3 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 37360 00003FA5 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 37361 00003FA7 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 37362 00003FA9 8036[1447]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 37363 00003FAE E85E00                          call    show_status     ;
 37364 00003FB1 E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 37365                                  not_f8:
 37366 00003FB4 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 37367 00003FB6 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 37368                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37369                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 37370                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)
 37371 00003FB8 800E[1447]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 ; no more queries
 37372 00003FBD BBFFFF                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 37373 00003FC0 B020                            mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 37374 00003FC2 EB26                            jmp     short disp_input ; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 37375                                  
 37376                                  normal_key:
 37377 00003FC4 3C0D                            cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 37378 00003FC6 741C                            je	short select_done ; yes
 37379 00003FC8 3C08                            cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 37380 00003FCA 7504                            jne	short not_backspace ; no
 37381 00003FCC BBFEFF                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 37382 00003FCF C3                              retn			;
 37383                                  not_backspace:
 37384 00003FD0 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 37385 00003FD2 76C8                            jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 37386 00003FD4 3A06[1647]                      cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 37387 00003FD8 77C2                            ja	short to_input_key ; no
 37388 00003FDA A2[1547]                        mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 37389 00003FDD E847FE                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 37390 00003FE0 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 37391 00003FE2 EBB2                            jmp	short print2
 37392                                  
 37393                                  select_done:
 37394 00003FE4 B700                            mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 37395 00003FE6 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37396 00003FE8 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 37397                                  
 37398                                  	; fall into disp_input
 37399                                  
 37400                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37401                                  
 37402                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37403                                  ;
 37404                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 37405                                  ;
 37406                                  ;   INPUT
 37407                                  ;       AL == character to display
 37408                                  ;
 37409                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37410                                  ;       None
 37411                                  ;
 37412                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37413                                  ;       None
 37414                                  ;
 37415                                  ;   NOTES
 37416                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 37417                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 37418                                  ;
 37419                                  ;   HISTORY
 37420                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37421                                  ;
 37422                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37423                                  
 37424                                  
 37425                                  disp_input:
 37426 00003FEA 50                      	push	ax
 37427                                  	;cmp	al,' '
 37428                                  	;jae	short disp_ok

 37519                                  ;
 37520                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 37521                                  ;
 37522                                  ;   INPUT
 37523                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37524                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37525                                  ;
 37526                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37527                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 37528                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 37529                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 37530                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37531                                  ;
 37532                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37533                                  ;       AX
 37534                                  ;
 37535                                  ;   NOTES
 37536                                  ;       None
 37537                                  ;
 37538                                  ;   HISTORY
 37539                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37540                                  ;
 37541                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37542                                  
 37543                                  skip_token:
 37544 0000404C E84D00                          call    get_char
 37545 0000404F 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 37546 00004051 E8B401                          call    any_delim
 37547 00004054 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 37548                                  skip_check_eol:
 37549 00004056 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 37550 00004058 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37551 0000405A 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37552 0000405C 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37553 0000405E F8                              clc
 37554                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 37555 0000405F C3                      	retn
 37556                                  skip_token_eol:
 37557 00004060 F9                              stc
 37558                                  skip_token_done:
 37559 00004061 C3                              retn
 37560                                  
 37561                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37562                                  ;
 37563                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 37564                                  ;
 37565                                  ;   INPUT
 37566                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37567                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37568                                  ;
 37569                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37570                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37571                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 37572                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 37573                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37574                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 37575                                  ;
 37576                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37577                                  ;       AX
 37578                                  ;
 37579                                  ;   NOTES
 37580                                  ;       None
 37581                                  ;
 37582                                  ;   HISTORY
 37583                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37584                                  ;
 37585                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37586                                  
 37587                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 37588 00004062 E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 37589 00004065 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 37590 00004068 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 37591 0000406A E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 37592 0000406D 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 37593 0000406F EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 37594                                  
 37595                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37596                                  ;
 37597                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 37598                                  ;
 37599                                  ;   INPUT
 37600                                  ;       AL == last character read
 37601                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37602                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37603                                  ;
 37604                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37605                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37606                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 37607                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37608                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37609                                  ;
 37610                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37611                                  ;       AX
 37612                                  ;
 37613                                  ;   NOTES
 37614                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 37615                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 37616                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 37617                                  ;
 37618                                  ;   HISTORY
 37619                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37620                                  ;
 37621                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37622                                  
 37623                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37624                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 37625                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37626                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 37627                                       
 37628                                  	; fall into skip_line
 37629                                  
 37630                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37631                                  ;
 37632                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 37633                                  ;
 37634                                  ;   INPUT
 37635                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37636                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37637                                  ;
 37638                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37639                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37640                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37641                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37642                                  ;
 37643                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37644                                  ;       AX
 37645                                  ;
 37646                                  ;   NOTES
 37647                                  ;       None
 37648                                  ;
 37649                                  ;   HISTORY
 37650                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37651                                  ;
 37652                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37653                                  
 37654                                  skip_line:
 37655 00004071 E82800                          call    get_char
 37656 00004074 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 37657                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37658 00004076 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37659 00004078 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 37660                                  skip_line_done:
 37661                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37662 0000407A C3                              retn
 37663                                  
 37664                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37665                                  ;
 37666                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 37667                                  ;
 37668                                  ;   INPUT
 37669                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37670                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37671                                  ;
 37672                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37673                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 37674                                  ;       BX == binary #
 37675                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 37676                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37677                                  ;
 37678                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37679                                  ;       AX
 37680                                  ;
 37681                                  ;   NOTES
 37682                                  ;       None
 37683                                  ;
 37684                                  ;   HISTORY
 37685                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37686                                  ;
 37687                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37688                                  
 37689                                  ; 13/05/2019
 37690                                  
 37691                                  get_number:
 37692 0000407B 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 37693                                  num_loop:
 37694 0000407D E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 37695 00004080 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 37696 00004082 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 37697 00004084 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 37698 00004086 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 37699 00004088 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 37700 0000408A 50                              push    ax              ;
 37701 0000408B B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 37702 0000408E 52                              push    dx              ;
 37703 0000408F F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 37704 00004091 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37705 00004092 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 37706 00004094 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37707 00004095 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 37708 00004097 98                              cbw                     ;
 37709 00004098 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 37710 0000409A EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 37711                                  
 37712                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37713                                  ;num_done:
 37714                                          ;retn

 37716                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37717                                  ;
 37718                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 37719                                  ;
 37720                                  ;   INPUT
 37721                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37722                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37723                                  ;
 37724                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37725                                  ;       AL == next character
 37726                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 37727                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37728                                  ;
 37729                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37730                                  ;       AX
 37731                                  ;
 37732                                  ;   NOTES
 37733                                  ;       None
 37734                                  ;
 37735                                  ;   HISTORY
 37736                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37737                                  ;
 37738                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37739                                  
 37740                                  get_char:
 37741 0000409C 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 37742 0000409F 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 37743                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 37744 000040A1 26                      	es	
 37745 000040A2 AC                      	lodsb
 37746 000040A3 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 37747 000040A5 C3                              retn			;
 37748                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 37749 000040A6 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 37750                                  nearby_ret:
 37751 000040A9 C3                              retn

 37753                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37754                                  ;
 37755                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 37756                                  ;
 37757                                  ;   INPUT
 37758                                  ;       AL == current command code
 37759                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 37760                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 37761                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 37762                                  ;
 37763                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37764                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 37765                                  ;
 37766                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37767                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 37768                                  ;
 37769                                  ;   NOTES
 37770                                  ;       None
 37771                                  ;
 37772                                  ;   HISTORY
 37773                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37774                                  ;
 37775                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37776                                  
 37777                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37778                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 37779                                  
 37780                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37781                                  query_user:
 37782 000040AA F606[1447]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 37783                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37784 000040AF 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 37785 000040B1 E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 37786                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37787                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 37788                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 37789                                  qu_1:
 37790 000040B4 F606[1447]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 37791 000040B9 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 37792 000040BB 50                              push    ax                      ;
 37793 000040BC A0[C014]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 37794 000040BF F606[1447]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 37795 000040C4 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 37796 000040C6 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 37797                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37798 000040C8 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 37799                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37800                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 37801                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 37802                                  
 37803                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37804 000040CA 58                      	pop	ax
 37805 000040CB C3                      	retn
 37806                                  
 37807                                  query_all:
 37808                                  
 37809                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 37810                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 37811                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 37812                                  
 37813 000040CC 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37814 000040CD BA[204D]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 37815 000040D0 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37816 000040D2 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 37817                                  
 37818 000040D4 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 37819 000040D6 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 37820 000040D8 BF[6147]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 37821                                  find_match:                             ;
 37822 000040DB 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 37823 000040DD 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 37824 000040DF 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 37825 000040E1 47                              inc     di                      ;
 37826 000040E2 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 37827 000040E4 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 37828 000040E6 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 37829                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 37830 000040E9 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 37831                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 37832 000040EB 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 37833 000040EE B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 37834 000040F0 B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 37835                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 37836 000040F2 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 37837 000040F4 47                              inc     di                      ;
 37838 000040F5 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 37839 000040F7 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 37840 000040F9 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 37841 000040FB B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 37842 000040FD 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 37843 00004100 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 37844 00004102 B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 37845                                  cmd_notset:
 37846 00004104 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 37847                                  line_print:                             ;
 37848                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 37849 00004106 26                              es
 37850 00004107 AC                      	lodsb
 37851 00004108 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 37852 0000410A 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 37853 0000410C B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 37854                                  non_null:                               ;
 37855 0000410E 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 37856 00004110 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 37857 00004112 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 37858                                          ; 10/09/2023
 37859 00004114 263804                  	cmp	[es:si],al ; 20h
 37860                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 37861 00004117 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 37862                                  non_space:                              ;
 37863 00004119 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 37864 0000411B B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 37865 0000411D CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 37866 0000411F EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 37867                                  
 37868                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 37869 00004121 BA[BE4C]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 37870                                  
 37871                                  generic_prompt:
 37872 00004124 E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 37873                                  input_loop:                             ;
 37874 00004127 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 37875 00004129 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 37876 0000412B 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 37877 0000412D 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 37878 0000412F 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 37879 00004132 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 37880 00004134 A0[CA4C]                        mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 37881 00004137 800E[1447]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 37882 0000413C EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 37883                                  not_func:
 37884 0000413E 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 37885 00004140 3A06[CA4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 37886 00004144 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 37887 00004146 3A06[C64C]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 37888 0000414A 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 37889 0000414C 803E[C014]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 37890 00004151 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 37891 00004153 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 37892 00004155 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 37893 00004157 800E[1447]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 37894 0000415C A0[C64C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 37895                                  legal_char:                             ;
 37896 0000415F E888FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 37897 00004162 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37898                                  
 37899 00004163 3A06[CA4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 37900 00004167 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 37901                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37902 00004169 F8                      	clc
 37903                                  do_cmd:
 37904 0000416A 58                      	pop     ax			;
 37905                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37906                                  	; cf=0
 37907                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 37908 0000416B C3                      	retn
 37909                                  
 37910                                  skip_cmd:
 37911 0000416C 58                      	pop     ax			;
 37912                                  skip_all:
 37913 0000416D B430                    	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 37914 0000416F F9                      	stc
 37915 00004170 C3                      	retn

 37974                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 37975                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 37976                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 37977                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 37978                                  
 37979                                  disable_autoexec:
 37980                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 37981                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37982                                  
 37983 000041A5 F606[1447]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 37984 000041AA 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 37985 000041AC F606[0A47]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 37986 000041B1 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 37987 000041B3 800E[0A47]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 37988                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 37989 000041B8 810E[1447]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 37990 000041BE BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 37991                                  dae_1:
 37992                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37993 000041C1 A0[4946]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 37994                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 37995 000041C4 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 37996 000041C6 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 37997 000041C8 8A1E[4A46]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 37998 000041CC B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 37999 000041CE 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 38000 000041D0 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 38001 000041D3 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 38002 000041D6 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 38003 000041D8 881E[4A46]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 38004 000041DC 81C3[4B46]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 38005 000041E0 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 38006                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 38007 000041E1 8A67FD                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 38008 000041E4 8827                            mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 38009 000041E6 4B                              dec     bx                      ;
 38010 000041E7 E2F8                            loop    disable_loop            ;
 38011 000041E9 8847FE                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 38012                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 38013 000041EC 8957FF                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 38014                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 38015                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 38016 000041EF C3                              retn
 38017                                  
 38018                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 38019 000041F0 803E[1447]01            	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 38020 000041F5 75F8                    	jnz     short disable_exit
 38021 000041F7 F606[0A47]02            	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 38022 000041FC 75F1                    	jnz     short disable_exit
 38023 000041FE 800E[0A47]02            	or      byte [dae_flag],2
