 38157                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 38158                                  ;
 38159                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38160                                  
 38161                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38162                                  
 38163                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38164                                  	; (SYSINIT:4C7Eh)
 38165                                  mapcase:
 38166 00004254 51                      	push	cx
 38167 00004255 56                      	push	si
 38168 00004256 1E                      	push	ds
 38169                                  
 38170 00004257 06                      	push	es
 38171 00004258 1F                      	pop	ds
 38172                                  
 38173                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38174                                  
 38175                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38176                                  
 38177                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38178 00004259 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 38179                                  ;else
 38180                                  ;	xor	si,si
 38181                                  ;endif
 38182                                  	; 02/11/2022
 38183                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38184                                  	;xor	si, si
 38185                                  
 38186                                  convloop:
 38187 0000425B AC                      	lodsb
 38188 0000425C 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 38189 0000425E 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 38190 00004260 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 38191 00004262 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 38192 00004264 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 38193 00004266 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 38194                                  noconv:
 38195                                  
 38196                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38197                                  
 38198                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38199                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38200                                  
 38201                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 38202                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 38203                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 38204                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 38205                                  ;
 38206 00004269 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 38207 0000426C 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 38208 0000426E 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 38209 00004270 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 38210                                  check_eol:
 38211 00004272 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 38212 00004274 7406                    	je	short convdone
 38213 00004276 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 38214 00004278 7402                    	je	short convdone
 38215                                  ;endif
 38216                                  	; 02/11/2022
 38217 0000427A E2DF                    	loop	convloop
 38218                                  convdone:
 38219 0000427C 1F                      	pop	ds
 38220 0000427D 5E                      	pop	si
 38221 0000427E 59                      	pop	cx
 38222 0000427F C3                      	retn

 38338                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38339                                  ;
 38340                                  ; procedure : getnum
 38341                                  ;
 38342                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 38343                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 38344                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 38345                                  ;
 38346                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38347                                  
 38348                                  getnum:
 38349 000042F3 53                      	push	bx
 38350 000042F4 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 38351                                  b2:
 38352 000042F6 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 38353 000042F9 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 38354                                  
 38355 000042FB 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 38356 000042FC 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 38357                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 38358                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38359 000042FD B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 38360 000042FF F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 38361 00004301 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 38362 00004302 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 38363 00004304 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 38364 00004307 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 38365                                  
 38366 00004309 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 38367                                  
 38368 0000430A E830FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 38369 0000430D 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 38370 0000430F 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 38371 00004311 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 38372 00004313 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 38373 00004315 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 38374 00004317 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 38375 00004319 7417                    	je	short b15
 38376 0000431B 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 38377 00004320 7410                    	je	short b15
 38378 00004322 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 38379                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38380                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38381                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 38382                                  	;nop
 38383 00004324 740C                    	je	short b15
 38384 00004326 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 38385 00004328 7408                    	je	short b15
 38386 0000432A 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 38387 0000432C 7404                    	je	short b15
 38388 0000432E 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 38389 00004330 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 38390                                  b15:
 38391 00004332 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 38392 00004337 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 38393                                  b1:
 38394 0000433C 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 38395 0000433E 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 38396 00004340 5B                      	pop	bx
 38397 00004341 C3                      	retn
 38398                                  badnum:
 38399                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38400                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 38401 00004342 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 38402                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 38403 00004344 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 38404 00004348 5B                      	pop	bx
 38405 00004349 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 38406 0000434A C3                      	retn
 38407                                  
 38408                                  ;****************************************************************************
 38409                                  
 38410                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 38411                                  
 38412                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38413                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 38414                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 38415                                  ;	si = 0
 38416                                  ;	ax = country id
 38417                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 38418                                  ;	bx = file handle
 38419                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 38420                                  ;
 38421                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 38422                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 38423                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 38424                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 38425                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38426                                  
 38427                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38428                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 38429                                  
 38430                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38431                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)	
 38432                                  
 38433 0000434B 57                      	push	di
 38434 0000434C 50                      	push	ax
 38435 0000434D 52                      	push	dx
 38436                                  
 38437 0000434E 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 38438 00004350 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 38439 00004352 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 38440 00004355 E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 38441 00004358 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38442                                  
 38443 0000435A 06                      	push	es
 38444 0000435B 56                      	push	si
 38445                                  
 38446 0000435C 0E                      	push	cs
 38447 0000435D 07                      	pop	es
 38448                                  
 38449 0000435E BF[AF45]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 38450 00004361 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 38451 00004364 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 38452                                  
 38453 00004366 5E                      	pop	si
 38454 00004367 07                      	pop	es
 38455 00004368 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 38456                                  
 38457 0000436A 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 38458 0000436D 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 38459 00004370 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 38460                                  
 38461 00004372 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 38462 00004373 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 38463 00004375 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 38464 00004378 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 38465 0000437B E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 38466 0000437E 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38467                                  
 38468 00004380 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 38469 00004382 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 38470 00004386 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 38471                                  
 38472 00004388 46                      	inc	si
 38473 00004389 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 38474 0000438A 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 38475 0000438B 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id

 38673                                  getcountrydestination:
 38674                                  
 38675                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38676                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 38677                                  ;
 38678                                  ;input: al - data id
 38679                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 38680                                  ;on return:
 38681                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 38682                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 38683                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38684                                  
 38685                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38686                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 38687                                  
 38688                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38689                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)
 38690                                  
 38691 00004470 51                      	push	cx

 38693 00004471 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 38694                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 38695 00004474 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 38696 00004477 47                      	inc	di
 38697 00004478 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id

 38705

 38708

 38715                                  	;jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 38716                                  getcntrydest_exit:

 38718 0000448F 59                      	pop	cx
 38719 00004490 C3                      	retn
 38720

 38744                                  
 38745                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 38746                                  
 38747                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38748                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 38749                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 38750                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 38751                                  ;
 38752                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 38753                                  ;	 be moved.
 38754                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 38755                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 38756                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 38757                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 38758                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 38759                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 38760                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38761                                  
 38762 0000449B 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 38763 0000449C B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 38764 0000449F F9                      	stc
 38765 000044A0 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 38766 000044A2 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 38767 000044A3 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 38768                                  
 38769 000044A5 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 38770 000044A7 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 38771 000044A9 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 38772 000044AB F9                      	stc
 38773 000044AC CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 38774                                  ricb_exit:
 38775 000044AE C3                      	retn
 38776

 38779                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 38780                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 38781                                  %if 0
 38782                                  
 38783                                  set_country_path:
 38784                                  
 38785                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38786                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 38787                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 38788                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 38789                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 38790                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 38791                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 38792                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38793                                  
 38794                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38795                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 38796                                  
 38797                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38798                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 38799                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 38800                                  
 38801                                  	push	si
 38802                                  
 38803                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 38804                                  	push	es
 38805                                  	pop	ds
 38806                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 38807                                  
 38808                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 38809                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 38810                                  
 38811                                  	mov	al,[si]
 38812                                  	inc	si
 38813                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 38814                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 38815                                  
 38816                                  scp_default_drv:
 38817                                  	mov	ah,19h
 38818                                  	int	21h
 38819                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 38820                                  
 38821                                  scp_setdrv:
 38822                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 38823                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 38824                                  	mov	al,[si]
 38825                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 38826                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 38827                                  
 38828                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 38829                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 38830                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 38831                                  	; 04/01/2023
 38832                                  	jne	short scp_path
 38833                                  
 38834                                  scp_root_dir:
 38835                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 38836                                  scp_path:
 38837                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 38838                                  
 38839                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 38840                                  scpath_exit:
 38841                                  
 38842                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 38843                                  	push	es
 38844                                  	pop	ds
 38845                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 38846                                  
 38847                                  	pop	si
 38848                                  	retn
 38849                                  
 38850                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38851                                  
 38852                                  chk_drive_letter:
 38853                                  
 38854                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 38855                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 38856                                  ;carry set if not.
 38857                                  
 38858                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 38859                                  
 38860                                  	push	ax
 38861                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 38862                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 38863                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 38864                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 38865                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 38866                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 38867                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 38868                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 38869                                  	; 04/01/2023
 38870                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 38871                                  
 38872                                  cdletter_no:
 38873                                  	stc
 38874                                  cdletter_exit:
 38875                                  	pop	ax
 38876                                  	retn
 38877                                  
 38878                                  %endif
 38879

 38888                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
